1151.content:
Naruto sighed as he fell through the air thinking about how he had ended up in this situation and the day had started out so normally too.

The blond teen had been walking around the leaf village with a carefree gait headed towards Ichiraku Ramen for lunch, but as with most things dealing with Naruto it rarely stayed simple as a blueish-green portal opened under his feet far to suddenly for the Shinobi to react. So Naruto fell into the portal without so much as a yelp leaving everyone totally unaware what had happened to him.

The journey through the portal had only lasted a second leaving falling through the air high above the ground, as the blond sped down ward he saw an utterly massive city spread before him on an island, unbeknownst to Naruto his trip through the portal had changed him leaving the shinobi at just two inches tall.

Naruto starts to panic as he draws closer to ground flailing his limbs trying to control his path.

Where does Naruto land?
1151.title: Eiken.

115332221.content:
Naruto was amazed at what a small mistake in hand seals and a large overuse of chakra could do to what was supposed to be a jutsu to summon the toads. Not to mention the fact that it was a jutsu he had done thousands of times before without incident. One wrong sign, and the a spike in the amount of chakra used, caused by someone sneaking up behind him at the last moment, and Naruto Uzumaki was sent spiraling through the space between the different universes. When he landed, it was a shock to find himself smaller than a mouse.

The large feet of those who were walking by caused his world to rock and shake. Everyone was in styles of clothing that he did not recognize, and Naruto could not identify any landmark that might tell him where he was. All he knew for sure was that every single giant around him was about his age, and were all wearing uniforms of some kind.

'Is this some kind of military academy?' he thought mistakenly, it was his first time experiencing a Japanese high school after all.

The only pieces of clothing he could kind of recognize, having seen similar during his training trip with Jiraiya, was worn by a black-haired, pigtailed boy and someone in a kendo uniform the former was beating into the ground.

Of course, all of this was happening at a much larger scale compared to him, so each blow that landed sounded like thunder to his tiny ears.

Naruto decided that enough was enough and chose to run away from this meeting place of titans, and turned to do so. Sprinting before he even had his head facing the right direction, he ran headlong into a foot with the all his leg strength, causing the foots owner to notice him.

The person he saw had
115332221.title: Ranma 1/2

choices: Long, violet hair, red eyes and a bubbly attitude, the gorgeous Shampoo
1153322212.content: Naruto looked up at a young woman with
1153322212.title: Someone else

choices: Black haired girl with a side ponytail and a gymnasts body
11533222122.content: Perhaps a black haired gymnast with a bit of a crazy personality?
11533222122.title: Kodachi?

choices: The room smelled like a restaurant, with clothes similar to TenTen’s
The room was full of cute stuff, and some dumbbells on the floor
115332221223.content:
Naruto cursed his luck as the just minutes before the ground had dropped out from under him with no explanation, sending him hurling through oblivion with no end in sight. At first, the ninja thought he had dropped dead from some sudden malady or enemy attack, but quickly ruled that out after biting his own tongue as he screamed at the thought of that. No, whatever was happening he was definitely alive, and since there didn’t seem to be anything in any direction he could only prepare himself for whenever he landed so he didn’t shatter his legs. This proved to be the right decision, as he was soon thrown from the strange limbo into his final destination, skidding and rolling until he stopped.

Once his eyes quit spinning in his skull, Naruto managed to get himself back on his feet and get a good a good look at where he had been regurgitated. His senses gathered a few things almost immediately that stood out to him. For one thing, his surroundings were gargantuan in size. He could see what appeared to be a bed that looked like his occupant could sleep on comfortably. He could see that he was now in the middle of an expansive floor in a room sized for titans. A theory further supported when he felt and heard what could only be described as the footsteps of a massive creature. He needed more info, and the rest of his senses went into overdrive to gather any stimuli that could help him. What he found however didn’t really help him.
115332221223.title: Somewhere in Nerima

115332222.content: May I recommend Tenchi Muyo?
115332222.title: More.

choices: A pair of giant brown breasts
In a forest of spiky cyan hair
1153322221.content:
Falling through a void was an experience that Naruto had never expected he would have. The omni-colored tunnel that surrounded him seemed endless, and was unsettling to look at for the teenage ninja. As the spiky-haired blond continued to pass through the vortex he could only wonder at what the hell happened.

*Earlier*

As best as he could remember, Naruto was heading home from his favorite ramen stand. It was a quiet night in Konoha, and there was almost no one left on the streets. The young man had eaten his fill and was now ready to return to his apartment, lie down, and go to sleep. Too bad he would never enter his apartment.

Naruto turned onto the street leading to his apartment complex when he fell into it. A swirling vortex appeared unseen beneath his feet, and the genin plummeted feet first into the abyss.

*Just before the fall, in another universe*

Life at the Masaki household had become dull since Tenchi had been taken on a visit to the Jurian homeworld. It was a trip he was meant to take alone, so, much to the girls' horror, they were left on Earth while the wielder of the light hawk wings was off world.

The the atmosphere in the household had become depressed and heavy. It was as if all energy had been drained from the occupants. A fact that was not lost on the greatest scientific genius in the universe, Washu.

The redheaded genius couldn't stand all the depression that seeped from the others, and took it upon herself to at least try and lighten the mood. The idea was simple, she would just give a little demonstration of her latest invention and fill the others with a sense of wonder that would take their thoughts off of Tenchi's absence, at least for a little while.

Washu gathered everyone in her lab and proudly presented her latest creation to the lovesick girls.

"Presenting the dimension spanner! A little device that allows the user to open gates to other worlds!"

It all would have gone off without a problem, if only Mihoshi hadn't been the first person to touch the device. With a bright flash of blinding light, the device activated.

*Back to Naruto falling through the dimensional hole*

After what seemed like hours to Naruto, there was a light at the end of the tunnel. Finally, the blond ninja finished his fall and landed in...
1153322221.title: It was all Mihoshi's fault

choices: Mihoshi starts to play around with him like he's a doll
Mihoshi places him on her desk for now, and goes to take a bath
Mihoshi quickly learns he is alive, though completely by accident
11533222211.content:
Naruto spiraled out of the hole which had swallowed him, taking him from his world, and was flung downwards towards his final destination. He was soon enveloped why a pleasant warmth that completely cut all light from his vision. He screams of shock were muffled by chocolate colored skin and body fat as he was pressed deeply into the generous bust of Mihoshi Kuramitsu. He was trapped by the giant masses and could barely move his fingers, much less escape from the tit flesh.

Ever the ditz, Mihoshi failed to notice anything out of place, or even that something landed in her valley of cleavage in the first place. She was too busy coughing up smoke from the sudden, and rather violent, short circuit of Washu's invention. Those group of women who had gathered in the redhead's laboratory were, one by one, picking themselves off the floor. Each of them were filthy with smoke and ash from the incident, and it was unanimously decided to call it quits for the day and adjourn to the giant bath. The blonde quickly left to collect a change of clothes and bathing supplies from her room, and jogged at a brisk pace out of the lab, her breasts swaying heavily with each footfall.

*****

Still stuck in breasts of the space detective, though he did not know it yet, Naruto struggled to free his hands from the firm grip that held them to his sides. He had no idea where he had landed, but it felt like he was caught in an earthquake unlike anything he had experienced before. He was flung about by his restraints and felt like he was about to expel his last meal with each powerful bounce.

*****

Mihoshi stumbled into her room and almost fell over her small desk in her attempt to quickly fetch her clothes. It was a fortuitous trip as her slip up jostled the tiny ninja in her breast valley and sent him sprawling across the wooden surface.

"Huh? What's this?" she asked as her bright blue eyes fell on the tiny form of Naruto. The young man had bumped his head against the solid wood and was currently too dazed to move or even make a noise. Mihoshi brought her face closer, her eyes inches from the mystery thing that had fallen on her desk. Unsure of what to make of it, the galaxy detective lifted him into her hand to get a good look at him.
11533222211.title: Knucklehead ninja meets airhead space detective

choices: Someone enters the room he had occupied
115332222112.content:
As she was examining the tiny ninja, a lock of her curly blonde hair fell before her eyes, and Mihoshi saw just how dirty she had gotten from the lab mishap. She let out a shout of embarrassment, and rushed to her dresser to grab a change of clothes, before she bolted out of the room, leaving Naruto alone on her desk.

Once the giant lady had left, and he was certain there was no one else nearby, Naruto slowly got back to his feet. His stomach had finally settled down, and he had regained his bearings enough to move without feeling like he would barf. He moved to the edge of the desk, and looked down to the floor below. It was a drop that would kill a normal person, but with his training it would be no problem for the Konoha ninja.

"Man, where the hell did I end up?" Naruto asked out loud, his eyes surveyed the room until he found a route out that would have the least chance of getting found. He had no way of knowing if that giant was friendly, and he wasn't about to find out first hand. No, he would have to keep to the shadows and observe until he could say for certain he wouldn't just be made into a meal or something worse by whatever lived in this strange place.

Naruto gathered himself, and officially began his exploration of his new surroundings.

*****

Far above the household where Naruto now found himself, outside the outer reaches of Earth's atmosphere, an odd vessel orbited the planet. The exterior, oddly enough, was constructed almost entirely of wood. Yet despite this choice of material, it was probably one of the most powerful ships in the galaxy. This was one of the Royal Tree ships of the planet Jurai, and its passengers were eagerly awaiting their arrival to the surface of the blue planet.

"Do you think the girls will be happy to see us?" asked a woman with long blue hair which was pulled back into a ponytail that reached past her knees.

"Oh, I'm sure they're rife with excitement since we let them know of our visit," replied a woman with regal bearing and long, straight black hair, a tiny smile on her lips.

The ship began its descent towards the little blue planet after it cloaked itself against detection from the primitive technology their destination possessed.

*****

After much exploration, and some close calls, Naruto had managed to find a room that was the ideal base of operations. It hadn't been an easy journey, and he had plenty of scares. The coco skinned giantess who had found him before had nearly stepped on him with her bare feet...twice. Then there was the weird rabbit/cat thing that was hopping around that had nearly found him multiple times. He needed some place to rest, and regain his energy, and this place was perfect.

The room appeared to be bare of any sign of being used. There was no personal effects anywhere, and the furniture was bare. If he had to guess, he would say this was a spare bedroom, and it was exactly what he needed. First thing he had to do was find a place to sleep, and preferably somewhere not on the floor, where ditzy feet could step on him. A quick climb later, and he was atop the bare dresser where he quickly flopped down and let himself drift to sleep.
115332222112.title: Mihoshi places him on her desk and leaves

1153322221121.content:
As Naruto slept in blissful ignorance, a pair of visitors arrived at the Masaki residence that would prove problematic for his plans. The arrived on the planet’s surface via a shortrange teleport, directly on a deck that bordered a lake. They strode towards the family home with a noble elegance that came from many years of diplomatic experience and etiquette.

“Come along sister, I want to see the girls as soon as possible!” said the cerulean haired one as she almost danced on her toes in anticipation. This woman was Misaki Masaki Jurai, second empress and mother of Ayeka and Sasami.

“Calm down Misaki, it won’t do if you break down the front door in your excitement,” answered her co-wife, Funaho Masaki Jurai, first empress of Jurai. The two of them shared a husband, the Emperor, and were as close as sisters if not more so, and now they were going to visit their family on Earth.

*****

Ryoko lounged in her bedroom, though in actuality it was a ceiling beam, a copy of shoujo manga that she had borrowed from Tenchi’s father’s library, and a cup of sake in the other. She was trying to take her mind off of the absence of the boy she loved, and had just began to enjoy herself when the doorbell chimed.

“Ryoko could you answer the door?” called Sasami from the kitchen. The young girl with twin pigtails was currently diligently preparing dinner for her mothers’ arrival.

Whether it was due to the slight buzz she had going from the amount of alcohol she had consumed, or the feeling of dejection from Tenchi being away, Ryoko had apparently forgotten who their visitors were. Either way, she regretted her memory lapse a few seconds after she opened the door and was bowled over by a hug tackle from Sasami’s mother.

“Sasami!” cried Misaki happily as her arms circled around Ryoko in a bone crushing hug. The air was driven out of the space pirate’s lungs with horrible speed. She tried to push the overly affectionate woman away, but could not even loosen what was now technically a choke hold even a bit. Luckily, the actual Sasami joined the three in the foyer.

“Mama!” Sasami called as she opened her arms ready to receive the inevitable, all consuming hug that was coming her way. Ryoko was casually thrown into the wall by the Juraian royal who darted towards her youngest daughter.

“Ugh…she has to be doing this on purpose…” grumbled the former space pirate, still pressed to the wall.

“Not even I can say for sure if she is or not,” Funaho replied as she went further inside the house, following Misaki and Sasami.

“I’m almost finished with dinner, so for now we can get your things placed into the guest bedroom. Please follow me.” Sasami happily stated, playing the hostess perfectly. The two followed behind, letting the precious girl show them to their room.

"This is your room for the tonight." Sasami declared proudly as she ushered them inside. The happiness radiated off her as if she was alight with it, brightening the room. She twirled about as she brought her mothers inside, giving them each one last hug. "I need to finish setting up for dinner. I'll call you when its ready, so please get comfortable."

Sasami practically skipped from the room, leaving the two empresses to their own devices while they unpacked a bit.

"Such a good girl," Misaki chuckled, a sentiment shared by Funaho, who shared in the laugh.

"Yes. I shudder to think how the rest of them would fare without her."

In a small flash of light, their luggage was transported down from the ship. A pair of intricately designed bags made out of the material more durable than anything their host planet was capable of producing faded into existence on the floor beside them. Chances were they could survive re-entry from upper orbit, hit the ground, and have nothing more than little bit of dirt on them to show for it. Misaki grabbed her bag, always eager to get started, and began searching it for the essentials for the night. Funaho, however, decided to go and greet the other occupants of the house.

"Misaki, I'm going to go say hello to everyone. Why don't you finish unpacking and join me after."

"Alright! Is there anything you want me to fetch from your bag?" Misaki asked, and got a polite no from her co-wife.

Once Funaho slipped out of the room, the energetic woman dug out her night gown and moved to place it on the bare dresser. As she did, her eyes caught sight of something tucked in the corner, where the furnishing met the wall. She leaned in to take a closer look, and saw what appeared to be a toy of some sort.

Curious, she reached down and picked it up before heading over to the bed to examine her discovery.

Sitting down, Misaki looked at the figure. It was clad in a slim, form fitting orange tracksuit outfit with black on the upper shoulders area and the color extending from around the neck and shoulders, down the front and sleeves, as well as around the waist, a white swirl on the left side, a red swirl crest on the back, orange pants, it's feet were covered by black sandals that covered the instep and ankles, yet left the toes and heels exposed.covering it's head was short, blond hair that stood up all over like the spines of a sea urchin, and a black headband with a metal plate attached to it that had the symbol of a spiral arrow engraved into it. It had some bandages on his thigh and a carrying case along with it and a small pouch on the back of the belt.

Squinting, the second empress of the planet Jurai was able to make out small, pencil-thin whisker-like markings on the face, three per cheek.

"How cute! And it even feels real!" Masaki smiled. She started twitching the figure's limbs, delighted when it moved. "It's poseable, too! Oh, this is just covering all bases, isn't it?" she gushed to herself. Continuing to manipulate the toy's body, she smiled, amused.

Holding the doll up to her face as it dangled between her forefinger and thumb, the woman perked up as a thought struck her and she beamed.

"Oh...I know just what to do with you, little dolly! You're coming home with Jurai with me! You'll love it there. I'll make sure you get loved on for the rest of your days, and I'll keep you with me forever for always and always and always till the end of time as my property!"

That decided, Misaki grabbed her luggage and opened it, "In you go, my darling dolly! You'll be nice and comfy-cozy in here. Now don't worry...mommy will take you out and love you to bits on the way back home. Now...time to tuck you in!"

With that, Misaki brought the doll to her lips and kissed it before placing it in with her belongings."Oh! You're so cute! I'm going to keep you no matter what!" That said, the royal closed her bag, trapping her prize within it.
1153322221121.title: Royally in trouble

choices: Misaki discovers her toy is alive
11533222211211.content:
It was hours later when Naruto awoke from his deep slumber. The rest had done him some good, as he felt his normal level of energy return and was eager to continue his exploration. He opened his eyes and was greeted by absolute darkness, unable to see more than a few inches in front of his face. Carefully, he rose to his feet, and immediately noticed that he was no longer in the spot where he had fallen asleep.

"What the hell? Where am I now?" He asked aloud to no one. After allowing his eyes to adjust it became very apparent that he now had a new problem to deal with. Now that he was able to see, his surroundings came into view, and they appeared to be neatly folded clothes, some of which Sakura would deck him for looking at. "Well...shit."

After he took a moment to keep himself from completely freaking out, Naruto squared his shoulders and followed his training. First, he had to find an exit, if there was one, and if not he would make one. With this mindset, he began to climb over the mountain of clothes that spread out before him.

*****

Misaki and Funaho returned to their provided room, bellies full as well as their spirits. Talking with the women of the Masaki home was always uplifting, especially since they got to spend time with Sasami and Ayeka. They had spent the the last eight hours catching up and enjoying quality time with their daughters and friends which had left them pleasantly tired and ready for bed.

The second empress of Jurai began to disrobe, exposing her perfectly toned body to slight chill of the night air. Her body was not that of a model, but rather closer to an athlete's, with shapely legs and flat stomach that had just a hint of muscle, an appropriate body for the person who was considered one of the strongest fighters on Jurai. With a casual grace, she slipped into her night clothes before heading towards the bedding prepared for her so graciously by her daughter.

Slipping under the covers of her futon, Misaki was soon joined by Funaho as she got into her own bed. It was regrettable that they could only spend the night and nothing more due to their busy schedules. That thought brought about a melancholy in her, but that was soon dispelled with the creak of the door.

Sasami entered, a pillow in her arms and Ryo-Ohki on her shoulder, and asked to join them for the night. A request that was fulfilled without question.

*****

After some exploration, Naruto came to the conclusion that he was now trapped inside a piece of baggage. His attempts to find a way to leave had turned up nothing, to his frustration. Even worse was the fact that when he found the boundary wall and tried to make his own way out proved to be a fools errand. No matter what he through at it the material held without so much as a scratch.

'Dammit! I need to get out of here and find a way home!' Naruto brooded, his eyes narrowed and hands clenched into fists as his last kunai chipped against the impossible strong wall. Exhausted, Naruto slumped into one of the pieces of clothing and chose to conserve what remained of his energy while he thought up a new plan.

He could tell that he something was outside his current prison from the muffled noises that seeped through. Besides that, the only sounds he heard were that of his own heartbeat and breathing, which soon lulled his weary mind to sleep.

*****

The morning arrived soon, and with it came the time for Misaki and Funaho's departure. The former gave a teary eyed goodbye to them, Sasami almost needing to be pried free of her mother's arms. As the group of women waved goodbye, the two empresses were transported aboard their ride home and departed towards space.

Once the two were back in the residential area of the ship, Misaki split from Funaho, and went to her lodgings. While it was always sad to part from her beloved daughters, she at least had the cute souvenir she had grabbed during her visit. She went to her luggage and reached a hand in to grab it.

*****

The sound of a locking mechanism coming undone awoke Naruto from is frustrated slumber. He opened his eyes, only to be met with a blinding light from above. Bracing himself, he used a hand to shade his vision, and caught a glimpse of what was coming.

'SHIT!' he screamed mentally, biting his tongue to keep from screaming and giving his location away to the giant outside. He shot to his feet as quickly as possible and tried to move away from the probing appendage. It closed in on him fast, but he managed to dodge the first grab by whiskers margin. His landing, however, was not so lucky, as he slipped on a piece of loose fabric and flopped onto his face just as the hand made another pass.

The giant fingers clasped him by the thigh, and began to haul him out of the bag. On reflex, Naruto tried to push against the grip keeping him trapped, and regretted it immediately after, as the speed that he moving went from careful to lightening quick, and he then found himself before a pair of ruby pink eyes.
11533222211211.title: Later when Naruto wakes up....

115332222112111.content:
Naruto started fearfully at the wide, pink red eyes iff the giant that had just grabbed him. His stomach lurched as she made a sharp turn and hopped over to a desk. Naruto was dropped onto the hard wooden surface were he sprawled out spread eagle. Panic raced through him as the giant eyes bore into him. The only thing he could do was try to play dead and hope she thought it was her imagination and he was just a toy.

This was an effort that failed as soon as he tried. The giantess gave him one hard prod with her finger with enough force that it felt like Sakura had gut punched him. His reflexes one again betrayed him as he double over with an audible grunt.

"I guess your not a toy after all," said the woman as she began to prod him again, lighter this time. "Little one, I am Misaki Masaki Jurai, and you have much to answer me about."

Naruto's eyes darted back and forth, in search of any escape route he could find, but only found all options blocked by the imposingly massive woman who sat before him. A pair of hands were within easy grabbing distance, so even if he tried to get away it would only end in recapture.

"Well, little man, I have some very pressing questions to ask you," the giant blue-haired beauty asked, her eyes narrowed as they stared down her nose at him. "First thing I want you to tell me is who you are. Can you do that for me?" Her intense gaze left no room for refusal, and the ninja boy complied.

"Um...uh...I'm Naruto Uzumaki...ma'am..." he managed to squeak out as he flinched back from the glare.

"Okay Naruto, would you mind telling me what you were doing in my daughters' home?" his captor asked in a sickeningly sweet voice, a voice which he had heard Sakura use many a time just before she drove him into the ground with a punch.

"I didn't know it was! I don't even know how I got there! Honest!" Naruto cried out as loudly as he could.

"I have a hard time believing that someone of your size just randomly shows up at the place where two princesses of Jurai are living. Now you are going to tell me the truth. Do you have accomplices? Were you sent there to case the house in a kidnapping attempt?" the giant woman pressed only for Naruto's denials to be met with more skepticism.

"Looks like we will have to take this a step further," she said ominously as she reached into a drawer and pulled something from it. She brought it down towards Naruto, and he shivered. It was a giant feather, and he knew exactly what it was going to be used for.

Seconds later, he was laughing uncontrollably as he answered her questions. Now he could only hope that she would believe him.
115332222112111.title: Misaki discovers her toy is alive

choices: "Just how much I think you look so adorable by having a cuddle session!"
1153322221121111.content:
As Naruto laughed, still besieged by the massive feather the woman welded, he managed to gasp something out, "...Ma'am...Ma'ma please...stop it!"

"I will when you tell me everything. Otherwise, the tickling will continue." Misaki said, although she was enjoying this.

"I did...please, I don't even know where this Jurai country even is. And seriously look at me, how could I do anything to your daughters with how small I am, if anything they're more likely just to step on me and not even notice!" Naruto protested between his laughing.

Misaki's eyes widened when she heard Naruto between laughing, 'Country?! This little guy thought Jurai was a...?!' Now it was Misaki who was laughing. That was too funny! She then set the feather down and let Naruto catch his breath, she was now looking him over and after a moment she placed a finger on her chin. "Hmm...I suppose you do have a point, you are far too itty-bitty to have done anything to my daughters, after all." Misaki said while thinking that Naruto was telling the truth, she had even imagined that both Ayeka and Sasami literally stepping on Naruto's body and continue to walk away not even noticing that the just stepped on him.

Naruto sighed, relieved that this giant beauty accepted that.

After the two had fully calmed down from the laughter, they both relaxed and began to talk to eachother about themselves Naruto told Misaki all about his adventures and missions he went on as a ninja for Konoha, as she listened to Naruto's story Misaki had cried when she heard about Naruto's childhood Misaki had grabbed Naruto and shoved him against her cheek and nearly drowned him in her tears as she cried, Mikaski was happy for Naruto when he told her that things had gotten better for him while he was at the academy as he made friends, then he told her about the various missions he went on during his shinobi carrier, Misaki didn't like the idea of having Naruto at such a young age risk his life in some of these missions, but at the sametime she understood that it comes with the job. But that doesn't mean that she has to like it in general.

After Naruto told her his story, Misaki began to tell him her's, Naruto was amazed to hear that Misaki has an enormous power inside her, he laughed when she told him about how she managed to outrun all of her nannies and babysitters as it reminded him of his days outrunning the jounin and even the anbu of the village when he was still an academy student, even mentioning that her nanny named Mama was the only one who was not afraid of watching over her, it made Naruto think of Iruka, who was the only chunin willing to put up with him and his pranks.

Naruto was then shocked about hearing that Jurai wasn't a country but in fact a whole planet altogether and that Misaki was also one of the queens of it to boot, Naruto was also shocked to hear that Misaki has to share a single husband with another woman, but then again there were members of the village who were allowed something simalier in the village too when he thought about it.

After Misaki finished telling Naruto her story Misaki then had an idea as she then gently lifted Naruto, "Hey, I just an idea Naruto, I think that I'll show you..."
1153322221121111.title: Misaki believes him

11533222211211113.content:
Naruto was pulled into a snuggle by the excitable Juraian, who lovingly rubbed him against her cheek. The warmth radiating from her skin caressed him gently, soothing his previous stress away. Her grip, while firm, was still comfortable enough that he didn't feel like he was being crushed, in fact, it was like a full body hug from her.

"You are just the cutest little thing," she cooed, and rubbed the top of his head with a finger. She couldn't help herself, it was in her nature to smother the cute things with as much love as she could, and seeing the tiny young man in that fit in the palm of her hand was almost irresistible to her.

Naruto blushed at the skinship she was sharing with him, even more so when she began to calmly stroke him with her finger. It was oddly relaxing, and he had begun to release the tension in his muscles. Everything was going nicely for the two, until Misaki caught a whiff of his building body odor.

*Sniff...sniff*

'Smells like you need a bath," Misaki giggled as she finally relented from cuddling, and held him before her eyes.

"Well, I haven't really had a chance to clean up since I wound up here." Naruto's cheeks were red, highlighting his whisker marks all the more, and earning him another nuzzle from Misaki.

"Let's get you to the bath then."

Riding in her palm, Naruto became one of the few lucky people outside of Jurai to see the inside of a Royal Tree ship. He was shocked to find out that the beautiful, tree-filled environment was actually a spaceship, and he couldn't quite grasp the explanation he was given by his hostess. What shocked him even more was the fact that there was a hot spring equipped with all the bathing necessities, and Misaki gave him a thimble to use as a bucket so that he could wash off before entering the water. She set him down next to the spring, promised him he would be safe from danger, and turned to leave.

Naruto decided to accept the kind hospitality and disrobed, placing his clothes aside, where they were taken away for cleaning by the ship's systems. He grabbed the thimble and moved towards the water.
11533222211211113.title: "Just how much I think you look so adorable...

choices: Mihoshi decides to listen later, and tucks him away somewhere
Wait, something changed with Mihoshi because of the explosion
115332222113.content:
The still dazed ninja felt like he would vomit up his lunch as the giant woman began to flip him around as she examined him. He could not get out a word as it felt like his stomach contents were pushed all the way to the back of his mouth and if he tried to speak it would all flood out like water from a burst dam. Another park of him was telling the Uzumaki boy to remain silent and hope to pass himself off as a doll, lest this behemoth hold malicious intent. There was a chance he could escape as long as the giantess didn't realize he was alive.

While Naruto was trying to play possum, or some facsimile thereof, Mihoshi continued her detailed inspection of the unidentified thing in front of her. Being a first class detective for the Galaxy Police, the wavy haired blond had possessed an almost unnatural intuition, though she may not be fully aware of it most of the time, which let her know when something was not quite right. That was when she began to get more thorough in her examination, and got a little more hands-on, in a very literal sense, as she extended her right forefinger.

The thick, bronze digit began to prod Naruto's midsection, forcing the air from his lungs. Thankfully he had managed to fight back his nausea moments before, but it didn't make it any less easier to keep himself from being discovered.

"Is this some kind of toy Ms. Washu made?" she asked as her finger trailed around his stomach and chest. The appendage wandered around Naruto's body aimlessly, as if she was giving trying to explore every bit of him, until it reached his crotch, where it gently stroked over his privates. He let out a noise that was part gasp, part moan, and part scream, which shattered the illusion of him being a lifeless doll into a million pieces.

"Oh, so you are alive!" came the surprised voice of the cocoa skinned giant as she brought him once more before her sparkling blue eyes.

Naruto knew he had blown it, just another reason why he was not suited for the stealthy missions like a more traditional ninja. Opening his eyes, he stared directly into her's and answered.

"Yeah, you caught me. Now maybe you can help me out." Naruto began.
115332222113.title: Mihoshi quickly learns he is alive

choices: Naruto is noticed by the cyan-haired woman who decides to catch or stomp him
Naruto ends up in the laboratory of a redhead woman (Washu) and she catches him
11533222212.content:
Landing on and rising from his back, Naruto took a brief examination of his surroundings, he was standing on something, a sort of cyan-colored tree that was soft to touch.Looking around, the ninja saw he was in a forest of the things and the ground he was on was a sort of peach color, like human skin. Looking around, Naruto's eyes widened when he looked up.

HUH?!

Instead of the sky, Naruto saw what looked like the ceiling of a house!

Naruto clawed at his scalp, Naruto then noticed something off with his hands and looked at them. That lead to noticing that his outfit had changed.

He was wearing a full bodysuit that was colored black and dark green combined with the main base color being the dark green. The colors merged in some places, while splitting off in others. On his back it was all dark green but nine red lines split and roamed all over while in the middle of his back between his shoulders was a mandala comprised of nine reddish-brown circles of varying sizes atop a larger green-grey circle , before somehow all nine or the red brown lines made it to his legs. He had on black tabi shoes made for Parkour and Freerunning, as black gloves, both the shoes and gloves were seamlessly made as part of the suit.

Ok...how the HELL did this happen?!

Naruto as the forest of spiky cyan things shifted suddenly and he fell over before it stopped suddenly and Naruto went wide-eyed. That didn't feel the way an earthquake did. Rushing north, Naruto froze as what he saw as the forest he was on abruptly ended..and that the cyan things were no forest!

He was on the top of a woman's head! But she wasn't just any woman, he could tell. She had power, a lot of it, and that kinda scared him. But then he looked past that and saw a woman that blew Sakura out of the park, hell, the damn whole stadium and beyond. She wore a pink dress that was over a green kimono top. In a way, it resembled something he saw that Tenten girl wore. He could tell it was a dress that was for battle as well as everyday uses. But what got him was her unique hair, spiked backwards, cyan in color. Her ears almost like an elf, if he remembered the description of their ears, only it was rounded at the end. Her face was really beautiful and her eyes were yellow in color. When he squinted his eyes to look closer, he saw they were slitted, much like a cat's.

She was looking in a mirror and that also caused Naruto to catch sight of himself. His fingernails had become sharp, pointed claws on both his hands. His lips were jet black in color, while as for his hair, it was in spikes that stuck up in every direction like the spines of a sea urchin and was dark purple in color. His canines were longer and sharper, making them fangs. His eye shape was more vulpine than normal and had dark circles under his eyes, his eyes themselves were bright crimson red with an animistic black slit for the pupil. His ears were tempered and pointed like those of an elf ever so slightly. And as a final touch, his whisker marks had widened and become more defined and pronounced, widening and darkening until they resembled feral-looking abysmal scars.

His jaw dropped and he went red in the face. WHO was THIS?! And what the HELL HAD HAPPENED TO HIM!

Naruto was brought out of his musings as a shadow fell over him and he looked over his shoulder and gasped to see a giant hand coming at him. Yelping, Naruto jumped off and landed on the woman's shoulder. Thanking that it was so puffy.

"Huh?" Naruto heard a pretty, if loud, voice say. Seemed the woman had noticed him so Naruto leapt down and landed on the couch of the gigantic home. Best to AVOID being mistaken as a bug, after all. He wasn't ready to die...and being stepped on or smashed with a magazine or something was way too embarrassing a way to go. Looking around, he knew he had to get someone's attention and help. If not, he knew he was in trouble...that much was obvious. Using chakra, Naruto walked down the couch and leapt lightly to the floor once he was close enough.

Ok...where to go now? Naruto needed to explore this place and avoid any giants and/or giantesses that were around...find out where he was and how he'd gotten here. Most importantly, finding out how he'd shrunk and (hopefully) find a way back to normal!
11533222212.title: Where be this?

choices: Washu bursts in, with a device designed to track Naruto, she needs to study him
Ryoko and Naruto are left alone to "play"
115332222121.content:
Although her pain threshold was through the roof, Ryoko's hair and skin were actually very sensitive. It needed to be to properly fly and use her powers, as many factors had to be taken into account when using them. As such, the feeling of Naruto's hands and feet on her scalp and hair alerted the alien powerhouse to his presence.

When the feeling moved from her head to her shoulder, her hand followed. When when whatever it was fell from her, Ryoko turned to see what had been on her body. Seeing that the couch was directly behind her, in the direction she felt the mystery thing slide in, she noticed a small, moving form on one of the seat cushions. She leaned forward to take a closer look.

At first, Ryoko thought it was some sort of strange Earth bug, but then she noticed that it only had four limbs and appeared to be wearing some type of clothing. If she didn't know better, she would swear it was a tiny human, and that peaked her interest.

"Well, well," she began, her natural mischievousness surfacing, "what do we have here?" Her hand descended down to capture him. Her thumb and forefinger pinched him around his waist, and Naruto soon found himself face to giant face with the woman he had previously been standing on. "What were you doing messing up my hair, little guy?" she said in a playfully manner.

One of her giant fingers poked Naruto stiffly in the stomach, forcing the air from his lungs.

"You know, you're kind of cute, and I am bored without Tenchi around. How about I play with you, little guy?"
115332222121.title: Naruto is noticed by Ryoko

choices: Naruto is subjected to Washu's tests and experiments!
1153322221211.content:
Naruto gasped after having her poking him force the air from his lungs. Looking up at this woman and hearing what she said, he instantly started to struggle, he didn't want to find out what this woman meant by 'playing'!

Fortunately, something caught the woman's attention as a door suddenly burst open and a redhead rushed into the room.

"Washu!?" Ryoko shouted, "What's the deal?!"

The red-headed genius stopped and turned to Ryoko, looking so excited that she seemed like she explode from it.

"The dimension spanner! I knew I made device to allow the user to open gates to other worlds. But THIS?! Something actually came THROUGH! Something from another dimension! WHERE IS IT?! I NEED to study it!"

Ryoko went pale at that. Washu, while undeniably brilliant, had a tendency to go overboard when she was conducting experiments. No telling what would happen.

"Uh...what are you looking for and how do you intend to find it?" Ryoko asked. 'I want to be far away when you do find this...whatever-it-is!' the semi-reformed space pirate thought.

Washu held up a hand-held device in her hand, beaming. "This scanner picks up on space-time radiation, so whatever came from that other dimension must be glowing with it since it passed from one reality to another! As for what I'm looking for, I don't know yet! That's part of what makes it so exciting!"

Suddenly, Washu's scanner went nuts beeping and lighting up. Washu held it to her nose, eyes shining. "It's close! I'm practically on top of it!"

Ryoko backed up, gulping. Ground zero was right there in the room with them?! But what could be that crazy...even with what NORMALLY happened in the Masaki household!?

Naruto, seeing the two admittedly attractive ladies talking with one another, decided to put this distraction...as well as his fangs...to use. He was gonna pay for this later, but found it hard to care just then.

CHOMP!

"YEOW!" Ryoko shouted, letting him go and waving her hand that he'd just bitten, damn little bastard had a good set of chompers for such a small guy.

Naruto was surprised when, rather than dropping to the ground after the Cyan-head had released him, he was actually hovering in mid-air at the height of where he was being held at before. "What in the hell...?!" he shouted. Then noticed his error: he'd drawn the attention of both the giant beauties to himself.

Washu looked first at the strange incest, then her scanner and back again a few times. "BINGO!"

Swiping at it, she firmly grasped it in her hand and rushed back into her inter-dimensional laboratory in the closet of the Masaki house, leaving Ryoko standing there, gawking. No way...that little guy was who Washu was after? As mad as she was over the bite, he must've panicked at the thought of being Washu's guinea pig and wanted to get away from her...ANYONE could understand that!

===


Inside her lab, Washu was ecstatic as she looked at the pinned-down being, tapped in a spread-eagle fashion to a dissection pan. She'd already used a magnification device to expose he was a human-like being wearing a full bodysuit that was colored black and dark green combined with the main base color being the dark green. The colors merged in some places, while splitting off in others. On his back it was all dark green but nine red lines split and roamed all over while in the middle of his back between his shoulders was a mandala comprised of nine reddish-brown circles of varying sizes atop a larger green-grey circle , before somehow all nine or the red brown lines made it to his legs. He had on black tabi shoes made for Parkour and Freerunning, as black gloves, both the shoes and gloves were seamlessly made as part of the suit.

His fingernails under the suit were sharp, pointed claws on both his hands. His lips were jet black in color, while as for his hair, it was in spikes that stuck up in every direction like the spines of a sea urchin and was dark plum in color. His canines were longer and sharper, making them fangs. His eye shape was vulpine and had dark circles under his eyes, his eyes themselves were bright crimson red with an animistic black slit for the pupil. His ears were tempered and pointed like those of an elf ever so slightly. And as a final touch, he had defined and pronounced, widened and darkened feral-looking abysmal scars on his cheeks.

After running an initial scan on him, Washu discovered he had a set of pathways similar to a blood circulation system going through his body that was transmitting energy throughout his body and a secondary, crimson energy was focused on where his navel was, and was seemingly in the process of merging with the blue energy in her subject's body. Also, it seemed that being exposed to Ryoko after the dimensional transportation had caused the residual dimensional radiation to mix with Ryoko's own energy and that in turn bonded with his cells and granted him powers like Ryoko had, as well as using her connection to the gems on the Tenchi-kin sword to also grant him the powers or the Juraian master key, such as the ability to control most royal tree-ships and call upon the power of the Light Hawk Wings. And all of that added onto what he could already do!

It was all so fascinating! Washu couldn't decide what experiment to conduct on him first!

Naruto shuttered as Washu's face came much, much closer to him. As soon as she stopped, it was like her face had become the sky to him. She was well over a mile long to him, and her face itself was bigger than two football stadiums put together. She grinned at him as her face loomed over him.

"Don't worry...I'll try hard not to conduct anything on you that might kill you. You're the first chance to study a being from another reality that I've ever had!" she said.

Naruto went pale and started to struggle fruitlessly at that. He didn't want to be some labrat!
1153322221211.title: Washu's subject

choices: Time to take some "fluid" samples from her guinea pig
Test Naruto's invulnerability.  Does he still feel pain?
11533222212111.content:
There was no saving Naruto from the experiments of Washu. She had secured her lab and made it impossible for any outsider to enter without her consent, phasing ability or not.

She started with the basic tests, taking measurements on his size. He was only around three inches tall relative to her. He was clearly humanoid, but the size scale he was at was vastly different than her own dimension's. It was here goal to see if this difference in size would lead to any major differences in his physiology. Was his skeleton the same? Were his muscles denser? She had to know!

Before long, various sensors and wires were attached to the young ninja's body, and every move he made was monitored and recorded for later analysis.

"Fascinating!" Washu exclaimed, her fingers racing across multiple keyboards as more and more information poured into her database. Each bit of data was cataloged and archived for later reference, while the more pertinent data was examined immediately. Soon, the genius scientist and number one mind in the galaxy had almost all that she needed to go on to draw some conclusions.

"You really are quite fascinating, my little guinea pig. While your body is very similar to what a human body would be if it was scaled down to your size, there are some key differences. Specifically, your internal energy network is something I would love to get a better reading on, but that can wait for later." Washu advanced through the presented data, when a certain piece of information caught her eye. "Huh," she said, before a smile broke out onto her face, "it seems that there have been some residual effects of the dimensional travel. It appears that due to some of the unique energies created by the dimension spanner have caused your physical form to become rather indestructible. You could be run over by a car, and would walk away fine."

Naruto wasn't quite aware of what was being said, his attention was still on the fact that he was staring at a woman who's foot towered over him.

"Well, putting that aside, I think it's time to get on with the examination," Washu stated with glee.
11533222212111.title: Washu's tests on little Naruto commence

choices: The machine worked! But Naruto is about the height of a newly born baby
Mihoshi comes in and ruins everything, Oh! There's a big surprise!!!
115332222121111.content:
Washu then suddenly moved her foot away from Naruto and then bent down and grabbed Naruto with a mischievous grin on her face that made Naruto pale as he could tell that she had plans for him that he REALLY didn't want to be apart of, "Well, how about we start with me taking some "Fluid" samples for my research, how's that sound to you my little guinea pig?", Washu asked Naruto with a little too happy tone in her voice at which the shrunken Uzumaki paled as he may not be the sharpest kunai in the pouch, but from how this colossal sized woman said that she wants to take some "Fluid samples from him, Naruto paled at what she meant by that and attempted to break free from her grasp, but she was way too strong for the blonde Uzumaki.

However, just as Washu was about to get started on her "fluid sample" extraction, she then realized that her "little guinea pig" was WAY to small for her to extract the samples, now being the greatest scientific genius in the universe, Washu could simply make a device similar to what she has already to extract the fluid samples from her new "guinea pig" but she thought that would be boring, besides where would the challenge be if she made a a smaller version of an existing model?

No, Washu's "fluid sample" poaching would have to wait, right now she had an idea of how to restore her cute "little blonde guinea pig" to his full height from his dimension, however no one will know just how tall will this boy be when restored to his dimension's standards, but what's science without taking some risks, so with this thought in mind, Washu then looked down at her "little guinea pig" and placed him inside a small cup and placed a book on top of it thus sealing the tiny Uzumaki in it, "Now don't go away my little guinea pig, I'm just going to make something that will help you with you height problem and I'll be back in a flash, there's enough air in that cup for about an hour, I'll need only ten minutes, fifteen tops to make my invention..."

With that, the colossal sized woman left Naruto alone as he soon heard sounds of something being constructed, while Washu was away from him, Naruto attempted to try and escape his prison, but seeing as even if he could make it to the top of the jar he couldn't get the book off the jar so he was stuck in this jar and decided to try to see what this giantess of a woman was making to possibly help him get to his normal height.

As promised, Naruto saw that the giantess was finished with making whatever she was making as she then made it back to the cup and removed the book and grabbed Naruto from the jar and held him in her hand as she showed Naruto her invention.

The machine in question, looked like somekind of manufacturing machine, as on one end of it had a treadmill leading into a large metallic box with a control panel with various buttons and levers and it also had a large computer screen for apparently Washu to make sure that everything will go according to her plan in the middle of the machine and on the other side of the machine was where Naruto would apparently would come out when everything was fully done. It looked so simple, but when it comes to Washu, it's much more than simple...

"Like it my little guinea pig? This is a dimensional growth machine! this machine is 100% guaranteed to make you into your correct height by your universe's standards, but only in our universe's standards and it can even go in reverse! I'm an absolute genius!!!!", Washu said with pride clear in her voice, until she saw smoke literally coming from Naruto's ears and he had swirls in his eyes as he was trying to understand the words that came out of her mouth.

With a loud sigh, Washu then held Naruto closer to her face, "I put you inside this machine and you grow...", Washu said with a strained tone in her voice as she also had a face that clearly said that Naruto can NOT be this clueless.

Deciding just to start the machine, Washu then places Naruto onto the "Entrance" side of the machine Washu then went to the middle of the machine and began typing in the codes for the machine to get started and when she finished, Washu looked at the tiny Uzumaki, "This is it my little guinea pig... Are you ready?", Washu asked Naruto, but not waiting for his answer Washu then finished entering the code for the machine to start the process and she was just about to press the button to start the machine and as she pressed the button the machine activated as she watched the treadmill take Naruto into the metallic box chamber and began it's job and just when the middle part was about halfway done Washu waited on the other side eager to see the result until...
115332222121111.title: Time to take some "fluid" samples from ...

1153322221212.content:
Ryoko's finger prodded Naruto absent-mindedly as she thought of what she should do first with her little discovery.

"We are going to have so much fun together, little guy. There are so many games we could play. Like hide and seek for instance. Can you imagine, you scurrying along on the floor trying to hide from me? Or you could wrestle my foot," Ryoko said, and held Naruto just above her foot, after she quickly removed her footwear, and flexed her toes in a menacing tease. "The feeling of you writhing beneath my sole as you fight to defeat my foot, only to be squeezed between my toes..."

Naruto cringed at her description, and renewed his efforts to break free.

"Don't like that idea, huh? Well it's not like you get a say anyway. But maybe you'd prefer a game of cat and mouse. I would give you a ten second head start, and then start chasing you around the room while you try to get away."

Naruto's struggles increased tenfold, as the thought of staying with this woman got worse with each passing second. He did not want to become her plaything for any stretch of time. He was a ninja damn it!

"Now what should we do?"

At the feet of one of the outer senshi
Near one of the villains of the series
11533222221.content:
'Fucking portals!' Naruto Uzumaki cursed to himself as he hurtled through a seemingly infinite abyss. It was just his luck that he would happen to fall into some shimmering vortex right outside his apartment door on his way home from a night of stuffing his face with ramen in celebration of a job well done on his last mission. Now he was falling through nothingness with not so much as mote of light to break through the darkness.

'Am I just going to keep falling forever?' Naruto asked himself, long since bored with the void in which he found himself, the only comfort afforded to him was the presence of breathable air. That was, until a light appeared below him, and drew closer by the minute, and eventually enveloped his body in a blinding flash.

'Where the hell am I going?!' Naruto screamed internally.

choices: Naruto wakes up to stern faced girls who suspect him of spying
Naruto wakes up to someone checking him for injuries
1153322222112.content:
Naruto plummeted straight down as he came out the other end of the portal that had swallowed him so suddenly. If not for his physical conditioning the landing would have most likely shattered his legs, but he managed to roll as he landed, distributing the shock along his body enough to ward off injury.

An expansive wooden floor, with planks larger than any he had ever seen, spread out in all directions. Wherever he was, it was cavernous, with a ceiling that seemed to be hundreds of feet above him.

'This place is stupidly big,' Naruto thought offhandedly. Nothing seemed familiar to him, and all he could say for sure was the smell in the air was similar to some of the shrines that he visited on occasion, especially during festivals, the faint remnants of burning incense in the air.

Naruto would have examined the area more if not for a sound like thunder roaring around him. His eyes darted around reflexively as fight or flight took over for a moment, and the next booming noise sounded even closer. The ninja spun on his heels just in time to catch sight of a giant bare sole crashing down on top of him, his head pinned between toes almost as big as him. The air was driven from his lungs, and the toes swallowed his head, depriving him of any air until he eventually lost consciousness.

11533222222.title: Uzumaki and Gremory, then?

choices: Someone finds Naruto during his freak out.
115332222221.content:
In the peaceful leaf village home of Naruto Uzumaki the world's most unpredictable Shinobi, the young man in question was simply lazing around his apartment on his day off being nearly bored to death.

"Gahh! There's nothing to do why can't something interesting happen damnit!"

Naruto should have known not to utter those words for the universe would most certainly provide.

With out warning a glowing green portal opened beneath the blond male sucking him into it without disturbing the bed he was laying on, it wouldn't be until the next day anyone realized that he was missing.

Meanwhile in the portal Naruto was screaming and flapping his arms around trying to, and failing, control his decent through the strange surroundings.

He fell out of the other side of the portal only to impact the ground head first, after his head had stopped ringing the teen looked around to see if where he had landed was familiar only for his eyes to pop out of his head.

He seemed to be in a park near dusk when the lamps were just coming on, the thing that caused Naruto's reaction was that EVERYTHING was gigantic in comparison to him including the grass which came up to his waist.

"WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED!" yelled Naruto as he began his freak out.
115332222221.title: Off to enroll in Kuoh Academy

choices: At Kuoh Academy, the Occult Research Club room...
1153322222211.content:
As Naruto panicked, trying to make sense of what happened. The ground shook and a series of vibrating booms traveled through the ground and knocked him flat on his back, leaving him shocked as a giant person stopped in front of him. Making his eyes widen.

It was young woman that appeared to be in her late teens, same as him, with light skin, blue-green eyes and a buxom figure. Her most distinctive feature was her long, crimson red hair that reached down to her thighs, with a single hair strand, an ahoge, sticking out from the top. Her hair also had loose bangs covering her forehead and side bangs framing her face.

She wore an outfit which consisted of a white long-sleeved, button-down shirt with a black ribbon on her shirt collar worn under a black shoulder cape and a matching button-down corset, a magenta skirt with white accents, and brown dress shoes over white crew-length socks.

Naruto felt his jaw drop and heat flooded his cheeks.

Here he was at...he didn't know how small...with a VERY attractive girl in front of him. What was better (or worse) was that she was a redhead!

Curse his father's blood! If that theory of guys liking women who were similar to their mothers was true, it would easily explain why he had a weakness for redheaded women!

Not only that, but looking at her, Naruto felt Kurama's chakra inside him start to stir...like this girl's presence was causing a reaction. But why? How? He didn't understand.

The girl looked around her like she was looking for something, frowning with a troubled expression on her face. She sighed, tucking her chin to her collar with her eyes shut. When she opened them, she had yet to raise her head, as they opened, they seemed to lock onto the different color he presented--a small blot of orange and black topped with bright yellow--against the green of the grass around him and her eyes widened, then it turned to a look of shock mixed in with as if she were thinking of a million things at once. Carefully kneeling down onto her hands and knees, she brought her face close to him. Naruto shuddered involuntarily, finding it frightening that he could see his whole body reflected in those blue-green eyes of hers.

She noticed that, and reached a hand towards him, palm up. She stopped short of actually touching him, though. It took a few moments She was letting him have a choice as to pick if she was going to hold him.

Naruto sighed, letting out a shaky breath of relief he hadn't know he had been holding.

Finding that if she were like this, he might get some answers and PRAYING that this wasn't a mistake, the orange-and-black wearing, reduced blond tentatively pulled himself up onto the girl's hand and moved until he was in the center of her palm before sitting down. Cupping her fingers to guard him from the kinetic energy-generated wind that happened as a result, she stood up, looking at Naruto as she brought her hand to her face.

"Hello there." she said softly, keeping her voice down so her voice wouldn't hurt his ears.

Naruto waved, smiling nervously. So far, so good...

"I'm Rias Gremory." she said, smiling kindly, yet her eyes still held a spark of curiosity as she studied him. "What's your name?" she asked him, then brought the hand he was in over to her ear, brushing her long hair behind it so it wouldn't get in his way.

Naruto blinked, taken aback. Well...looked like he lucked out, being found by this Rias girl. But why was she acting this way? Far as he could tell, she was a civilian. Since when did civvies react like THIS? He walked over and stopped right at the threshold to the crimson-headed female's auditory system.

"Um...My name's Naruto Uzumaki. Uh...thanks for being nice about this and not freaking out...but why are you taking this so well?" he asked, his voice echoing through the fleshy cavern, "Er...not that I'm complaining or anything! It's just...you act like you're..."

"Use to seeing things like this?" Rias supplied helpfully, finishing what he was going to say. "That's because I am. Small size isn't the weirdest thing I've ever seen. When I noticed the summoning circle, I came to investigate. You see, this place--this whole area--is the Gremory family territory, roughly 1300 kilometers long and ranges from 50 to 230 kilometres wide, and its total area is 230,500 kilometers."

Naruto's jaw dropped, "Damn..." he said at last, impressed. So this girl was a noble from the sound of it, considering how much land her family had.

Rias laughed, "I can tell you're surprised. Now...what happened? Who summoned you?"

Naruto sputtered at that. Stunned. "So...so...summoned me?! What?!"

"You didn't know you were summoned?" Rias said, frowning.

Naruto shook his head, "No, I was just minding my own business at my apartment on my day off, nearly bored to death from having too much time on my hands and nothing to do with it, then this glowing green portal or whatever opens up beneath me, I get sucked in into it, and the next thing I know, I end up here in the land of the giants!"

Rias brought her hand back in front of her face, studying the one on it...Naruto, he'd said his name was...with a thoughtful frown. Land of the giants? Portal must have done something to shrink him if he was making a comment like that. And an unnotified summoning? That was troubling.

"Blotched summon shrank you...Two inches tall from the looks of you..." she murmured, eyeing him.

"WHAT?!" Naruto shouted, his legs giving out beneath him and he fell down onto the warm skin under him. Rias raised an eyebrow. Impressive set of lungs. This close to her face or no, she'd heard that as if he was his normal size.

Naruto was brought out of his shock as he lightly pet him on the head, pushing his spiky locks down. Looking up, he saw Rias was the one doing it with her soft, smooth, fingers. Her eyes and expression was sympathetic.

"Don't worry, you're safe now. I'll help you and we'll find out what happened and how to fix things." she said softly.

Naruto sighed, feeling he could trust this girl. Besides, he NEEDED help right now.

"Alright, I'll trust you,Rias," he said, "one last question though: how do you know all this stuff, no offense, but you don't look the type." Naruto said, she didn't seem to be a kunoichi.

Far from being offended, the redhead smiled, "That's easy," Rias said, walking away with Naruto in her hand. "I'm a devil, can't you tell?

Naruto paled. SAY WHAT?!
1153322222211.title: Naruto & Rias: Orange meets Red

Naruto was landed softly on something he could not identify. He fumbled back to his feet quickly after he climbed out of the small crater made in the soft material he fell into. Still winded from the impact, but able to stand, the Konoha shinobi took stock of his situation, and came to the conclusion that he might be dreaming.

Spread out upon the landscape, which he now found to be a gigantic bedspread, was giant woman with dark skin, long, pointed ears, and silver hair. He took a step back, awed by the sheer size of the almost human creature who was so large he was absolutely insignificant in comparison. This was a dangerous situation, especially when he considered all the other times he came upon giant beasts. He could be eaten, crushed, or made into some kind of toy if he wasn't careful.

A comparatively loud groan from the sleeping woman put him on edge, and when its body began to shift, sending tremors along the bed, and he worried it was about to awaken. His fears were confirmed when the large, emerald eyes opened slowly, and the beastly girl sat up with a stretch.

When the giant began to sniff the air, Naruto flinched and took a step back. If her appearance was anything to go on, there was a chance he may be found before he was ready. The sniffing deepened, and her eyes narrowed in thought. The ninja decided that it was better if he was to evade detection for now, and moved to take cover.

11533222222222222211231.content:
'Never gonna experiment with summoning jutsu again...' Naruto thought bitterly. Overestimating his abilities, the Konoha ninja had tried to duplicate the fourth Hokage's special jutsu, only to find that it was not a good idea to mess with space time ninjutsu he was unfamiliar with. Now he was spinning uncontrollably into the infinite expanse of nothingness that he now found himself.

He thought he would float in the void until he died from dehydration, but then a miracle occurred, a disturbing, cheesy, nauseatingly corny miracle. The darkness transformed into a painful shade of pink, and the spiraling nexus of black changed into a heart shape, with little bubbly hearts popping up everywhere. It was sickening to look at, and it made Naruto crave for the darkness he had been in to return once more. Luckily enough for the ninja it was not long before he was sent flying out of the neon pink nightmare and into his destination.

Twin orbs of warm softness proved to be a suitable landing spot for the ninja, though the owner of said padding may prove to be a problem for him.
