115332222222222222112312.content:
It took a few minutes for his landing pad to cease jiggling, but when it did, Naruto tried to reorient himself and see where he had been plopped into so unceremoniously. With a grunt, he tried to dig himself free, having sunk far into the mystery ground. It wasn't easy going, as each bit of progress was met with a small slip and he would have to get back to where he had been, but his salvation finally came in the form of a tremendously large gloved hand, which picked him up and removed him from his predicament.

"Hmm? What's this?" a somewhat cute sounding voice said as he was lifted to a giant pair of eyes.

*****

Brianne de Chateau had just finished dealing some people who had offended her, and now, in her Ribrianne form, had left for home. Following the Tournament of power, she had been filled with the need to strengthen her power of love. When she lost to the woman from Universe 7 she had taken to re-examining love and its various forms to better understand herself and why she fought.

She finally arrived home and made a b-line for her bedroom, exhausted from her day. Not even bothering to de-transform, she flopped back onto her mattress and stared at the ceiling. She just wanted to sleep, and nothing would have stopped her from doing so if not for the sudden appearance of a swirling pink vortex of lovely hearts that dropped something directly onto her chest.

The fatty tissue of her transformed stated wobbled wildly at the sudden intrusion but settled down after some time. Ribrianne was not in the mood to deal with the unexpected, but seeing as it landed in a rather intimate spot, she had no other choice but to dive her hand in after it.

What she pulled free from her cleavage was a tiny man, just small enough to fit in the palm of her hand.

"Hmm? What's this?" she muttered cutely as she pulled him in for a closer look. While he could certainly be considered a cute guy, something that his size only helped, she didn't know if she could trust him or not. She had, after all, seen some strange fighters at the tournament, and even ones of stature similar to this, and this guy could just be a perv looking to feel her up.

"Hey can you understand me?" came a cry from the tiny man. "Can you help me out?" he asked nervously. The way he was looking at her form of absolute beauty was not doing him any favor either.
115332222222222222112312.title: Ribrianne

choices: Brianne takes Naruto to meet Rozie and Kakunsa
Brianne decides to train with Naruto in her Ribrianne form
1153322222222222221123122.content:
Naruto stared at the person he'd ended up with. From the outfit and voice, they were female, but no female he'd ever seen. Her physique was near-spherically rotund and her skin was teal. She wore a sleeveless red and green dress with a very thick petticoat underneath it, yellow gloves and boots, and a rubber cap with an antenna-like protrusion.

It was...shocking...to say the least.

Still...no matter how stunned he was by her appearance, Naruto NEEDED help if he was going to figure out where he was and how to get home. That fact in mind, he spoke up.

"Hey, can you understand me?" came a cry from the tiny man. "Can you help me out?" he asked nervously. Then for good measure, bowed his head. But when he did that, he ended up looking down at where he had been fished out of. Seeing where he'd been located, he went red before paling rapidly. OH CRAP! He was in trouble! He'd landed between her breasts?!

After hearing him sputter out apology after apology to her, Ribrianne rolled her eyes and had to lightly squeeze him to make him stop.

"Well, if you're really sorry, how and why did you end up there?" She frowned. She was fully prepared to punish him if he was a pervert, but his reaction didn't seem like one.

"Experimenting with one of my techniques and it backfired...sent me here...I'msoSORRY!"

Ribrianne blinked, then nodded. That made some sense, would explain the sudden appearance of the swirling pink vortex of lovely hearts that dropped him here, at least. She knew about transportation-based abilities like Instant Transmission being out there, after all.

"And you are...?" she asked.

"Oh, right...sorry...I'm Naruto Uzumaki." he said, recalling it was polite to give your name before asking someone else's.

Nodding while de-powering to her base form of Brianne de Chateau, she saw the little one's eyes widen as she became a slender young human woman with shoulder length green hair with an orange hairband with two pink gems with a white case outlining them on both ends and a pink dress with a white collar. She also wore a white belt, black leggings, and pink high heel shoes.

"My name's Brianne de Chateau, but I also go by Ribrianne. Nice to meet you."

Naruto stared with as the giant woman introduced herself. The sight of her...transformation...was certainly odd. He had never seen pink heart-shaped energy and the gap between her current form and what she had looked like before was not something he would soon forget, but that was just another reason he had to get as much information as he could from her.

"What was with that transformation? Which one is your normal form? Do you have other powers?" Naruto asked.

"Well, I can transform into a magical girl who can draw power from the love of others. This," she indicated her current state, "would be my normal form, but I can change into that super powered beauty you saw before. I can also gather the love of others, and with enough of it I can change to an even more powerful form."

"Wow," Naruto declared as he still wondered if 'beautiful' was the proper term for her other form, but he'd heard the saying beauty was in the eye of the beholder, "you must be incredibly powerful in that state." He complimented.

"I used to think that too before the Tournament," Brianne muttered sadly.

"Tournament? What kinda tournament?" Naruto asked as he noticed the drop in her mood.

"The Tournament of Power! It was a giant multi-universal battle royal that pitted our universe's best fighters against those of the other universes. It was there that I discovered the limits of what I thought to be the power of love."

"What happened?" the little ninja pressed.

Brianne divulged the details of her final stint in the tournament against the blonde woman from Universe 7. How that one fighter's love for her husband overpowered the love she had received from her entire team, and how it had caused her to question herself. It was a lot to absorb for the tiny ninja, as he was already having trouble with the fact that he was in a different world, let alone that were multiple universes that coexisted with it, but he did not let that deter him from lending an ear.

"So how about you?" Brianne asked after she finished her tale. "What is your home like? What about your parents?" The second question caused Naruto to flinch, a reaction that Brianne did not miss. "Is something wrong?" she questioned.

"Because of some...issues...during my birth, I lost both my mom and my dad."

At that, the maiden gasped, struck with the horrific realization that he was orphaned at a young age. "I'm sorry!" Brianne cried, truly apologetic that she had no doubt drawn up some deeply traumatic memories.

Naruto merely shrugged, "You didn't know and besides, I made my peace with it. I didn't have the best of childhoods, but it shaped me into who I am. Plus I know that my parents truly loved me to their dying breath, and that's all I need to know. I didn't have the best of childhoods. Growing up people would either treat me like I didn't exist or like I was some nuisance that they had to deal with, because they had no choice. Nobody told me why and whenever I asked the leader of our village why, he'd just dodge the question, telling me they needed time." Naruto said. Just because he had come to terms with his past didn't make it any less shitty.

Meanwhile the green haired girl could only feel both anger and sadness. Anger that not only was someone treated like he didn't and shouldn't exist, but equally angry that no one told him why. To just leave him, a child no less, in the dark like that was cruel. It was for those same reasons she was saddened, to hear how a child was left alone. Nobody to care for him, nobody to tell him he was loved.

"I wasn't abused, psychically at least. Wasn't till I was thirteen that I found out why I was treated so differently. It wasn't for another three years that I found out why no one was allowed to touch me."

That did raise some questions. He was never harmed physically? If others so despised his existence what stopped them from taking out their disgust and aggression on him?

"When I turned sixteen, my godfather told me that my village's leader had ordered that no one harm me and he had an almost round the clock guard to make sure the law was carried out. At first I wondered why I needed so much protecting. Turned out my father had been our previous leader. Ironically the people had loved him."

Brianne couldn't help the scoff of disgust that escaped her lips. To love the father, but hate the son for something no one could control was abhorrent.

"In my home village we had this philosophy that each of our warriors fought and died for, the belief that their sacrifices were not in vain. Our leader, the Hokage, was supposed to be the epitome of it, they were to see the entire village as one big family. Growing up I always wanted was a family and what better family could you have than your entire home village?"

Brianne smiled. He had aspired to become the leader of his home, not out of an attempt for power or authority, but because he wanted to have a family.

"But my godfather taught me a different part to the ideals. He believed that not only could it make Konoha safe, but that through loving others, peace would be possible."

At that, Brianne felt herself choke up. Naruto...he treated his friends as family. He always looked on the bright side. His heart...the way it burned with love and sheer will...this was someone who had seen and done a lot, but still held tightly to his convictions and knew who he was as an individual.

It was truly beautiful! Before she could think, she slammed Naruto against her chest in a hug that nearly made him black out. Naruto would have lost consciousness completely if the young woman hadn't released him from the swell of her breasts. A realization had dawned on her, which she immediately made known.

"What about where you're going to stay? We can't just let you go out at that size, you could be crushed, or eaten! We need to find you a safe place to live!" Brianne ranted as she gazed at him before worryingly rubbing him against her cheek.

"I'm...I'm open to ideas," stuttered Naruto as he tried to push away from her face. He did see her point, he couldn't exactly go anywhere when he was the size of a child's toy.

The maiden thought for a few moments, silent as she worked through the problem. It wasn't long before she reached a conclusion. Setting the little shinobi down on her bed, Brianne rushed over to her closet and began to dig furiously for something.

Naruto had an obscured view, as his sight was mostly blocked by the giant girl's bubbly ass, which wiggled teasingly as she sorted through her stuff. A pile of boxes, bags, and clothes built up behind her by the time Brianne pulled free what she had been looking for.

"Found it!" she declared happily as she stepped back from her closet. Taking out an old dollhouse, Brianne opened it up. "This is perfect. I already have all the necessary furniture, and the bed even has a tiny pillow."

She set the dollhouse down on the table beside her bed, and once her hands were free, she plucked Naruto up and cuddled him into her chest once more. After taking a moment longer to enjoy it, she deposited Naruto into the bedroom, before closing up the front of the old plaything.

Naruto yelped as he turned to see that obscuring the window's view was a gigantic eyeball that was as big as his entire body.

Brianne smiled as she looked at the little cutie. Come to think of it, since she and her friends Rozie and Kakunsa based their team off the magical girl genre, then not only would Naruto make a great boyfriend for Brianne herself, but with how cute he was, he'd be a perfect little pet/mascot for the Love Maiden Trio!

"Welcome to your new home! You'll learn to LOVE it here!"
1153322222222222221123122.title: Naruto's Ner Home, Prisoner of Love?!

choices: Naruto tore through Ribrianne's outfit and got stuck in her belly button
Ribrianne caught him in her hand as she focused on her precision
11533222222222222211231222.content:
Brianne could sense the uneasiness of her new ward, even though she had promised to take care of him, and decided that maybe a bit of physical activity would take the tiny guy’s mind off his predicament. Perhaps a little training session was what he needed, and besides, she was curious to see his fighting style anyway.

“Since we have you set up with a place to stay here, why don’t we get some exercise with a friendly spar?”

Naruto stared into the gleeful eyes of his new caretaker, and gave an exaggerated nod so that she could see it. Getting back to something as simple as trading blows with another fighter would allow him to work through his frustration, even if it didn’t really solve anything immediately. He gave a slightly enthusiastic thumbs up, and was led to the middle of the room.

Knowing that the miniature fighter wouldn’t need much space to fight, as anything bigger than the room they currently occupied would be too much space for him to cover. The transforming young woman placed her charge on the floor gently and backed away about a foot before going through her change.

Once more, the rotund form of Ribrianne stood before him, a smile on her face, and her fists clenched eagerly. The small ninja gathered his strength, and prepared to charge forward towards his new training partner. His opponent lifted a gloved hand over her head, and after a short pause, swiped it down quickly to signal the start of their match.

The tiny ninja surged forward like he was shot from a cannon, aimed at a target that was impossible to miss, he reared back his hand to strike his first haymaker at the transformed young woman. With a mighty leap, Naruto propelled himself at the midsection of Ribrianne.

As her new housemate dashed towards her, Ribrianne stood defiantly, ready to take his first blow. It was unlikely that he could do too much damage with just a punch, especially due to the size difference, so this training match would be more about precision for her, as a tiny moving target would prove much more difficult to hit. Once his jump had reached its zenith, the rotund magical girl squared up and went to meet is fist with her stomach. It quickly proved to be an uneven match.

Naruto’s fist impacted the wall of fat like a mortar shell, only to sink into the yielding flesh before it rebounded and sent him sprawling across the floor like a marionette with its strings cut. The breath had been driven out of him, but he forced himself back to his feet in time to see the momentary expression of smugness on Ribrianne’s face as she showed him just how little his attack had affected her, giving her belly a mocking slap.

Despite his initial failed attack, the ninja, still determined, reset his stance and prepared for his next move. Steeling his muscles with as much power as he could he charged forward once more, with a kick more powerful than his previous attack. This time, he would not simply be bounced back, and he was right, as his attack landed, and darkness engulfed him, and he found himself unable to move.
11533222222222222211231222.title: A fun spar between new friends

11533222222222222212.content:
A sigh was heard from an unusual-looking woman as she looked through a glass orb as

She had long white hair, light blue skin, and purple eyes. The left side of her hair was longer than the other and hung in front of her chest. She had a golden ring hair accessory on the left side of her hair. She wore gold earrings that had a purple peril-like jewel dangling from them. She was also dressed in a red and black skin tight body suit that had a v-shaped hole around her stomach, and wass missing the bottom half, exposing the bottom of her breasts. She wore a a white open leg cape that was jagged at the bottom, and red and black high heels. Added onto all that, she carried a brown staff that had two golden points on each side.

Towa sighed as she beheld the image in the orb: A young man, no older than thirteen.

On his head was short, blond hair that stood up all over like the spines of a sea urchin, and on his face were three pencil-thin, groove-like markings that resembled whiskers on each cheek for a total of six of them. His eyes were a deep soulful blue that would be the envy of any sapphire, and had lightly tanned skin due to the amount of time he trained outdoors. He wore a tracksuit that consisted of orange pants and an orange shirt that had blue near the shoulders and was white at the neck, on the back of the jacket he wore was a red spiral symbol, He had some bandages on his thigh and a carrying case for what she guessed could be throwing knives. He also wore a small pouch on his belt, and blue sandals that left his toes and heels exposed.

She'd first come across him when examining other dimentions for powerful demonic energies. At first she'd been baffled by it, him, and there were still so many questions, but she'd long since declared them irrelevant. They didn't matter. What did matter however, was the end result.

Here was someone who'd once been nothing. The weakest of all. Yet through sheer strength and perseverance, he'd risen through the ranks to prove even the greatest fighters wrong.

He just needed a push.

He was on the cusp of becoming something great. Something more, something...glorious. She wasn't sure what, the prospect excited her regardless. She'd peered into the darkest depths of his heart and seen the beast within. He might pretend to be good and pure, he might even fool himself into thinking that he was, but the truth was known to her. His true nature betrayed him. He'd been born into an era of war and strife, and even after his trip to that waterfall, that darkness hadn't diminished. That he held it at bay through sheer force of will was something to applaud.

Unlike Mira.

For all his strength and fortitude, her creation didn't seem to understand his limitations, what he was missing. He might be one of the strongest beings to exist, but he lacked something, a key component that other fighters did not. An iron will. Spirit. A soul. He did not have a goal to strive toward beyond becoming stronger. He did not possess that indomitable drive, that sheer force of being that would make others-allies and enemies alike!-follow him to the ends of the universe. All he had was power. Nothing else. And why should he? A fighter was all she'd meant him to be, and perhaps she'd made him too well. Yes, he still had his uses for now and his strength was necessary to achieve her goals, but then what? His infatuation and blatant jealousy were beginning to become bothersome. She would need to be rid of him, and soon.

That one, however...

He would truly become something glorious. Not just a pawn, or even an ally. But a partner. He utterly facinated her. This power, if nurtured properly, could bring the very universe to its knees. And he held it back, knowingly limited his power, prevented himself from giving in for fear of what he would become? Unacceptable. He was destined for greatness.

He knew it.

Towa knew it.

He just had to acknowledge it.

Maybe a...she chuckled to herself at what she had in mind and her choice in words..."little" test? That would be delightful! Granted, it meant sending him into another reality, but that made it all the more fun seeing how this would play out.

Humming softly to herself, the sly demoness hefted her staff.

Concentrating, she thrust it outwards, seeking him out. Sure enough she felt him there. As well as feeling, rather than seeing Mira's frown.

"What are you doing?"

Towa sneered.

"Something that should have been done a long time ago."

Tethers of ebony energy gathered at the weapon's razor tip, beading like droplets of dark water. As her brow furrowed the the ink-colored condensation began to coalesce around her, bending to her will as she forced it to do her bidding All the negative energy she'd gathered only served to strengthen the sinister spells, enhance it to its utmost limits. Reaching into the blond's pysche, she bypassed his defenses and penetrated into the very heart of his being.

A single command was uttered, imperious with weight.

"Arise."

**************

Naruto jerked awake at the voice in his head. The first thing he was immediately aware of was something on his face.

What the...what was he wearing? Reaching up, he removed whatever it was and looked down at himself and at what he'd removed. He saw he was clad in an outfit that consisted of a white kitsune noh mask with three ringed eyes that were colored red, a dark blue-grey robe with grey lining and a fur collar, and a tattered grey-blue cape emblazoned with the emblem of a mandala comprised of nine reddish-brown circles of varying sizes atop a larger green-grey circle. Along with that was a fighter's gi that consisted of a sleeveless dark grey uwagi, a long-sleeved black undershirt with a turtleneck, a red sash, black pants, fingerless opera-length black gloves wrapped in studded red-brown leather straps, and red-brown boots that had dark red toe caps.

Where had these come from? For that matter, where was he? That was when he took onte of his surroundings and Naruto's jaw dropped like it weighed a metricton.

WHY THE HELL WAS EVERYTHING SO DAMN HUGE?!

Compaired to everything around him, he was only an inch high!

Seconds later, something slammed into the ground near him, resulting in a crater, his body responded to the sight and flung himself backwards all the same. His feet did not touch the ground. Much to his disbelief, he found himself floating, in midair, completely off the ground.

"How the hell am I flying?!" Naruto sqwaked in surprise. No sooner did he inquire that than he grabbed his head, as memories not his own flodded his mind, granting him enough to have a rudimentary grasp on his newfound power as far as flight went.

Once the memories stopped, Narutos attention was brought back to the crater as someone climed out of it.

A nasty-looking guy who's appearance consisted of extremely long, spiky black hair with a prominent widow's peak, brown and black colored Battle Armor with boots, armored gloves, and a device on one side of his face that a green lense covering one eye. Additionally, he wore two red accessory bands: one tightened around his left arm, and the other on his left leg. Added onto that, he had some kind of furry belt around his waist.

The individual tsked after looking around.

"So this planet is still teaming with life. Dammit Kakarot, what have you been doing all this time?" he growled. Then the thing over his eye suddenly beeped and the figure look in Naruto's direction before it shattered.

"Piece of junk Scouter...a power level that high with onone around? Must've been broken...no wonder it blew up...ah well, at least it pointed a few other power levels aside from that nonexesistant one...one of them must be Kakarot..." the man tsked, then, to Naruto's shock, he floated upwards then suddenly took off into the sky, flying under his own power much like Naruto was, rocketing off somewhere.

Seeing the individual gone, Naruto frowned. He may not know what was going on, but he didn't like that guy's vibe, it was obvious he was bad news.

He couldn't just let someone like that do whatever they wanted, but how could Naruto do anything to stop him? Shaking his head, the Uzumaki decided that whatever that guy was after might lead him to answers about what was going on, and even if not, that creep had to be kept track of, and try coming up with a way to stop him.

Putting his new mask back on as a way of keeping the wind out of his eyes, Naruto decided to put his new flight ability to use.
11533222222222222212.title: Test of the Demon: New world, Problems big & small

choices: Naruto reveals himself to the group.
115332222222222222121.content:
Blasting off in pursuit of the strange warrior Naruto thankfully was able to keep up with him as he flew straight out over the ocean, the dark haired man seemed to know where he was going as he never changed course until suddenly plunged to down to an island in the middle of the sea.

The island wasn't very big with only a few trees and rocks on it, but the main eye catching land mark was small two story house that painted pink. Naruto saw that the man had landed right in front of the house surprising the people, diving towards the nearest palm tree Naruto over looked the gathered crowd.

Beside the long haired man there was five other people a young boy that was green clothes with blue with, an awesome in Naruto's opinion, orange ball on top, an bald old man with a white beard holding a cane, a short man with a bald head wearing an orange gi and a pretty blue haired woman.

The last man was wearing the same colored gi as the other man but was far taller then him with pointy black hair, Naruto's gaze bounced between the two black haired man noting that they looked very much alike but the feeling that they gave off couldn't be more different. The armored man practically oozed disdain and arrogance while the other radiated determination with a bit of anticipation mixed in there.

Naruto was shaken from his thoughts as the armored man used his tail to smack the young bald man into the side of the house, Naruto listens as the man calling Raditz went on to explain his and Goku's origin, it wasn't every day you see actual aliens.

Goku wasn't interested in following his brother it seemed as he charged the older man only to be easily knocked down by a kick to the stomach while Raditz grabbed Gohan giving his brother an ultimatum be before flying off in the same direction he had come from.

Watching from his tree Naruto was torn between revealing himself and helping the people get back Gohan but he wasn't sure how much help he would be at this size, or would he stay hidden and try to help them from the shadows?

choices: Skip to the fight with Raditz
115332222222222222121221.content:
After watching Goku get kicked in the stomach from his so-called brother and while Raditz grabbed Gohan and giving his brother an ultimatum before he went flying off in the same direction from wince he came, from his tree Naruto was now torn in between either revealing himself and helping the people get back Gohan or to stay hidden and see if he can help out some other way. But either way, he wasn't sure how much help he would be at this size, but he still had to at least try and help, cause that just the kind of guy Naruto Uzumaki is!

Just as he was about to follow Raditz, Naruto heard a sudden female's voice that said, "Oh my, a human at the size of one-inch in height and yet he's about to go into battle with literal giants; but maybe I can help you level the playing field."

Before he knew what was happening, Naruto suddenly vanished into thin air.

---- Meanwhile in the Demon Realm ----

"AAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!!!" Towa screamed in absolute fury as she blasted the first of her demon henchmen by the name of Jeff into oblivion.

"HOW DARE SOMEONE TAKE AWAY WHAT'S MINE!!!! I DON'T CARE WHO THEY ARE BUT THEY WILL PAY FOR THIS, DO YOU HEAR ME, I'LL FIND YOU AND YOU WILL PAAAAAYYYY!" Towa screamed to the heavens swearing revenge for whoever took away her toy.

---- With Naruto----

When Naruto reappeared, he fell on his butt and looked around, disorented. Huh? Why did the ground feel so soft and warm? He must have been more out of it than he thought he was.

Then he registered his surroundings.

What the...?! Where was this?! The place he was at was somewhere that a vast environment, complete with warped oceans, mountains, forests, and various animal species. Several villages were built across the landscape.

The whole place was a mountain town with block houses. The village looked like it had been abandoned long ago, but it looked like it survived through a war. Not to mention a feudal-era castle inside of what looked like a sun, but seemed to actually be an alter that consisted of two separated parts, its case and the main content. The case had had a spherical-shaped structure made from gold with an eight-pointed star-like symbol carved, which had been chained and mounted inside of a shrine; along with floating islands that had temples. The islands and castle all orbited the "sun's core", which was a floating cavern in the shape of an eight-pointed sun ray symbol, along with a crescent moon and a sun.

The main content was a sun-like, eye-like orb structure with a double-layered yellow hexagon-shaped pupil (one fixed and the other rotated counterclockwise) surrounded by an orange-yellow flower-like iris, which had been stored inside the core of the artificial sun and protected with some huge pieces of metal bars.

There was even an 50-by-50 meter arena that possessed pyramids and pillars, ensuring lots of room for the contestants.

"Well...not a bad recreation of the enviorment of the Otsutsuki's original world. Still, better atmosphere inside the barrier here...based off the Planet Zorert because its atmosphere is pleasant, wouldn't you agree, little one?" the calm voice of a woman said pleasently, making Naruto leap to his feet and spin to look behind him.

His jaw dropped like a hunk of iron a second later at the sight before him.

The one who had spoken was a tall, female, humanoid with pale blue skin, violet eyes, and long white hair worn as a high ponytail. She carried a long scepter with a gem that floated above it in her right hand. Around her neck was a large light blue ring like a halo. Her attire consisted of green robes, a black cuirass with a white and orange circle decoration, and a red sash. She also wore white high heeled shoes with black soles.

She smiled at him.

Naruto gaped in shock under his mask, while he'd seen plenty of strange things, this was weird! Furthermore, he noticed he was standing on the woman's palm! He hadn't even noticed!

"W-w-who are you?" he sputtered.

Still smiling at him, the woman spoke in a polite tone, "I am Vados, my little Naruto. Pleasure to see you again. Especially in person this time."

"You...you know me? And what the heck do you mean by "again"?!" Naruto said, surprised.

Vados shrugged, "I've been watching over you. and let's just say that I will train you to stand a better chance of standing against those giants on earth, at least they are giants compared to you. Why, you're no bigger than a infant's pinkie toe, yet you want go into a battle between two sayians?"

Naruto went bug-eyed at that and he started to sweat. What was with this woman?! She a stalker or something?! He wouldn't deny she was cute at the least, beautiful at most, but that seriously freaked him out! He shook that off, recalling the scenee that had happened earlier that he had witnessed.

"Well, what that Raditz guy did was unforgivable and even though I somehow shrunk, I gotta help somehow. To know what is right and choose to do nothing is the act of a coward, after all. If I can use my skills to help those who need it, I will. That's what the power I have...what I'm...for, after all!"

Vados looked at him with...was that affection?..."Alright, then I'll train you, but in return, I want something from you, just think of it as something to pay me later, okay?" she said.

Naruto nodded, "Deal."
115332222222222222121221.title: Angelic Offer

1153322222222222221212212.content:
After what seemed like an eternity for Naruto, he was just getting the basics of using his ki as a weapon until Vados said, "Oh my...seems a confrontation is about to occur because of that rather uncouth character with the tail." Vados said, as she was peering into the orb as it glowed a light green color, before it projected an image of Goku and...some kind of green person flying.

Naruto tensed. "Okay, Send me there then. I can help in this fight, after all."

"But your lessons in the basics have barely just started. Are you sure?" the female angel asked.

The blonde Uzumaki nodded and said, "I may be new to this ki stuff, but I can still use my chakra and the skills I know already."

Vados smiled at him as he put his mask on. "Very well, my little one. Can't rightly argue, you do know your way around a fight, after all."

Holding out her hand, palm up, Naruto climbed on top of her palm and she raised him to her face, "Keep in mind however that you and I do have our agreement still after this 'Sayian' business is sorted out." she reminded.

"Don't worry, I won't forget. I gave you my word, after all." Naruto nodded.

Smiling a bit wider at that, Vados then tapped the butt of her staff against the ground and she and Naruto were both enveloped in a shaft of white space and warped away.

In an instant they both arrived where Raditz could be seen but Vados hid her power so she and Naruto couldn't be found and she gently placed Naruto on the ground and said, "Now Naruto, this is your fight so I will not help out or still be here either, however I will be watching over you and if I think you are in to much danger I will teleport you straight to me; Understand?"

Naruto nodded seeing how that's reasonable.

Vados then smiled and nodded at his response and then she was enveloped in a shaft of white space and warped away.

After Vados vanished Naruto flew over to a nearby rock and did a quick look around and saw Raditz standing still, seemingly waiting for Goku to show up.

Looking around for the kid Raditz kidnapped, Naruto saw a strange space-pod in the center of a very large crater and saw that the kid was inside crying inside of it.
Naruto was now doing something he hasn't done much of as a very dangerous pass time, thinking up a plan.

As he was thinking, he saw felt a large energy source fly over him and looked up and saw Goku fly directly over him on a yellow cloud of all things and he was followed by Piccolo.

Naruto watched as both Goku and Piccolo landed in front of Raditz as he said, "Well, well, well look who decided to drop in, if it isn't little brother; Oh and he's brought the green man with him; I was wondering who that second insignificant blimp on my scouter might be I confess, I didn't expect it to be you, What a pleasant surprise."

"I have to hand it to you brother, I didn't think I'd see you until tomorrow, you are a little more resourceful than I thought, and more foolish as well." Raditz finished.

"Well see about that." Goku replied.

"Far enough, So what brings you here Kakorot? do tell, Have you already killed 100 earthlings?." Raditz asked.

"I'm hear to get my son back, Where is he?" Goku said.

"You are testing my patience Kakorot, I've been more than generous with you so far, Now for the last time, I strongly recommend that you join us!" Raditz said beginning to lose his temper.

"I don't care what you recommend, the answer is still NO!!!" Goku yelled at his brother.

"You should listen to your big brother." Raditz warned Goku.

"As far as I'm concerned I don't have a brother." Goku said to Raditz.

"All right then, You can have it you're way Kakorot; I didn't come here to kill you, but it seems that you left me... no choice." Raditz said.

"It's too bad little brother, I do think you would have found the life of a saiyan quot invigorating." Raditz said before eating a pear.

"All right I've heard enough talk, You know why we're here, so let's get on with it." Piccolo said taking off his hat and cape.

Goku then realized that his clothes were weighted and said, "Huh, Piccolo, I didn't know you wore weighted clothing too."

"What? Thought you were the only one?" Piccolo asked sarcastically. As the Namekian rubbed his shoulders while saying, "Oh yeah, I feel much lighter now."

'His power level has gone up to 400.' Raditz thought to himself as his scouter scanned Piccolo.

Then Goku began to take off his shirt saying, "There's thirty pounds." Then he began to take his shoes off revealing his bare-feet while saying, " and here's fifty, and another fifty."

As Raditz watched Goku's power level continue to rise, Goku then took off his arm bands saying, "and two little fivers, that outta do Piccolo, unless you can think of something else."

"What are you? a tailor?" Piccolo said and as Naruto was watching this, he had to agree with the Namekian, not understanding why he took his shirt and shoes off.

Raditz then threw the pear away and began to laugh saying, "Do you two REALLY think that's going to make a difference?" Both Goku and Piccolo were surprised by that remark.

"FOOLS! Who do you think I am? A few weight aren't going to affect the outcome of this fight. I'm still ten times stronger than you are." Raditz said filled with confidence in his voice.

"That maybe true, but strength isn't the only thing that matter." Goku said as Piccolo and Naruto both looked confused by what Goku meant by that.

"Not when you can outsmart you're opponent." Goku said with a confident smile on his face.

Raditz looked unconvinced and said, "You really don't have a clue, do you little brother? You know what? I think I've decided, that I don't want you to join us anymore, a fool like you would only slow us down."

"YOU'RE A DISGRACE TO ALL SAIYANS, NOW PREPARE TO DIE!!!" Raditz yelled in anger.

Goku and Piccolo braced themselves as Raditz raised his hand up in the air, quickly forming a small blue and white energy sphere in it, and taking aim at Goku and Piccolo, glaring hatefully at them both "Now Die!!!"

"I don't think so!" Naruto growled, zooming right up to Raditz's back from behind and forming an Ōdama Rasengan. Slamming it into Raditz's back making him yell in pain. Naruto then watched with satisfaction as the long-haired saiyan was launched forward, spinning as he went, even when shrunken the rasengan no matter the size was still very powerful.

Goku and Piccolo gaped as Raditz zoomed right at them before they both dove out of the way and watched as Goku's apparent brother kept going until he smashed into a rock.

"Ugh...ow..." Raditz groaned, pushing himself up, then he glared around, hateful and confused, "WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT?! WHO DID THAT!?"

Goku blinked and turned to face Piccolo and asked, "Not that I agree with him or anything, but what was that? and who did do that?"

Piccolo frowned, getting back into his fighting stance, "It doesn't matter, whatever it or who did it just helped us, and that's all we need to know." the Namekian pointed out sternly.

Naruto felt insulted from hearing that and whispered in an angry tone of voice, "Well, You're welcome, jerk."

After that, Raditz quickly rushed at both Goku and Piccolo seemingly running passed the both of them, until hit them both with his elbows sending them flying, but Goku and Piccolo quickly recovered and bounced off the ground and took there stances, as Raditz laughed.

"So you not only brought the green man to assist you but you also brought a hidden assassin to face me too, huh Kakorot?" Raditz asked.

"I didn't bring anyone else but Piccolo." Goku replied.

"Well, it really doesn't matter, once I've killed you both he's next." Raditz said.

"You'll have to find me first." Naruto said in a low tone of voice.

'Whoever got him from behind, I gotta remember to thank him for it, but he's so fast, I've never seen anyone move like that.' Goku thought to himself.

"It's like he disappeared, I couldn't follow his movements at all, one second he was in front of us and next...ugh.' Piccolo also thought to himself in a shocked state.

"Well, I'll give you both this, you both know how to take a punch; Good, that should only make this all the more enjoyable, Oh yes, Let's see how much pain you both can really stand." Raditz said.

'I knew he was strong, but for his power to be that much greater...' Piccolo thought.

'We need to find a way to grab his tail, that's the only chance we have.' Goku finished as if he knew what Piccolo was thinking.

"What's wrong? You look so pensive Kakorot, are you still trying to outsmart me? Well think about this while you're at it, your situation is even more hopless than you realize, he,he,he if you think I'm strong now, just wait until I catch my stride, truth is I'm just getting warmed up." Raditz said, shocking Piccolo, Goku and Naruto who was still flying around to attack Raditz again.

11533222222222222221.content:
Naruto grinned. He had FINALLY tracked down the old horn dog's notes and, much to his delight, rather than smut, it was instructions for a jutsu!

Sure using an unfamiliar technique without supervision wasn't a good idea, but what else could he do when the guy who was SUPPOSED to be overseeing his training put a higher value on his peeping...AGAIN! So Naruto was FORCED to train himself since Jiraiya felt being indecent was more important...ah well, not like he expected any different from a lecherous old man who stays at home watching porno twenty-four-seven with the disposition of a child with an overly-eccentric and boisterous personality to compensate for still being a virgin, anyway.

But with it being a week away from the date they'd assured Tsunade that they'd return to the Leaf Village from this training trip, he wanted to show something new so the two and a half years of training weren't just wasted on remedial lessons of stuff he could do before.

He went through the series of handseals the notes said. When the final handseal was made, however, things quickly went south. Firstly, the glow of the technique was a mix of evil crimson and dark violet and he felt himself lock in place involuntarily. Second, sparks of pale gray lightning danced around the room. The dancing sparks began to multiply, and his inability to move left him vulnerable to dozens of them striking him and making him scream silently; such was the intensity of the pain. Finally, the sparks began to swirl around the center of the room, and Naruto forced himself to look towards it through the pain. His eyes were wide at the sight of space in front of him twisting and distorting before cracks began forming in midair. The cracks grew and spread like spider webs forming, and parts of them broke off and revealed a space of distorted light and color.

A vacuum effect emanated from the cracks, and the whiskered blond felt himself being dragged towards it along with Jiraiya's notes on how to perform the jutsu, the pages scattering as they were sucked in. Then Naruto blacked out.

-------

With a jolt, Naruto awoke. Looking around frantically.

Getting to the top, his jaw dropped. WHAT THE HECK WAS THIS? LAND OF THE GIANTS OR SOMETHING?!

Naruto was in what looked like an indoor pool. Everything around him was so huge, he was only an inch-and-a-half tall compared to it all!

To top it off, on the other side of the room, there stood a large group of teenage girls all close to his own age, all dressed in one-piece swimsuits, and all of them gigantic compared to him!

In spite of himself, the the Jinchūriki couldn't help his first thought. 'Pervy Sage...youre fucked, I'm in your dream world and YOU can't get here!' Naruto thought, smirking vindictivily.

***
'I feel as though I'm missing something amazing right now.' Jiraiya thought to himself, pausing in his peeking as a silent wail of anguish and annoyance escaping him with a frown as his fingers twitched as if wanting to strangle someone while he had a sudden urge to cry in disappointment at whatever he was missing out on.
***

The girls were all talking about something called "Keijo". From what managed to gather about it by overhearing them, it was an all - female water sport where girls stand on a small floating arena called a "Land" and compete against one another. The aim was to push the other contestant off of the arena into the water, but players were forbidden to use their limbs. They were only allowed to use their butts and boobs to fight. However, they were freed to launch their attack to any body parts of their opponents, including their opponent's face and vital points.

Player types or "fighting styles" in this Keijo thing were divided into three types.

The ones called Infighters were close range fighters that mainly focused on power. The Infighters fully utilize their strength to sink their opponent. However, their attacks are usually standard. Thus it's easy to find an opening to counter them. The Infighters usually aimed for one-hit kills as they focus all of their strength into their butts. The Infighters are disadvantaged when fighting on a narrow-type Land, as the Outfighters are able to move faster to corner them. However, they have more strength than the Outfighters. As such, they are able to wipe out the Outfighters with little effort.

The Outfighters were hit and run fighters that focused on speed and strategist. The Outfighters fully utilized their speed, and they were hard to countered. However, they are also pretty small and light. Thus they can easily be wiped out by the Infighters. The Outfighters are also usually unable to bear the weight of heavy butts, thus they will fall down to the Land. Due to their lack of strength, almost all the Outfighters tend to defeat their opponents by launching successive attacks.

And finally, there was the classification of Counters, those were fighters that focused on defense and utilized their opponent's strength to convert it into their own attack. The Counters usually tend to reflect their opponent's movement before striking them down if they manage to find an opening. Due to their lack of speed, they were disadvantaged if they face off against the Outfighters. However, they have the advantage if they face off against the Infighters.

Currently, the swimsuit-clad giantesses were being explained to about an exam they were going to take to help determine which type they were between In, Out, and Counter. The part of the exam was currently the "Outfighter" test, where examinees were required to hit a bunch of small balls by using their butts. Examinees were tested on whether they could differ the normal balls and the squishy balls.

"OH FUCK!" Naruto swore as he realised where he was: among the balls that were going to be used for this exam! Just great! And for better or worse, out of the T&A-fan department, Naruto was a butt guy! Looking down, he went red as he saw he was already sporting a boner tent in the front of his pants.

Naruto dropped back and checked his surroundings for Jiraiya's notes, then recalled with utter dread that the pages had scattered when the jutsu had been used. Until he found them all and used the jutsu again, he was trapped here, wherever "here" was! Then the cart with the exam balls was rolled across the room and the massive hand of the exam proctor reached in and grabbed several of them, taking Naruto along for the ride as the balls were tossed to the girls as they all stood on "Land" platforms in the pool.

"Is it wrong that part of me is gonna enjoy this...?" The Uzumaki asked himself as he fell towards the waiting, powerful-looking asses of the numerous teenage giantesses.

1153322222222222222112.content:
As much as Nozomi wanted to deal with that damned itch, there wasn't time. The next part of the exam was starting! The Mock Race! Whatever that irradiance was, it'd have to wait!

She HAD to do this! She needed to become an official Keijo player! Her family was counting on her!

She still remembered how around the time she was six years old, her mother was hospitalized and eventually passed away, while Nozomi helplessly cried. Right before her death, her mom told Nozomi, as the eldest daughter, to take care of her siblings. Nozomi and her siblings then lived in very poor condition. Due to this poverty, Nozomi kept working hard, to the point where her friends said that her body never stopped moving. Nozomi attended Shinkou High School in Kobe. Upon entering Shinkou, Nozomi has became a pretty skilled gymnast. Thus Nozomi was invited by colleges with the best gymnastic programs. However, Nozomi then learned about Keijo, a gambling, water sport, knowing that its players got paid so much if they win in the large scale tournaments. As such, Nozomi refused all offers of joining athletics college and decided to become a Keijo player in order to bring her family out of poverty.

If there was truly anything evil about money, it was that people were made to depend on having it to live without difficulty...she shook her head, clearing it of those thoughts as she made her way onto the floating pathways between the Land arenas in the pool.

She was now rubbing his waist with her index finger on top while rubbing the underside with her thumb until she suddenly felt something poke against her finger and looked down at the charm and her eyes widened to see when she moved her index finger away to see that there was a bump in "Butty's" pants and she yelped as she suddenly dropped him to the floor while Nozomi looked horrified by what Sayaka had just done to Naruto.

After Sayaka dropped Naruto he quickly applied chakra to the soles of his feet and landed safely on the ground and looked up at the white haired giantess who stared down at him and saw she had a look of Shock, Confusion and for some reason Interest and he saw her turn her head to Nozomi with a look that demanded an explanation and Nozomi just dropped her head and sighed and gave a look to Naruto that silently asks for his permission to tell her the truth and he reluctantly nods, seeing that the cat's out of the bag.

After a while of Nozomi telling Sayaka the whole story about Naruto's life, how he got into their world and how he helped her during her match, Sayaka had an understanding of what happened and promised both Nozomi and Naruto that she'll keep what she heard a secret and also agrees to help out Naruto find Jiraya's notes for the dimension teleport jutsu so he can go home.

Nozomi then remembers what Sayaka came in here and asks "Sayaka do you know the results of the exams? Did I pass?" Sayaka answered " I honestly don't know Nozomi, I tried to see if you did but all they said is that they'll send a notice of our results in a about a week."

Sayaka could fully understand at why Nozomi was so fidgety about the results as she wanted to become a keijo player not for herself but for her brother and sister who are counting on her. So after she and Nozomi picked up Naruto from the floor they proceeded to go home and wait for the notices to come in.
115332222222222222211211211.title: Naruto meets Sayaka

1153322222222222222112112111.content:
Naruto winced, feeling guilty as Nozomi struggled with her bags. He would have gladly helped her with them, if not for the size difference making doing that impossible...not that Nozomi hadn't caught him trying to move her bags earlier.

It had left her amused and touched that her new friend wanted to help her that much. Then she'd picked him up and added him to her belongings. Placing him into the lightest of her bags and leaving the zipper open just slightly at one corner so he got fresh air and could see what was going on outside.

"Hold up, Miyata!" Nozomi cried, strained under the weight of her baggage.

"Why are your carrying so much? You could have had it packed up and sent here, you know."

"But why waste the money when I can do it for free? Seems silly. Although Butty did try helping me with it..." Nozomi said.

Sayaka's eyes widened, "...You brought him with you...?!" she hissed, her voice dropping to a whisper.

"I couldn't just leave him behind. Other than you and me, he doesn't know anyone else, and I did promise to help him." Nozomi said back, her voice just as low as her friend's.

"Nozomi...!" Sayaka hissed, but she did understand.

Leaning back, Naruto sighed after Nozomi put her bags down and tried to get an interview, the shrunken ninja took the chance to peek through the opening in the bag to see the other possible classmates.

looking through the space in the zipper, he saw a female reporter with a formal suit, long braided hair and glasses walked up to Nozomi. He was interested in learning she was named, Satomi Shiomi, and was a reporter from something called "K-Sports Magazine".

'Well at least someone wants to give Nozomi a intervew.' he thought, smiling. He knew Nozomi was the dark horse among the students here. But was honestly happy that Satomi woman felt Nozomi deserved being recognized. Then the reporter's partner had to mess it up by showing up and scolding Satomi for wanting to persue a "nobody who passed on sheer luck and was bound to drop out." rather than the members of the Elite Class.

At that, Naruto growled and unconsciously released killing intent, causing the entire student body, faculty, and the reporters to pause as the feeling of death passed over them. It only lasted for a second before Naruto managed to regain control but the brief exposure left everyone frigthened and confused. None of them knew what that was, nor did they know what had caused it, and luckily for Naruto, none of them had caught on to the fact that he was the one who produced it.

Naruto took a deep breath. He couldn't afford to get so worked up, but he just couldn't help it. Considering what Nozomi had gone through, and was even willing to give up her own future for the sake of the people that she loved, the idea that she was seen as if she were nothing made him angry. He'd been in that position himself. Constantly passed over for the "golden child" no matter his own efforts or accomplisments. It was a sore spot for him.

'Hmph, seems like he's a real "SWELL" guy to be around.' The Uzumaki thought bitterly, then Naruto was plesently surprised when a member of the Elite Class, Hanabi, was happy to see that Nozomi made the cut to get into Keijo, and that Hanabi respected Nozomi and regarded her as a friend, if Hanabi saying she was worried she'd never see Nozomi again was any indication.

And RIGHT in front of the jerk reporter, too!

'Ah, karma...chomp, chomp away!' Naruto thought gleefully as he watched from the bag.

Then attractive and very tall teenage girl with the long blonde hair and blue eyes that Naruto could've mistaken for his long-lost sister if he didn't know any better, went up to Nozomi and introduced herself as Mio Kusakai, then asked which one she preferred between cars and motorcycles. Nozomi answered to prefer the latter, and Mio shocked everyone when she hugged Nozomi and stated that she loved her, revealing that her hobbies were bikes and flirting with cute girls.

'Damn! Is that girl straight forward, or what!? I mean, Nozomi DOES have a really GREAT ass and all, but even I wasn't that clingy!' Naruto thought as he watched Mio start gropping Nozomi's butt...and considering where he had been when he and Nozomi first met, that said a lot about his opinion of Mio.

Hanabi eventually pulled Mio away from Nozomi and the reporters all followed where Mio went since she was apparently the top of the Elite Class, but not before Satomi gave Nozomi a business card and asked to see if she'd be allowed to watch Nozomi Race in Keijo. Naruto smiled at that. As Nozomi picked up her bags again, Naruto thought he'd try that "ninshū" stuff again to try communicating with her, but as he gathered his chakra, he jerked up, eyes wide.

NO WAY!

While Naruto wasn't a sensory-type, it was a good thing for the fact that there wasn't anyone in this world who could use chakra besides him! When Naruto flared his chakra just now, he'd felt several others with traces of his OWN chakra signiture do the same like echolocation.

One...two...TWELVE of Jiraiya's notes were here?!

Naruto whooped. Thank you, Nozomi! He ment it!

The bag shifted and Naruto suddenly found himself facing a massive eye. "Well, you sure are excited all of a sudden. Something good happen, little Butty?" Nozomi asked.

"I thought you agreed to stop calling me that!" Naruto cried, "But yeah, there's actually a lot of those notes I need here at Setouchi!"

"...Awesome! That's great." Nozomi said, glad her eye was all Naruto could see or he'd notice the strained smile she wore at that. As eager as she was to start chakra lessons, she didn't want to loose a friend so soon.

"Don't worry, Nozomi, I haven't forgotten my promise." the blond smiled at her.

"Should you two really be talking like that out in the open?" Sayaka asked. "Come on, we need to get to our dorm room."

Lowering the bag Naruto was in, Nozomi nodded.

Inside the training school dormitories, Nozomi and Sayaka search for their assigned room, while Naruto was still inside Nozomi's bag he couldn't help but be glad that he stayed with her and came here to Setouchi Keijo Training School if he didn't, he didn't even want to know how long it would take him to find those notes.

Just before he could think about where the note's locations were, he heard a loud yet friendly and playful voice and Naruto took a peek outside of the bag to see who the voice belonged to and what he saw made his mouth drop into a silent scream and his eyes widen in shock and horror.

It really wasn't a what but more of who he saw and who, he saw was a titaness of a woman who has side ponytail hairstyle. She is a huge, tall, and muscular woman who was wearing a Setouchi Keijo Training School uniform but she appeared very friendly to Nozomi and then he sensed his chakra coming from her body somewhere, Naruto gulped he now knew one of Jiraya's notes was on this giantess' body somewhere and like it or not he had to scale her body if he wanted to find it.

That's when Naruto heard Nozomi say, " Hey Oshima, this means you passed too right?" The now identified Oshima then said, " Well of course I did, although there's just one problem, I did so poorly on the exam's mock race that they bumped me down from elite class to regular class." At first she sounded very confident then she sounded sad while she said that but then she continued, "With that said, I think you guys have worse than me." Nozomi asked in a confused voice, "What do you mean Yuko?" Yuko then answered, "Well I hate to break it to ya, but from what I heard the room your in, room 309 is kinda cursed as they also call it the "Empty room"." Nozomi still confused about the room she Sayaka was going to stay in she asked, "Why do they call it that?" Yuko then said, "Apparently they call it that cause they put the students who are most likely to quit Setouchi because they can't keep up with the classes, and during every semester it always empties out so fast." Nozomi couldn't believe what she heard and asked, "What are you serious!?"

Naruto hearing this from Nozomi's bag, couldn't believe his ears when he heard Yuko say that, How could the staff of this place do that to their students? Some of them may not have been bookworms but that dosen't mean they can't learn, like him maybe some of them were more practical learners as in they prefer the hands on experience than read a book about the rules of Keijo.

Before he knew it Nozomi and Sayaka were already in front of room 309 and Nozomi said, "So this is where they send the failures huh?", "How did we end up in this stupid room? We're winners." Sayaka igored Nozomi's complaint and said in a calm voice, "Let's just go in." As she just opened the door and the girls and Naruto who peeked out of Nozome's bag they saw that their was already two other girls in the room.

One of the room's occupants has long light crimson hair, tied up into two pigtails and has light crimson eyes and has clear skin that seems very sweet in appearance. The second occupant also has clear skin and has long light brown hair, routinely tied up into a high ponytail. She has also a striped scarf. They both wear the Setouchi training school uniforms and both looked up to see the new girls enter.

Nozomi introduced hersef by saying, "We'll be joining the empty - uh! I mean room 309, Hey we're your roomates, my name is Nozomi Kaminachi, I'm so thrilled to be here, I think it's great." Nozomi kicked herself mentally for almost saying the cursed name of the room. Sayaka then calmly said, "and I'm Sayaka Miyata, pleased to meet you."

The pigtailed crimson haired girl cheerfully said, "Hi it's a pleasure to meet you both, anyway I'm Non Toyoguchi, I'm looking forward to getting to know you ladies better." Nozomi couldn't help herself when she said, "Wow your voice is too stinking cute!" From inside Nozomi's bag Naruto couldn't help but agree with Nozomi as he thought he would get diabetes from the sound of her voice.

Non then said, "Oh, I almost forgot I brought something for you, it's a little treat from my hometown." As Non gave both Nozomi and Sayaka some kind of chocolate candy. As Nozomi and Sayaka say their thanks and Sayaka began a conversation with Non, Nozomi walked over to the ponytail haired girl and said, "Um, Hey there." The girl looked up and said, "Oh, hi I'm Kazane Aoba." A pregnant silence hung in the air for a moment. Nozomi then said, "Kaya is that all you got?" And Naruto couldn't help but be amused at how the girls were interacting with each other, until he saw Non trip and fall on her face, he could help himself but let out a small laugh but quickly covered his mouth as his eyes widened and he was hoping that the girls outside the bag didn't hear it...

"What was that?" Non asked. "Coulda sworn I heard somethin'..." she said, her voice adopting a strange country accent.

Naruto mentally swore and both Nozomi and Sayaka tensed. CRAP! This wasn't good! The three of them had agreed to keep as few people as possible from knowing about him!

"I didn't hear anything." Sayaka said.

Nozomi, however, wasn't as good at playing things cool.

"Really?! I didn't hear a thing! Certainly not a shrunken person from another dimension in my bag laughing! Nope! No sirie! Ahehehhehe...!" she cried frantically, waving her hands in front of her.

"Really?" Non asked as both her and Kazane looked at her, then turned to the ribion-wearing girl's bag.

With a groan, Naruto knew the jig was up and climbed out of Nozomi's luggage. Shocking the two new gigirls. As Non and Kazane stared, Naruto looked up at Nozomi flatly, "Damnit Nozomi...you just have to be an honest girl don't ya!? Don't get me wrong, I like that you are, but we agreed on keeping things secret!"

Nozomi chuckled nervously at that "Aheheh....sorry, Naruto..." she aplogized.

Both Non and Kazane gasped, leaning over to look at the miniture ninja in shock. Non's eye sparkled "Wow...he...he's so...CUTE! Is that an elf?!"

Naruto twitched at that.

"Nope. He's human, just really small. When I first met him, I thought he was a bug and then a fairy, though." Nozomi said, the reminder making Naruto twitch in annoyance again. "ALRIGHT THE JOKES HAVE RUN THE'RE COURSE!!! SO THAT'S ENOUGH!!!" he shouted.

"Ohhh-Kkkaaayyyy...relax, Naruto, geeze..." Nozomi said.

"Sorry, but its really irritating..." Naruto growled before he started taking deep breaths to get himself to relax and calm down.

Kazane reached out with her right hand hesitently. Unsure if it was ok, but she seemed nervous about it...something that reminded Naruto of Hinata almost. Though he did wonder about the twitching ponytail.

"Where'd he come from?" Non asked.

"Long, and hard to believe story, trust me on that." Nozomi said, to which the two new girls looked down at him.

"...I don't want to say...digging up bad memories and all..." he said looking away.

Nozomi nodded, having heard her little "butty's" story, she coldn't really blame him. With a sigh, Nozomi looked at Naruto regretfully, her expression asking a silent, yet personal question.

Seeing her look, Naruto let out a sigh of his own, he stuck his fingers in his ears and nodded.

Gulping, the girl that the Uzumaki had known longest since arriving in this reality explained Naruto's story, having to include his past. As that was described, the others all grew utterly horrified. How could Naruto's hometown treat someone like that?!

Once Nozomi finished, Naruto removed his hands from attempting to block his hearing and gave the four titanesses a stern look.

"Save it...I don't need or want your pity. It won't do me a damn thing. That's not to say I don't appreciate it, but I've found that you can either piss and moan and feeling sorry for yourself OR you can actually get up and do something about it to improve the situation. That's why I don't or won't ever accept anyone's pity. You can't change the past, but I decided to pick myself up and move forward towards a future that I can be proud of."

At that, the four girls all stared. That...that was pretty awe-inspiring to them.

"Oh...come here, you!" an overcome Nozomi cried, snatching him up in a hug.

"Gack...! Nozomi...! Crushing...!" Naruto gasped out at the girl as he was being squeezed. Sheesh! Didn't Nozomi know that "love you to death" was a descriptive expression! You weren't literally suppossed to kill them!

As Nozomi cuddled Naruto, she looked at the others.

"You can see why Sayaka and me didn't want to say anything about him. We need to keep him a secret as much as possible." Nozomi said, only to receive a series of deadpan stares from everyone else.

"Like you did?" Sayaka said.

Nozomi hug her head, chuckling akwardly. Point there.

"What I don't get is why you'd want to go back there." Sayaka said, refering to Konoha.

Naruto shrugged, "Bad experences aside, place is still my home. Need any other reason than that?" he asked.

They looked skeptical, but nodded.

"So what'er we going to do, we don't know where to start looking for those notes." Non said in worry.

"Actually...before Nozomi and Sayaka came to room 309, I sensed chakra from a note with my chakra in it from that Yuko girl. It was faint, but I sensed my chakra coming from somewhere on her body, I couldn't pinpoint where exactly but it's there somewhere on her body and like it or not I'm gonna have to search her body from her toes to her ponytail until I find it." Naruto said, already not looking forward to the task.

The girls blushed at the thought of the shrunken blonde ninja wearing mountain climbing gear and about to climb Yuko like she was a living mountain while she was naked, but they somewhat understood and they all reluctantly agreed to help him find her so he could get this over with.

"We could sneak him out later like at night and help find her room so he can serch her." Nozomi said.

"Bad idea...what if we get caught sneaking out of our rooms at night? Most live-in schools do have rules about that, after all...besides, even if we do pull ofv sneaking around at night without getting caught and get back here, how will HE find his way around in the dark at his size?" Sayaka said, arms crossed.

"We could do somethin' to leave him a trail back to our room." Non pointed out.

Kazane sighed, still being silent.

"So during the day, we can carry him around and claim he's a lucky charm, and at night, help him find the notes from who has them...Oh! And if we face them in a Race, we can have him with us." Nozomi said.

The girls all nodded.

Later that night, the group of five exited Room 309 and started creeping through the school grounds and...

Naruto looked at the note he'd gotten from Yuko. One down, eleven more to go...at least that he was aware of. But after that, where was he suppossed to look?

Feeling something brushing against his back, the ninja turned to see Nozomi staring at him in concern. "You ok, little butty?" Nozomi asked him

"...Just...never realized just how hard this would be until just now..." he sighed. He was so preoccupied, he didn't even react to Nozomi's pet name for him.

At that, the girl winced and picked Naruto up in a hug. "Don't worry, and don't you dare give up. I'll help you however I can every step of the way." she reassured him.

Naruto smirked with a relaxed expression. Him? Give up? Ha! Nice joke! Oh Nozomi...she really would have made a grand Konoha kunoichi. On top of being fast, Nozomi had amazing core strength, yet her body was soft and she used her flexability to her advantage. Not only that, but she wasn't afraid to go up against those stronger than herself, she knew what it meant to have something important to drive you, and she didn't ever give up.

The more he thought about it, the more part of him felt how she wasn't born in Konoha to be an example of a cruel, sick cosmic joke to the point of criminal damage. Then again, the ideals that constituted the Will of Fire were universal, you just had to open your heart and embrace those ideals.

Hey, if he could do things like graffiti the Hokage Monument in the middle of broad daylight and out in the open where anyone could've seen him doing it and not get caught until he was done, or putting itching powder on the robes of the Hokage, the so called strongest shinobi of Konoha who had a near 24/7 guard of highly trained shinobi from the ANBU Black Ops Division, then outrun chunin, jonin and a few ANBU when he was a kid, all while wearing bright orange, then keeping himself from being seen at only a few inches tall and wearing dark colors by a bunch of civilians was easy.

---Few Days Later---
For the benefit of those that have never been rendered unconscious, it is a very strange sensation to say the least. Before you even open your eyes the first thing that comes back to you is the ability to hear. Where before it would be some kind of droning white noise, the noise begins to clear and become more and more coherent and less echoey until it is fully restored.

From that point your sense of feeling comes back and you try to move. It is only at that point when you try and fail due to the recent rebooting of your motor skills that you become aware that your eyes are fully open and that the reason you could not see was because you were readjusting to the light.

This was the fate that met one Naruto Uzumaki upon his reawakening. Then he cringed as memories of the pain struck him while his muscles throbbed and his bones felt stiff from extended inactivity.

Ok...as much of a disaster as his going off alone at night to locate those notes had been with Creepy, it hadn't blown up on him as bad as the route of going after them in the daytime with the others had been! Much less note-hunting during a Keijo match!

And what was...? Oh, a hand was laying across him. Popping his neck to loosen up that part of him, he turned his head to see who had him.

It was Nozomi, who was asleep and as she slept he could hear Nozomi mumbling something in her sleep, it sounded something like,"Mmm...Red...Whirlpools..being...crazy." but what really caught Naruto's attention was what Nozomi was wearing. It was some kind of swimsuit? (or at least he THOUGHT it was.) As the item in question was a full-body, unitard-like wetsuit that more resembled a racing suit that had the limbs of its wearer fixated with reinforced rubber on top of being skin-tight, causing it to compress the wearer's entire body as a way to make it be hard to do anything, even move in..

The suit covered Nozomi's entire body with the exception of her face, her stomach and partly both her hands and feet and she looked like she was very uncomfortable.

Naruto wobbley stood on the pillow and carefully walked to Nozomi's face and put his hand against her cheek and said, "Hey, Nozomi."

When Nozomi felt Naruto's tiny hand touch her cheek, her eyes completely opened and she saw Naruto standing and before he knew it, Nozomi's hands wrapped around his body and was now nuzzling him against her cheek as tears were pouring in happiness as she was saying, "NARUTO! Oh Naruto thank goodness you're okay! I was so worried about you!!! DON'T EVER SCARE ME THAT AGAIN! I'M SO GLAD YOU'RE SAFE!! DO YOU KNOW HOW AFRAID I WAS FOR YOU?!"

While Nozomi was rubbing Naruto against her cheek, she couldn't help but think back to the time during Naruto's coma, when she met his mother for the first time.

--- Flashback ---
As Nozomi slept by Naruto's side, while Naruto's body was unconscious, his mind and chakra was still working, so while Naruto was recovering from taking Nozomi's vacuum butt cannon head-on, Naruto's chakra was still going and it had a bright red light glowing around him until the light reached Nozomi's forehead as she slept, it seemed to be reaching out to Nozomi. While inside Nozomi's dreamscape, Nozomi was having a dream of being the world greatest Keijo player in the world and right in front of her was Naruto in a very nice pair of swimming trunks, at his normal size, facing her on top of a land that was shaped like Nozomi's butt.

Just as they were about to begin, a sudden flash of red light appeared and Nozomi then saw a woman who had a slender, but feminine build, fair skin, violet eyes, and the most beautiful red hair she'd ever seen. It reached her waist with shoulder-length strands that framed both sides of her face and a black clip that parted her hair to the left. She also wore a high-collared, sleeveless blouse under a long, loose-fitting dress with a wristband on her left wrist and sandals that covered the instep and ankles, yet left her toes and heels exposed.

The woman took Naruto's place and began to walk towards Nozomi, who tensed as she got close enough and put both of her hands on the sides of Nozomi's face. At first the red haired woman looked happy to see her as she gently held Nozomi's face in her hands, then before Nozomi knew it, suddenly the lady's face turned demonic and she quickly reverse fliped Nozomi straight into the Land face-first.

After Nozomi pulled her head out of the floating platform, she galred, "Hey, What was that for!?" she demanded.

The red haired woman shook her head with a smirk, "Sorry Nozomi, but you did kinda have that coming for what you did to my son."

Nozomi's eyes widened in shock when the red-haired woman, who not only knew her name, but also what happened to Naruto, said that. "Y-yo-you're son? Then that means that you're...!"

The redhead simply nodded without saying anything.

Nozomi's eyes widened and before the red haired woman knew it, Nozomi was already on her hands and knees rapidly bowing before her repeating, "I'm Sorry." A hundred times every ten seconds.

The redhead smiled at the white ribbon-wearing girl, "Nozomi, I already forgave you for that, it was an accident and I also wanted to say that what you and your friends are doing for my son is a very noble thing; You didn't even have to get involved in it, but you chose to anyway; and I know that once all of Jiraya's notes are gathered, I know Naruto will never forget it. And I know without a shred of doubt that your mother won't forget it either. She's very, very proud of you and so am I for the both of you. Oh and where are my manners, I haven't even introduced myself. My name is Kushina Uzumaki and as you would guess, I'm Naruto's mother."

Nozomi's eyes watered when Kushina mentioned her mother being proud of her and all she's done and had a smile on her face as she said, "Thank you, Kushina that really means alot."

"Good then...one last thing, this is important: I WANT LOTS OF GRANDBABIES!"

"What?!" Nozomi cried, utterly shocked.

"Grandbabies of course!" Kushina said, rolling her eyes. "You know; cute and cuddly and fun to spoil! With hips like yours, they would probably pop right out, especially with all that Keijo training you've been doing!" Kushina laughed, delighted.

Nozomi felt dizzy from the idea. Sure Naruto was a very dear and special friend to her, but THAT? She found herself on the fence about it.

"Too soon?" Kushina asked.

Nozomi nodded.

"Well, better make a move before someone else stakes their claim on my boy. I happen to LIKE you, Nozomi." Kushina pointed out."Be a shame losing you because you too as long as that Stalking Wallflower."

Nozomi felt a muscle in her shoulder twitch weakly and she caught herself muttering something like 'kill the bitch' at the news her "little butty" had a stalker.

While she was trying to decide what to do, Maya then thought of an idea.

"Wait, Naruto, I'll tell you what... I'll play a game with you... and if you win then I'll help you get back to where you came from, but if you lose... then you have to stay here with me. That's the only deal I'm giving you." Maya said with a voice that had no room for arguments as she stared Naruto in his eyes.

Naruto knew she was serious about this and knew that this was his only chance to actually getting back to (what he assumed she meant) was Setouchi, but he really didn't want to upset Maya, so he nodded his head.

Seeing Naruto nod in acceptance to her challenge, Maya then began to think of the game to play, it took her a moment until she had an idea, "Alright Naruto, the game we're going to play is an obstacle course over the pool, I can have it all set up in a few minutes and the we'll both have a race--not Keijo, but a regular speed race--to the finish and who ever makes it first wins. And to make this fair for you, if we tied at the finish line, then our times will decide the winner; and since you're so much smaller than me, I'll deduct about five minutes off your final time."

Seeing this as an interesting idea, Naruto agreed with Maya, who smiled and went to make a phone call to set everything up (sometimes, it payed having the head of a Keijo Training School as a parent, adoptive or not).

--- Later ---

It was later that night and after making sure everyone was fast asleep, Maya and Naruto saw the completed obstacle course and it looked crazy; as it had five small platforms angled downwards towards the pool leading to a rope, and from there, there was a platform that then lead to a couple of hang bars that looked like they could roll on a duo of weird looking bars that looked like snakes that they had to literally throw themselves onto another platform and then they would have to run on top of four rotating blocks on a stick to reach the next platform and that one had lead to them having to jump and use three spinning cycles to get across to what looked like the finish line.

After Maya finished signing the papers she took Naruto to the starting platform and placed him on the platform, "Ready? Set... GO!", Maya said as she and Naruto began the course.

As Maya took the lead thanks to her height compared to Naruto's, the tiny shinobi wasn't going to let this beat him as he ran as fast as his legs could go. Next came the hang-bars and again, Naruto was forced to hitch a ride with Maya not knowing it as she then jumped off the bars and made it across.

Then came the rotating blocks on a stick and Maya did have some trouble getting across but she made it, while Naruto used his ninja agility and reflexes to get across easier.

Then came the hardest part of the course as they both made to the trio spinning cycles, with Naruto climbing on Maya's body, who saw him do this to get to the first cycle and he was trying to get across ahead of her, but Maya began to turn the cycle; nearly throwing the shrunken ninja off the cycle and both Maya and Naruto manged to jump to the second one, this went on for a while until they both made it to the third and final cycle with Maya trying to not only throw Naruto off the cycle and make to the next one, and Naruto fighting to keep his balance; until they both jumped of and the first one to land on the finish line platform was...
