A hand entered her field of vision and she took it, getting pulled to her feet to come face to face with a woman who had a slender, but feminine build, fair skin, violet eyes, and beautiful red hair that reached her waist with shoulder-length strands that framed both sides of her face and a black clip that parted her hair to the left. Nozomi's mother nodded, "Understandable. Anyone with the eyes for the truth and heart to accept it can easily see Naruto is special. Still, we have plans to make."

"Anything I can do?" Naruto questioned, making Maya smile and grab him before getting out of the pool and drying off with a towel, Naruto still in her fist.

"Just stay with us. That helps." Maya cooed to him, nuzzling him against her cheek fondly.

"Well Naruto, you've really done it this time," stated a voice dryly in the darkness of a completely isolated room.

The blonde shinobi of Konoha was currently stuck in what was probably the greatest pinch he had ever faced in his near sixteen year long life, and to make matters even worse, it didn't seem like there were any possible way out of it. He was lying on his back alone in a dark room, most likely a cell of some sort. He had tried to move, but that quickly proved to be impossible. It felt as if he had been glued directly to the cold stone floor, sprawled out like a cross with his arms raised at his sides at ninety degrees and any attempt of molding chakra turned out to be completely useless. It was as if something sucked it right out of his body before he even had the time to make any use of it, just like the time he had his first run in with the shark-like Akatsuki member Hoshigake Kisame and his chakra eating sword Samehada. The icing of the cake was that he was now completely unarmed, leaving him with only his pants, sandals, headband and the necklace that had been given to him by Tsunade.

Naruto cursed at his own helplessness. He had no idea where he was, how long he had been out and how far he was from home.

Suddenly, a massive stone door was opened and the darkness instantly gave way for the intruding light. Naruto closed his eyes tightly shut, taking his time to make his eyes adjust themselves to the light and then hesitantly opened one to see who had opened the door.

"Well, how are we doing, Naruto? I hope my men weren't too rough on you," came the voice of a lone figure standing in the doorway.

"Orochimaru!"snarled Naruto with all the venom he could muster, "What do you want with me?!"

"You, my dear boy, have become a great obstacle in my plans of achieving absolute dominance over the world. As you are very well aware of, Akatsuki, the organisation of which I was once a member, are hunting down all the Jinchuriki in order to gain the Bijuu that are sealed inside of them. You are the only one left and it's only a matter of time before they get their hands on you. Now that is just something I cannot allow."

"Let me guess. You are doing this out of the goodness of your heart?" spat Naruto sarcastically.

Orochimaru merely chuckled at that remark before replying with his thin lips formed into a snake like smile, devoid of any warmth. "Of course not. I am merely looking out for my own interests. I know very well what my former associates are planning, but without you they would be completely incapable of going through with the final phase of their plan."

"I'm not afraid of Akatsuki!" roared the restrained Konoha shinobi in anger. "I'll take them all on if I have to! Release me now or so help me I will...!"

"You will do what?" laughed the snake master at the boy's futile attempts at intimidating him. "Take a look around yourself. I haven't left anything to chance and you're completely at my mercy," he stated as he made a gesture with his hand, urging Naruto to turn his head as best as he could to take in the cell of which he had been imprisoned in for the first time.

It was a large circular room completely made out of shining black stone, but what really caught the blonde's attention was the fact that nearly every centimeter of the cell's walls, roof and floor was covered in highly complex arrays of seals. He was lying in the absolute center of the room and it seemed like all of the seals, no matter where they where, interacted with each other to form chains that in the end formed complex patterns all around his body. During his years of training under Jiraiya, the greatest Seal Master Naruto had ever met, he had learned quite alot of this mystical art, but it didn't take a genius to figure out that this was the cause of his unmovable body and his inability to mold chakra.

"So what are you going to do with me? Kill me?" asked the Uzumaki once he had fully understood just how bad his odds were. He hadn't given up yet, far from it, and secretly tried to come up with a plan that would help him escape from this situation, preferably one that would allow him to take down the villainous shinobi in the process.

"Tempting, but decided that a different course of action would be far more interesting," replied Orochimaru as he approached his captive with arms neatly folded behind his back, a twisted smile playing on his lips. "You are truly a most intriguing specimen my dear boy and I am certain that, if I let you be, you will grow to become a serious threat to my goals in the future. The safest thing to do would probably be to slay you right now that you are completely at my mercy. However, if I would be able to come up with a way to control that delicious power you possess, you would become quite a remarkable asset to my cause."

"Do your worst Orochimaru, I'll never give in!" replied the young shinobi heatedly, small traces of red appearing in his cerulean eyes for a split second before the surrounding seals absorbed the demonic chakra that had leaked from the seal that covered his belly.

"Unfortunately, I am currently incapable of doing so," continued Orochimaru, paying no heed to his prisoner's outburst and instead started to go through an unusually long and complex series of hand seals, finally ending with the ox seal. "Therefore I have decided to simply keep you away until I have found the means necessary to tame you."

"W-what are you doing?" asked Naruto as he desperately tried to break free, but his body didn't even budge an inch.

Rather than answer, the former Konoha ninja slammed his right palm down onto the smooth, jet black stone floor.

In the next second, as if a switch had been turned, all of the seals lit up in a blinding light. Naruto barely had any time to ponder upon this however as excruciating pain suddenly surged through his entire body, forcing him to roar out in agony. The last thing he saw before finally losing consciousness, was a pair of golden snake eyes that seemed to bore their way into his very soul.

******

Groaning, after what seemed like an eternity, Naruto finally began to wake up but when he placed his hand on his head, he then saw that he was free to move around, but then when he looked around himself.

Where was this?

Her fingers reached for it, but as they drew closer it slid further down, almost tauntingly. Whether it was a bug, or something else, she needed to get it out of her top.

115332222222222222222222221131.content:
Renka's hand slipped deeper into the valley of her chest in search of the foreign thing that had fallen. Her fingers feeling for any sign of the unknown invader in an attempt to quickly dislodge it from her body. Whatever it was, every time her reaching fingers tried to get to it, it would slip a little, just out of reach until it had almost come out the other side. Her hand snapped forward, and closed around the mysterious object before it could descended lower.

The girl's fingers closed around something warm and somewhat squishy, which she quickly pulled free from her cleavage. She was about ready to toss whatever it was across the room for being weird, that was until she got a good look at the offending thing. It looked almost human, from the clothes to the highly detailed hair that looked like was weaved strand by strand.

"Is this someone's doll?" Renka thought out loud as it dangled from her thumb and forefinger.

It had nicely tanned skin, marks on the cheeks that resembled three whisker marks on each, and bright yellow hair that was spiky and stuck up in all directions like the spines of a sea urchin. It had on a slim, form fitting orange tracksuit outfit with black on the upper shoulders area and the color extending from around the neck and shoulders, down the front and sleeves, as well as around the waist, a white swirl on the left side, a red swirl crest on the back, orange pants, the feet were covered by black sandals that covered the instep and ankles, yet left the toes and heels exposed and the pouches at it's waist and thigh were black. So was the headband it had on around it's forehead with a metal plate and swirled arrow symbol of some sort.

She proceeded to poke it with her other hand, examining it with mild curiosity. Where did it come from, and how had it gotten in her breasts in the first place. A quick look over to her window did show that it was open, so maybe someone managed to throw it through the gap, and it bounced off her ceiling and landed where it did by luck. She gave it one more prodding and saw the doll move slightly by itself. "Wow, it even moves. The toys in Japan are pretty hi-tech."

Renka place the orange and blonde doll on her dresser, propping it up against the wall, before she left the room for the time being to start her shift at Gekirin.

******

Groaning, Naruto's eyes fluttered open and he held his head. Man, just how hard did Lee hit him? He was so dizzy from the roundhouse to the head that everything looked gigantic.

Then he shook his head and his eyes widened. "WHAT THE HECK?!"

Everything WAS gigantic! What was more, he could swear this was someone's bedroom! Where the hell was he?!

Looking around, he spotted what looked like a family photo of a man, wife, and three kids.

One of the kids was girl that looked roughly his age. She had short dark blue hair done up in some strange cat ear like braids with bells tied to them. Her eyes were a light green and slightly silted. The girl's outfit really got his attention as it borderlined on appropriate. It looked like something Tenten would wear: a simple pink Chinese cheongsam with yellow outlines. The skirt however was extremely short, barely reaching her thighs, giving off a good view of her developed legs. The dress itself hugged against her body. This was made more distracting by the opening near the collar showing off some of her cleavage. Lastly she had a pair of simple purple Chinese shoes.

The girl in the photo was cute, he'd confess that much, but he wondered where in the heck he was.

Then he caught the aroma of various scents of cooked meals coming from somewhere and his stomach growled.

"Ok...no idea where I am, everything is huge, and I'm by myself..." the Uzumaki said to himself. He could either get out of this room and try finding someone, go get some food and try learning where he was, or rest. At least those seemed the best options he could come up with at the moment....

1153322222222222222222222211313.content:
Naruto slowly crept along as he adjusted to his current location with some difficulty. He didn't know where it was, or why everything looked like it was scaled for someone closer in size to Gamabunta than a human, but he was going to do everything he could to find out the answers. First thing he needed to do was get to higher ground to get a better layout of his surroundings, so he began to climb up the an adjacent piece of enormous furniture, the tallest thing he could reach from where he was.

The climb was arduous, as he had to move slowly due to still being out of breath from almost being smothered, and there was several hurdles on the nearly smooth surface of polished wood. If not for his rigorous conditioning under the tutelage of Jiraiya, he would not have had to strength to scale the sheer side of the obstacle. His fingers grabbed tightly to anything they could to ensure he would not plummet to an splattered end on the floor below.

After what seemed like forever, an out of breath Naruto managed to hoist himself over the edge and roll onto the flat surface at the top. He took a few moments to gather himself before looking over the edge and taking in his surroundings. First thing he verified was that he was indeed inside someone's bedroom, and that everything was scaled for a person many times his own size. Second thing he noticed was the door just to the right of his vantage point. Next step was to see if there was any way out of the room, and hopefully find someone who could explain what was going on and where he was.

A rope from his pouch, and kunai to for a makeshift anchor, and Naruto was propelling down the side of what he now saw was a giant wardrobe. The way down was much faster than his accent, and he was on the floor in minutes. A quick survey and he saw that this was not the way out he had hoped, as the gap under the door was blocked by a rug that slipped just under it. His arms slumped in dejection as he realized he would need to keep looking to find a way out, but first he needed to get off the floor.

The ninja sprinted over to the bed, and used the dangling sheets to climb swiftly up to the top, and not a second too soon, as thunderous footfalls boomed, each one drawing closer to the door. Naruto had just flopped down on the bedspread when the door swung open, and a giant who looked like the girl he had seen in the photo marched through the threshold.

The giantess set down some bags beside the door and made her way over to the bed on which he lay. Her eyes were quick to catch sight of him and she did a double take, as she looked back to where he awoke before locking back on him.

"I could of sworn I left you on the dresser," her cute but loud voice spoke as her hand descended to grab him. This was now a decision of whether or not he should talk to her, as it seemed she seemed to think he was a toy or something. Her body leaned forward, giving him a direct look down her dress and at the lovely emerald eyes that gazed at him. His time was running out, it was now or never.

A young man with blonde hair the size of a child's toy, but one who was very much alive as she could sense ki coming from it.

1153322222222222222222222222222132.content:
"Kai!" she shouted releasing her physical form and taking on her ascended form. Her hair became pink and stood out at the sides as if to form angelic wings while the back went vertical rising on the currents of her power. A vertical halo of golden light with a single separate point of light similar to the crown she had worn as a priestess formed above her head. Pink lines and symbols flowed across her form. Finally a tattered pale blue shawl seemed to dance about her and blue bangles encircled her wrists.

She raised her hand up and looked at it as she thought to herself, 'So many priestesses before me, I can even hear the voices of those who died before their time.'

'How far it all stretches back,' she mused as pink energy formed square seals below her feet that spread out away from her withing the black void that was Moryo.

"Now I see your true power is held in that bell of yours," growled out the voice of Moryo.

"So… this is the end?" she quietly muttered. Her eyes shining with unshead tears she said, "Naruto, can you hear me? From this day on… it's up to all of you to protect this world."

With a resigned smile she then stated, "Finally I know my destiny."

The memory of his speech at the lake came back to her, "It's not useless, I'll protect you. I swear on my Nindo. I promise."

"You're a terrible liar Naruto," she said with a quiet sob letting the tears fall. Raising her arms she began to focus her power. 'You and I, we will disappear together,' she thought as Moryo began to scream.

Suddenly she heard her bell ring and was pulled back into her mortal form with a look of shock and a grunt. "Shion snap out of it!" screamed Naruto's voice as she was yanked free of Moryo's embrace by him and a chain of his clones that launched them into the air. "Open your eyes and breathe!" he continued getting the sudden gasp and widening of her violet eyes he was looking for.

"Can you see? Can you hear? What is your heart telling you?" he questioned her rapidly as they came face to face. "Do you want to die like this or what?" he continued shouting as his cerulean eyes looked into her violet ones. Getting a strangled sob from her he finally asked, "Do you want to just fade away?"

'I…" she hesitantly said.

"I can't hear you!" he sarcastically responded. "Say it Shion! Say it in your own words! Come on let me hear it!" he screamed out tilting his head back as if to roar it.

"I want," she quietly began before shouting back at him in the same manner, "To Live!"

"All right then!" he gladly responded.

The bell started constantly ringing as it floated between their hands. He spoke haltingly as energy began to coalesce around the bell saying, "Me… and all my comrades… we don't bow down for anybody!"

It began to shine brightly as he turned his angry face to her to say, "You don't like the hand fate has dealt you, fight for a better one."

He looked back at the energy ball and called out, "Keep it coming. More!"

She grunted gently and the ball of light began to expand rapidly. "Everything your feeling just let it out," he encouraged as it grew to massive size.

Moryo's physical form began to burst free of the confines of the rock he had been buried within. "Too slow," Naruto stated.

As they reached the apogee of their flight Naruto held the massive sphere of energy above their heads. "You want it? Here have a taste of the Naruto to Shion no Cho Chakura Rasengan!" he yelled as they plummeted and he turned them to go head and Rasengan first into the demon causing Moryo to wail in pain as they came down upon him.

"I promised you didn't I? I said we were going to change your destiny and that's just what we're going to do." Naruto again shouted.

Shion closed her eyes and hugged him tighter saying quietly, "I'm with you mother."

Moryo seemed to explode into a column of light causing the earth to shake. The pathways and ceiling of the sealing chamber began to collapse into the magma below. Realizing their danger Shion reached to draw upon her power bound within the bell to attempt to once again go back in time and change their fate. She intended to go back just a few moments to the creation of the Rasengan and put a little less power into it in hopes that it wouldn't destabilize the cavern.

The power began to flow into her but suddenly spiked and she realized she was also drawing in the massive amounts of Naruto's chakra that surrounded and infused the bell. She could feel him as if they had become one being. She felt how similarly hard his life had been and could sense another malevolent entity sealed away within him his anger drawing upon its power feeding it into the bell and her as well. Then the massive influx of energy triggered the intended jutsu and the pair were ripped away into the past.

Ayame was now training on how to sense the shards of the Shikon Jewel to convince Koga to keep his promise to marry her, she was currently having a hard time sensing anything different than her traditional method with her nose.

But she wouldn't give up, as she sat still and attempted to start again, until she suddenly heard something nearby and then she sniffed out a couple of strange scents they were small scents, but they were close by to her and seeing as taking a break wouldn't hurt, Ayame then stood up and called her two wolves to follow her, but to keep quiet as she headed towards the two small scents.

Meanwhile, both Naruto and Shion were very confused as they both seemed to have been shrunken to being two inches tall and have been sent to a strange place while having no communication with either the Konoha or Suna shinobi.

Then they both felt the ground quake underneath them and Naruto had caught Shion as she was about to fall on her face until what they saw next caused them to look in fear as they saw a gigantic girl around their age who had a fair skin tone, red hair in pigtails and has green eyes. She was also wearing an iris flower in her hair and had a band that goes across her forehead like Naruto's ninja headband. Her clothing consists of white wolf fur draped over her shoulders, a necklace, white fur skirt, her feet were mostly bare except for the insteps, she also wore arm guards, and red and blue armor.

And if that wasn't enough to send the two shrunken blondes into a state of fear then the two gigantic white wolves that came with the giant girl did just that.

From Naruto and Shion's point of view the giant girl seemed to be looking for something while sniffing the air and this made Naruto wonder as he held Shion close to himself, 'I wonder if she's related to Kiba and the Inuzuka clan... judging by the way she looks and dressed it could be...'

"I know something is here in the clearing but it seems so small..." The giantess said to her wolves until she was about to unknowingly step on them with her foot, "PLEASE DON'T CRUSH US!!!" Shion screamed in fear as she hugged Naruto as he hugged her and closed their eyes, fortunately for them, Shion's scream reached the giantess' ears as she moved her foot back and looked in the grass and saw them.

"Alright...who are you two, and why are you both so small? You're both too small to be considered humans, and even smaller than a newborn demon, but I'm giving you both this chance to talk."

Looking up to the giant girl and her two wolves, both Naruto and Shion were willing to tell her everything. From who they were and where they were both from, to the whole reason as to how they got to this place, and how the very mission Naruto and Shion had been doing was to prevent a demon who was created from the darkness inside the hearts of others from destroying their world.

Hearing all this, Ayame was shocked and yet she fully seemed to understand their plight. She winced at the description of Mōryō...oh boy...Blackheart, huh? A type of demon born from the darkness inside the hearts of people...she thought (or rather, she had hoped) those types were just fictional! Always had to nip problems like those in the bud pre-haste!

"Ok... I get it. You're here now and so small as a side effect of things." the wolf demoness said, to which the tiny duo of ninja and priestess nodded. Ayame smiled down at them, "Well... Let me introduce myself, my name's Ayame," she said (noticing the little one in black and orange stare at her in shock before looking like he wanted to laugh about something for some reason), "princess of the Northern Wolf Demon tribe."

At that, the two shrunken humans tensed. Demon tribe?! As in Actual Demons!?

Seeing the two humans about to have a panic attack,"Relax... I get it, you both have reasons to be worried about demons, but did any other demons help this Mōryō creep?" Ayame sighed, unable to fault them their demon paranoia. It relieved her when they relaxed a bit. Before she started thinking.

These two strangely-dressed humans may have been small, but they were strong. Saving the world DID require that, after all. Maybe they could help her in her training so she could figure out how to see and sense the shards of the Shikon Jewel to convince Koga to keep his promise to marry her? Would be a boon... Or maybe her grandpa would know of a way to help these two get back to normal size and send them back to where they came from? She could take them with her to see him.

In the end, Ayame had fully decided to....

1153322222222222222222222222222221.content:
Naruto was walking through the Valley of Hell, as he was currently on a mission to try and find out if there was a lead on the Akatsuki that one of the members named Hidan may have left behind or not.

However the area he was searching in was a remote canyon located within the Land of Hot Water. Like many areas of the country, hot water naturally flows from the earth and pools in the valley; the water is rich with iron, causing it to turn red. Because of the water's temperature and because of the valley's geography, foul-smelling steam is always thick in the valley. This makes it quite inhospitable to live in, with no native animals and only minimal plant life.

And the steam was so thick that Naruto couldn't even see his own hand in front of his face.

Also, he had heard of rumors about a clan that was expelled from the Land of Lightning, how they were forced to settle in the Valley of Hell. When the people of Yugakure checked up on the clan a few months later, they somehow mistook the valley's red water for blood and assumed some calamity had befallen the poor clan; rather than investigate or even offer help, they officially declared that the valley is strictly off-limits and, over time, everyone had forgotten where it was even located.

Thinking of this, Naruto couldn't help but feel sad for this mysterious clan... he may not know the full story between this clan and the Land of Lightning, but it sounded completely unfair to him in his book, but... as much as he hated to say it... "What's done is done... and you can't change the past... You just learn from it and move on."

Feeling uncomfortable with that line of thinking, Naruto kept walking through the valley for a while until he heard something, and followed the sound until he found a large group of people fighting, seeing this, Naruto then ran to the people, "Hey, break it up! What's going on here!?"

However, when Naruto got close enough, the people then suddenly pounced upon him like a pride of lions on a wildebeest and had the blonde Uzumaki pinned down on the ground.

"Well now, this is unusual...nobody comes here these days."

"Personally, I hate having to do this...nobody comes here because they get attacked..." one of the others muttered.

"Shut it, you want the Chinoike clan dying out?!"

"No! I just find it goes against my morals to resort to ambushing travelers like this, is all."

"I understand, but survival against morality is always an ugly crossroads." Another said.

Then one of the people around him, members of this 'Chinoike Clan', Naruto guessed, saw his headband and hissed.

"Konoha?! That Uchiha-worshiping cesspool?!"

The others around him all muttered darkly in agreement and glared down at Naruto, who was more confused than ever. What did the Uchiha have to do with any of this?

The Chinoike all started debating on what to do with him, most ideas on how to get rid of him.

"Hold on, I've got an idea." one said, then stepped up to Naruto and pulled out a single pill that had a blue and red checker design and was ovular in shape, then shoved it into Naruto's mouth and forced him to swallow it.

Once the pill landed into his stomach, Naruto suddenly began to feel dizzy and tired as his whole world was now spinning until he felt himself for some reason getting smaller and smaller until he finally passed out.

Before he got too small, the Chinoike member picked Naruto up with a pair of tweezers and then placed him into the middle of a syringe needle and used a water style bubble jutsu around the liquid to allow him to breath as he slept.

"So what do we do with him now?"

"Well...people have forgotten what our clan's power can do...How about a guided tour of our abilities?" The one that forced the pill down Naruto's throat said, their eyes suddenly changing so that they suddenly had blood red sclera, with a black pupil with a purple horizontal bar in the middle of the pupil.

The other clan members all grinned wickedly at that. At the mercy of the Ketsuryūgan's ability to manipulate blood? That would be interesting for that Uchiha-worshiper to deal with!

"I'll do it!" One of them said and they came forward. It was a ten-year-old looking girl that had short, neck-length, spiky light-blonde hair; two thick strands reaching onto her rosy cheeks, she also had violet eyes with small brows.

Going up, she took the syringe and looked at it. "In a way, I feel kinda sorry for you." she said, then put the needle in her arm and pushed the plunger down all the way, her eyes changing to the Ketsuryūgan as she did so.

--- Later ---

Naruto was slowly waking up and shook his head. Looking around, he was instantly confused when he saw he wasn't in the Valley of Hell anymore. But where was he now? Nothing looked familiar at all...

Then suddenly, Naruto saw a large column of dirt heading towards him, "What's that? A dust storm?" When he took a closer look, Naruto gasped to see a large group of pale colored men in white suits all stampeding towards him and for some reason, Naruto felt a immense and extremely powerful bloodlust coming off the group.

"GERM!!!!!!!!!!! THERE'S THE GERM!!!! I'M GOING TO SO FREAKING KILL IT!!!!! YOU'RE DEAD GERM! DO YOU HEAR ME?!!!!! DEAD!!!!!!!"

"AHHHHH!!!!!" Naruto screamed as he saw the large group of weird and insane, knife-using, pale people rushing towards him, making Naruto run for his life, "This is nuts! It's basically my whole childhood all over again!"

"YOU WON'T GET AWAY YOU FILTHY GERM!!!! YOU'RE DEAD!!!!" some of the insane pale people said as they chased him with demented blood crazed and murderous looks in their eyes.

Not really paying attention to where he was going, Naruto soon crashed into somebody while making a sharp turn in hopes to escape this psycho mob and when he opened his eyes he saw that he crashed into...
1153322222222222222222222222222221.title: Get to work in there, Naruto!

11533222222222222222222222222222211.content:
Not really paying attention to where he was going, Naruto soon crashed into somebody while making a sharp turn in hopes to escape this psycho mob and when he opened his eyes he saw that he crashed into someone.

Looking up, Naruto saw who he'd crashed into was an average sized girl that looked to be in her teens with amber brown eyes and short red hair with an ahoge lock pointing outwards under a red delivery cap. She also wore a short-sleeved red jacket over a black shirt, white gloves, denim short shorts with a red belt, and red sneakers with black socks.

"Oh! I'm sorry!" the Uzumaki said, helping her up and noticing a package box laying next to them. So she was a courier, then. That explained the look.

Suddenly hearing a sound like a stamped drawing nearer, the ninja remembered why he'd been running.

"Oh great, those pasty knife psychos again!" He cursed. Still holding the girl's hand, he bolted. But by the time he realized he was taking her along with him, he figured it was for the best anyways. No telling what those slice-happy nutcases would do to a bystander, and Naruto was in no mood to find out.

"Hey! Wait! I need to go and deliver that!" The redhead wailed, trying to go back for that package she'd dropped when they crashed into one another, yet was unable to break his grip.

"Look, I'm sorry. But do you want those crazies to kill you?!" Naruto shouted over his shoulder to her.

Seeing her pale and rapidly shake her head in the negative was all the answer he needed.

"Hey, you're a courier, right? Which way is the best one out of here?"

"Uhhh...." the redhead looked suddenly sheepish.

"...You gotta be kidding me..." Naruto said faintly.

"TIME TO DIE!!!!!!" A shout came from behind them.

"Those are...!" the redhead said, then turned to look at him and started trying to pull away, "What do you intend to to this place?!"

"Do I look like I wanna cause trouble?! I don't even know where I am!" Naruto told her, panicked. Rounding a corner, he skid to a stop, blood draining from his face.

Dead end!

Thinking quickly before he turned to the girl, he squeezed her hands, "Please! I need your help! Gotta get me out of here!"

"Wha...how?!" she sputtered.

Naruto put his hands together in a handsign, "Transform!" And suddenly, in a plume of smoke, Naruto was gone and in his place was a simple box.

She gawked, amazed at what Naruto did before carefully picking him up and proceeded to take the Uzumaki to a safe place.

When the girl, who looked far more lost than ever and was carrying Naruto while he was in his box transformation, left the guys in white behind, she went over to a bench and sat down, when she set Naruto next to her, he resumed his natural body.

"Thanks...ummm...." Naruto trailed off.

"Oh." she said, then pointed to her cap, "I'm AE3803."

Naruto blinked, huh? An identification number? He was expecting a name. Then he recalled the time he had decided to ghostwrite a manuscript for Jiraiya and had a courier ninja deliver it. Those guys addressed themselves by identification numbers, too. Must've been a courier thing.

"Well, thanks for helping save my life. I swear...where is this place? Never seen anything like it..." Naruto told her, looking around.

AE3803 blinked. Huh? He didn't know he was in...? Oh, this guy must have been like the Cedar Pollen Allergens: harmless, but in trouble just because he was somewhere he didn't mean to be. She felt a flash of pity, poor guy...

"By the way, I'm...." Naruto stopped and his eyes widened as he grabbed his throat as he fell to his knees, his head suddenly spinning as he started gasping, unable to breath. What was going on?! Why couldn't he breath all of a sudden?!

AE3803 quickly realized that her new friend was suffocating and she began running around screaming, "WHAT AM I GOING TO DO!?", three times until she had an idea as but she hesitated as she reached for the one of the O2 tanks she was supposed to deliver. The cell she was suppose to deliver it to needed it, but her new friend needed it more. She didn't know what to do! But whatever she decided, she had to do it fast!

131.content:
It had been weeks since his last mission had ended, and Naruto was beginning to lose his mind from boredom. It was like the demand for his awesome ninja skills had suddenly dried up, and he was left killing time around town, mostly at his favorite ramen stand. Now, though, he was bored as hell.

In his desperation to find something to occupy his time, the hyperactive ninja came across a rumor of a shrine at the very outskirts of the village. Here say of odd occurrences, and a strange presence that could not be explained.

So, desperate for any form of activity that would get him out of his apartment, Naruto left for the shrine.

After an hour of trudging along the outskirts of the village, the young shinobi found the slightly decrepit shrine. It was obvious at first glance that no one had lived there for years. The wood building was showing signs of serious decay, with patches of the roof missing and sapling trees growing out of the sidewalk.

Walking through the decrepit grounds, Naruto kept his eyes open for the supposed apparition. The blond ninja left nothing unexplored, even overturning rocks in his hunt for the subject of the rumors.

With each passing minute, the ninja became increasingly frustrated. Had he just wasted his day looking for something that doesn't exist?

"What a rip off!" Naruto bellowed, throwing his arms up in frustration. In a fit of mixed rage, boredom, and frustration, Naruto lashed out with his foot, sending a loose rock careening into the broken down building.

His ears were immediately met with an echoing crash from within the structure. Soon after, the hairs on the back of his neck stood on end and the ninja was filled with a great dread. A harsh whirlwind started up, swirling leaves and dust about in a foreboding cyclone.

Within the wall of wind a silhouette appeared, large and imposing, from which came a thundering voice.

"What unimaginable fool dares to defile my home?!" The voice roared in fury. Naruto could practically feel the moment when the being's attention fell on him.

"Uh...yeah, sorry about that, " Naruto apologized, laughing nervously. An act which the entity took exception to.

"You laugh at the destruction of my home? Have you no shame human?"

It was never said that Naruto was among the smartest ninja in Konoha. By anyone. Ever. So, it wouldn't surprise anyone in the village to hear that the blond ninja managed to piss off a rather volatile spirit with almost no effort on his part.

"Hey, it was an accident! I didn't even know you lived here!"

If the apparition was angry before, Naruto's blunt response had made it absolutely furious. Without saying a word, the spirit summoned its power, creating a swirling vortex of energy around the gapping blond idiot.

"You shall suffer for your arrogance, mortal!"

With a loud pop, Naruto disappeared from his world, and ended up...
131.title: Naruto learns spirits can be a-holes

choices: Azula cagesNaruto and takes him with her to meet Mai and Ty Lee
Azula decided to playfully (by her definition)  use Naruto as target practice
Azula decides to train/force Naruto to be her own personal mini-slave
1312.content:
Naruto winced as everything spun, while excruciating pain surged through his entire body, forcing him to roar out in agony before finally losing consciousness...

OoOoOoO

As Naruto ever so slowly started to regain consciousness, his senses started to take in the impressions of his surroundings. He tiredly, hesitantly started to open his eyes. Once that was done, he raised his head and rubbed it to relieve it of the pounding he felt before Looking up.

...And as soon as he did so, Naruto felt his jaw drop.

He was looking up at a girl whose entire presence screamed of unchallengeable authority and nobility. Her entire body was dressed in something that could be best described as a battle uniform that somewhat resembled Samurai armor and her dark hair was tied back with a red piece of metal, obviously made to look like a burning flame that reminded Naruto of a crown, only allowing two locks to frame her aristocratic face and her amber eyes seemed cold as ice.

What was most shocking, however, was her sheer size! 554 feet, 7 11⁄32 inches, from the look of things!

She was like some living monument!

Looking down, Naruto had to stifle a gasp. He was in her lap! Standing on her thighs as she sat down in what looked like a throne designed to look like a pillar of flame.

Where was this?! WHO was this?! What had happened to him?!

"Aaarrraaaghh! What happened to me?! I don't understand this at all!" Naruto cried, holding his head. Apparently, he was louder than he realized, because he was suddenly cast in a shadow and looked up and paled as he saw he had been spotted and made to run, but a feminine hand closed around him.

The girl whose lap he had been plucked from's full, red lips tugged into a smirk as she raised him to her face and examined him, turning him around tilting him forward and backwards like he was new toy she had received. She regarded Naruto like he was an especially interesting science specimen—one she couldn't wait to dissect.

"Well, well now...what do I have here?" she asked.

Naruto raised an eyebrow. Whoever this girl was, she wasn't speaking the language that people did in Konoha and the rest of the Elemental Nations, but somehow, he knew the language as if he had been speaking it his whole life. That spirit that dumped him here must have done something to him to make that the case.

The girl looked at him expectantly. Then suddenly frowned before her hand suddenly grew unnaturally warm and Naruto yelped as if he'd been burned. He looked up at the girl. How had she done that?!

"What was that for?!" he demanded, which probably wasn't smart, but he didn't like what had happened to him.

"Don't keep me waiting then." the girl said simply, as if explaining how one and one was two.

"Well excuse me, But you're...well...you're a lot to take in."

What does that mean?" she said narrowing her eyes as they blazed threateningly. Her grip tightened and Naruto cried out as she started to crush him.

"You're impressive." Naruto gasped out, which was pretty true, finding himself in her lap was pretty mind-blowing for him.

The girl instantly loosened her grasp and Naruto greedily sucked in air.

"Well now...that's perfectly understandable." the giantess said with a tone of smug satisfaction, "So I'm impressive and it left you shocked and gaping." she nodded as if this made perfect sense.

Sheesh...Naruto thought someone had an ego issue as the girl looked him over again.

"So who or what are you?" she said.

"My name's Naruto. Naruto Uzumaki. Shinobi of Konoha and future Hokage."

The girl blinked at that declaration, not having the slightest idea what a shinobi or a Hokage could possibly be, but decided to not ask anything about it at the moment.

"Well...to answer who Iam, I am Princess Azula, daughter of Fire Lord Ozai, and l plan to one day rule the grand and glorious Fire Nation as it's queen."

A princess, huh? Well...that explained the ego.

But what the heck was a "Fire Nation", some kind of spin off on the Land of Fire? And what was a "Fire Lord?" Naruto raised an eyebrow at the names. "You wouldn't happen to have a map, would you?" he asked.

In response, to the question, Azula turned him towards one wall where one hung up in a frame.

The blond shinobi looked over the map for a brief second, but what he saw caused his eyes to nearly bulge out of their sockets.

During his travels with Jiraiya, Naruto had often gotten stuck with the task of reading the map. It wasn't that the Toad Sage couldn't do it himself, on the contrary, he could practically find his way in the world as if it had been his own pocket, but he'd thought it would do his young apprentice good to learn how to properly orientate.

It had been tedious and just overall boring. But if there was one thing the blonde had managed to learn, then that was how the world looked like.

However, the map that he was currently holding in his hand didn't look remotely like anyone he had ever seen before.

Naruto looked at the map for a couple of more seconds before letting out a sigh of exasperation. "Alright. I just know I'm going to regret asking this, but what exactly does this map show? Because if it's a map of the world, then where the hell are all the Shinobi Nations?!" he said.

"What are you talking about? You're not making any sense," frowned Azula.

"I'm not making any sense? You're the one who isn't making any sense! You're talking about nations, lords of fire, and and now you expect me to believe that the world consists of just four nations?!"

"Look all I know is some spirit or something dumped me here." Naruto complained.

Azula looked at him. Well...that explained a lot. Who knew what spirits could do? So one had shrunk him, transported him here, and (apparently) taken his memory, far as she figured.

"Ok, whatever...do you know where you're from at least?" she asked.

Naruto raised an eyebrow, she was talking to him like he had amnesia, "I'm from Konoha. The village hidden in the leaves."

"Right... And that would be where, exactly?" The name didn't say her anything, but she was interested. Somewhere new to concur.

Naruto looked at her oddly for a second, blinking a couple of times. "In the Land of Fire, of course," he continued.

Azula looked at him a few times, blinked a little, then scowled. Lier! She didn't know of any place called that in the Fire Nation! But before she could call him out on it, she stopped...he'd said it was a hidden village. Of course she'd never have heard of it!

"Well...no need to worry about any trouble you'll have getting home any longer." she said absently.

At that Naruto brightened. Why not? Did this mean that she'd help him?!

"I don't?" he asked.

"Of course you don't, after all..." she suddenly tightened her grip, squeezing him again. "You. Are. Mine!"
1312.title: In the lap of a sadistic fire nation princess

choices: Ty Lee and Mai happily join in the fun
13121.content:
Anger and fear swelled in the tiny ninja's mind as he fought hopelessly against the tight grip of Azula. His terror level jumped when the sadistic princess started off towards an unknown destination with him in hand.

Azula couldn't help laughing to herself a little as her mind filled with ideas concerning what she could do with her newest possession. She couldn't wait to break in her little plaything. However, one particular idea stood out in her mind, and that was showing her friends. After all, a toy was most fun when you could show it off to others. Finding a servant, the Fire Nation princess sent them to summon her friends.

*****

Mai and Ty Lee arrived at the same time. They both knew how much their mutual friend held punctuality in high regard, and the things she would do if someone was tardy in responding to her summons.

"What do you think Azula wants?" Ty Lee asked her dispassionate friend while doing a handstand. The nimble girl had a habit of doing acrobatics when bored. To her left, a girl her age leaned against a wall, balancing a throwing knife on her index finger with an almost disinterested look.

"I really don't care," the black-haired girl said monotonously, "I only came so she wouldn't throw lightning at me later."

"Well, I hope it's something good, I can't believe how boring it's been around here lately," Ty Lee said in exasperation.

The two didn't have to wait long for answers, as their royal friend appeared with an amused smirk on her lips.

"So nice to see you again girls. I'm so glad you could get here so quickly. Follow me, I have something good to show you."

The two followed their friend into her private quarters, where they were quickly left alone by the the princess' servants. After she was sure they were completely alone, Azula brought forth something she had hidden on her person, beckoning Ty Lee and Mai to get a closer look.

"I found this little guy snooping around my room," she said as her friends got a close look at her find. "I just had to keep him. Can you imagine all the fun we could have with him? I've decided to make him my little toy, and make him serve my every need. You'll help me break him in, won't you?"
13121.title: Azula brings in her team

choices: Naruto is to have his spirit broken, as she treats him like a toy
Azula calls in some friends to help with his training
13123.content:
Within Azula's crushing grip, the displaced ninja struggled to free himself from the constricting fingers. Little by little, his fighting weakened, as his lungs struggled to draw in breath. As Naruto fought his captor, the princess condescendingly pet the top of his head with her finger, ruffling his hair just to irk him all the more.

"Come now," Azula mocked playfully, "the sooner you stop fighting it, the easier it will be for you. Just resign yourself to being mine forever, and I'll make sure you are well looked after."

Naturally, Naruto took offense to the very suggestion, and struggled all the more. It didn't take long for Azula to get tired of his little resistance, and just put him in his place.

"Since you refuse to listen to reason, I guess that I'll have to teach you the hard way."

Tightening her grip even more, the Fire Nation princess drove all the air from tiny ninja's lungs, and prevented him from taking another breath until he finally passed out. Releasing her grip, she let the miniscule frame of her new slave rest in the palm of her hand, unconscious, but once again breathing.

'Mmm...how best to get you accustomed to your new role in life...'

****

Naruto came to, only to see the large, molten gold eyes of the firebending girl who had him at her mercy. The evil smile on her lips sent shivers down his spine.

"Well, my new toy, I suppose I should drive it into that thick skull of your's that you belong to me for good. and I feel that what better way to do this than to mark you forever as mine."

A flash of blue fire incinerated Naruto's shirt, but left the rest of him unscathed, but the sheer amount of heat causing the young shinobi to pass out. A sinister look in her eyes, Azula flipped him over, and proceeded to mark him as her's forever.

Placing down her paint brush, Azula traced her finger along the new addition to Naruto's back, admiring her handiwork, now permanently marked onto the small shinobi. Emblazoned onto the blond ninja's flesh was the flame symbol of the Fire Nation. Thanks to the ink she used, no matter how much he tried to wash it off, he would never be rid of her symbol.

"There," she said, a twisted joy present in her voice, "now everyone can tell that you are mine."

"I can't wait for you to wake up, because I have so much planned for you."

132.content:
Space and time ninjutsu are not something to be trifled with, especially by someone as knuckle-headedly dense as Uzumaki Naruto.

While going through the village marketplace, the young ninja had stumbled across a traveling caravan filled with clothes, games, and many other things from all over the continent, and even from across the sea. At first, he ignored the merchants, except for the occasional curious glance at the interesting trinket or shiny object. He was just about to move on to get some food, when someone called his attention.

"You there!" one of the more shifty looking merchants said, pointing right at Naruto, "You look like you have the making of an extraordinary shinobi. I could tell the moment I laid my eyes on you that you had the makings of something great, and I have just the thing to help you."

Naruto turned his head towards the noisy man, his eye squinting in annoyance. He was about to dismiss the suspicious man, when the merchant shoved something in his face.

"This scroll," he said, continuing his sales pitch, "comes from the archive of one of the most accomplished shinobi to ever live. It is a technique on par with the infamous jutsu of your Fourth Hokage. A marvelous space-time jutsu which will make you unstoppable."

Unfortunately, some people are easily suckered in by a smooth sales pitch and mild flattery, and Naruto was just such a person. The teenage ninja left the market that day with a lighter wallet, and a scroll containing an unverified technique, heading straight for a secluded area to try it out for the first time.

In the field he chose to train, Naruto sat with his legs crossed, looking purposefully at the supposed jutsu. It wasn't long before he had the hand signs memorized, and was ready for a trial run.

Supposedly, the technique was supposed to move him seamlessly from one place to another. His fingers blurred as he sped through the hand seals, and with a surge of chakra, fell unconscious before fading out of existence.

*****

A distant rumble shook the sleeping blond, causing him to shift in his sleep, trying to get comfortable again. Just as he found the best position, he was jerked again by yet another miniscule quake. This time, it was enough to jar a slight bit of consciousness out of the boy, who moaned pitifully, and tried to return to the dreaming world. It was not meant to be, however, as an even bigger tremor finally brought him to.

"I swear that someone has it out for me," Naruto groaned as he sat up, folding his arms over his chest in frustration.

It was never a good thing when you woke up and had no idea where you are. Therefore, Naruto decided that getting a look around the area would be a wise thing to do.

Scanning his surroundings, it was immediately clear that something was very wrong. All around him were things like a bed, table, and dresser, but scaled for a person hundreds of feet tall.

"What the hell is going on here?" he cried in panic.

In his state of alarm, Naruto failed to notice that the tremors that had woken him had returned, and were getting bigger. It was only when he heard the loud sound of an opening door that he saw what was happening.

In the massive doorway stood a colossal young woman, wearing clothes of varying shades of blue and white. Her body had well toned muscle, and dark tan skin. Compared to her, the blond ninja was relatively a couple inches tall. Each step she took shook Naruto even more, and she was getting closer.

Not wanting to end up squashed beneath the foot of this admittedly beautiful titan, the Konoha shinobi would rather risk going through the open door, and made a mad dash for it.
132.title: Legend of Korra

choices: Korra stays up and tries to get answers
Korra is too tired, and places him in her cleavage for the night
Someone overheard Korra talking and entered the room
1321.content:
While the miniature shinobi ran across the floor, Korra was letting out a yawn after a long day of training. Now all she wanted to do was sit down, kick up her feet, and relax. The tired Avatar bent down to remove her shoes, when she caught sight of the blonde ninja sprinting towards the door. Curiosity took hold, and Korra's hand snatched out and grabbed the tiny thing.

"Just what in the world are you?" she asked, raising the captured thing to her eyes.

"Put me down, dammit!" Naruto screamed, struggling in her grip. His efforts proved futile, as the giant fingers held him firmly in place.

Of all the things it could have been, a tiny person was not at all what Korra was expecting. Bringing the little person closer, she scanned him up and down with her wide, blue eyes.

"No way!" Korra exclaimed in disbelief bringing her free hand to the tiny person she held, probing curiously at him. "How did you get so tiny?"

"Stop poking me, dammit! And I'm not tiny, you're just huge!" Naruto yelled back in anger.

"Well then, mister, just what were you doing in this 'huge' girl's room?" Korra asked, staring him down with accusing eyes.
1321.title: Korra spots Naruto

choices: Naruto tries to escape during the night
Naruto is trapped and has to stay until morning
13212.content:
The tiny person's silence began to wear on Korra's patience, and she was not the most accommodating Avatar incarnation. The day had already taken its tole on her, and her body was sending signals that she needed sleep. She could deal with this weirdness in the morning, she would just need to make sure he was there.

"I can't deal with this right now. I've had a long day, and this can wait until tomorrow." Korra groaned as she tried to blink the tiredness from her eyes.

From his place between her thumb and forefinger, Naruto cringed at the irritation in her voice. He didn't like this one bit, he was at the mercy of a tired, ornery titaness who could squash him into paste if she felt the whim to.

"I should keep you somewhere so that you can't run away before you can answer my questions."

Korra thought for a moment or two, only for her weariness to fall over her again, and she decided thinking was too hard now, and did the only thing she could think of, and pulled her shirt open. Her brown skinned cleavage was exposed, and she brought the blond ninja straight to it.

"Take a good look, tiny, this is going to be where you sleep for the night. I hope you enjoy your stay."

Korra plunged her hand into the pressed, brown flesh of her breasts, and planted Naruto deep into the soft valley.

"Good night, little guy." Korra whispered before the light went out. The only noise to be heard was the rush of her breathing and the steady drum of her heart.
13212.title: Bedding down between Korra's pillows

choices: Korra wakes up and sees he tried to escape and is pissed
Korra wakes up and doesn't care, only focused on getting answers
Korra forgets he was even there and goes about her day with him in her cleavage
132122.content:
Naruto did his best to fight his way out from between the mountainous breasts into which he had been wedged. The tanned flesh seemed to want to swallow him no matter how much he struggled against it.

'Please don't let me die from being smothered by a huge pair of boobs!' Naruto prayed to himself. He knew he wouldn't here the end of it from Jiraiya if he went out like that.

The world around him shifted as the giantess he was atop turned in her sleep, parting the mounds just enough for him to get a little slack. It was an opportunity that Naruto tried to take advantage of, using the extra wiggle room to begin to slip free from his confines. He managed to get partway out when the girl flipped onto her other side, bringing her other tit down onto his legs. The blond ninja tried to move as quickly as he could, but only managed to lose a shoe for his trouble. Only his upper torso was free now while the rest of him remained trapped between the titanic breasts.

'Son of a bitch' Naruto cursed internally once again finding himself unable to get free and he tiredly closed his eyes and let sleep claim him as well.
