133.content:
A simple mistake in trying to recreate his father's signature technique was all it took to send Naruto plummeting through a seemingly infinite tunnel with no way of telling when, or if, it would end. All he had wanted to do was learn more about his birth parents since he had first discovered their true identities, but he guessed this was too much to ask.

His body spiraled out of control as he reached terminal velocity. If he landed, Naruto knew it was going to hurt like hell. His eyes watered as the harsh air, which he was thankful for, slammed into his face, and blurred his vision. Which was why he never saw the exit coming until he flew through it. The only question now was, where would he land?
133.title: Naruto lands in Jump City

choices: Starfire wakes up and discovers the little ninja
Starfire sneezed, and sent him flying off the bed
Raven comes in to wake up Starfire
1331.content:
Naruto’s landing was far softer than he had ever hoped, as the ground was plush, and had a lot of give. His vision was filled with pink, as the soft material he had crashed on expanded out toward the horizon. With a grunt, the ninja pulled himself from the crater he had made when he arrived, and started to walk in the hopes of finding out where he was, and if there was someone who could help him.

The terrain was an unnatural color, and the land to his right rose up into great, pink hills. The area to his left seemed to end in a sudden drop which led into a sea. Naruto realized that he should probably get a better lay of the land before continuing, and headed towards the hills.

He began his climb, his uncertainty pushed him hard to reach the top. The ninja had made it halfway up the peak when the earth around him shifted, and trembled. He held on to the soft handhold he had made for dear life, as the hills seemed to turn, and flung him upwards a great distance, where the big picture was finally made clear.

He had not landed outside, but rather in the bed of a giant, orange skinned, red haired girl, if the colossal mounds on her chest were to be believed. The ocean he had seen had been outside a giant pane of glass. All this he discovered as he arced through the air, and sped towards the giantess’ forehead, off which he bounced and rolled onto the bridge of her nose.
1331.title: Naruto lands on Starfire's bed

choices: help him find a way back home.
13311.content:
As soon as he saw where he had landed, Naruto knew he had to get away from this giantess as soon as possible. He realised if he didn't get off, there was no telling what would happen. Thoughts of him getting squashed, eaten, or breathed in drifted into his head. Suddenly, the object he was standing on started to shift. He looked to the rest of the giant's face and noticed she was starting to wake up. When she started to open her eyes, he noticed how green they were. It wouldn't be wrong to say they were like emeralds shining in the light.While they were opening, she slowly started to rise up to get out of bed. Naruto quickly realised this and used his used his chakra to stay on her nose as she started to get up. As she yawned, the sound was like a tailed beast's roar, to his perspective. Finally, she started to move her body to stand and get ready for the day.

When she reached her full height, Naruto realised just how small he was compared to the rest of the world he was in. The bed he had landed on looked as big as an entire country to him. The woman he was on was even more so. To her, he was truelly the size of an incredibly small bug to her. As Naruto let the thoughts sink in, the emerald eyed goddess finally started to walk. As soon as she started, Naruto felt a small force try to push him against the nose he now clung to. The loud booms in the distance reminded him that this was still a living being who could easily snuff his life out with a small movement. He quickly held on even more so he wouldn't fall of and end up as a small stain on the floor. While there, he decided to check his surroundings to try to figure out where he was heading. "Okay. It looks like she is in a long hallway. That means she is either heading to a restroom or is heading into the kitchen to get food. Either of those won't end well for me if I fall off. Hopefully I'll be able to get her attention before anything happens to me." Naruto said to himself. Finally, she reached her destination. "Okay. Looks like she went to the bathroom. Hopefully I'll get here attention soon."

To Starfire, the day started out kind of odd. First she woke up in the middle of her dream after feeling something hit her forehead. She figured at first it was Beast Boy just pulling a prank on her to wake her up. She looked around, but couldn't see anything that would point to Beast Boy playing a prank on her. Next, she felt as if someone else was in the room with her. Again, she looked around trying to see if anyone was in the room with her. There was no one else in there with her, as far as she could tell, but the feeling still wouldn't leave her. Putting it into the back of her mind, she got up to begin her day. As she left her room and went to the bathroom to brush her teeth, she still couldn't shake the feeling that someone was near her. When she reached the bathroom, she quickly went to the mirror to get ready. As she stood there, she finally noticed a tiny speck on the tip of her nose. "Huh? What is this tiny thing on my nose?"

To Naruto, it happened suddenly. As she was looking in the mirror, she suddenly said, "HUH? WHAT IS THIS TINY THING ON MY NOSE?" To Naruto, this could be a chance to get discovered and hopefully saved. He started jumping up and down, waving his arms, and yelling as loud as he could to get her attention. "HEY! I'M DOWN HERE! PLEASE HELP ME! I DON'T UNDERSTAND WHAT HAPPENED BUT SOMETHING CAUSED ME TO SHRINK AND END UP HERE! PLEASE, HELP!" shouted Naruto, hoping to be heard. Suddenly, two fingers appeared out of nowhere to grab him. Taking this as a good sign, Naruto gladly let himself be grabbed and brought up to her eyes. "HMM. WHAT ARE YOU? MAYBE SOME KIND OF BUG? YOU'RE ORANGE SO MAYBE YOU ARE AN EARTH BUG." Starfire said to herself. "HOW DID YOU GET HERE, THOUGH?" To Naruto, when he heard bug, he tried his hardest to be heard. "I'M NOT A BUG! I AM A HUMAN BEING THAT ENDED UP SHRUNKEN IN YOUR ROOM!" To most people, his screams wouldn't even reach their ears, but Starfire was not an earthling, but a Tameranian princess.


"WAIT, WHAT? YOU SAY YOU ARE A HUMAN? HOW DID YOU GET SO SMALL THEN? AND HOW DID YOU GET INTO THE TOWER?" Starfire asked him. Glad to be heard by this titanic beauty, Naruto was glad to explain how he got her and ended up shrunken. "SO IT WAS YOU WHO WOKE ME UP EARLIER THEN. THAT EXPLAINS THE FEELING THAT SOMEONE WAS WATCHING ME AS WELL. I'M GLAD TO KNOW THAT IT WAS JUST YOU AND NOT AN ENEMY." Starfire said to him. "THAT'S GOOD TO HEAR, BUT COULD YOU PLEASE HELP ME!? I NEED TO GO BACK TO MY WORLD AND SHOW MY FRIENDS I'M OKAY!" Starfire was actually troubled with this. While she could possibly get home, she could also keep him as a pet to keep her company. While she has been here for a while, she also gets lonely sometimes. Sure she had the rest of the titans with her, but there are still times when she is lonely or sad and needs someone to talk to, and he was the perfect size to keep with her at all times. Slowly, she made up her mind. She decided to...
13311.title: Starfire wakes up and discovers the little ninja

choices: "...ONLY MAKE YOU STAY IN THE BOOT FOR THIRTY MINUTES."
"...I WILL BE KIND AND LET YOU OFF WITH A WARNING."
133112.content:
"I AM SORRY NARUTO, BUT I HAVE DECIDED TO KEEP YOU AS MY PET. THIS IS TOO GOOD A CHANCE TO PASS UP FOR ME. I WILL FINALLY HAVE SOMEONE I CAN TALK TO AND COMFORT ME WHENEVER I WANT. I UNDERSTAND THAT YOU PROBABLY WILL NOT LIKE THIS AT FIRST, BUT DON'T WORRY. I WILL TREAT YOU WITH AS MUCH CARE AND ATTENTION, THAT YOU WILL LOVE TO BE MINE. WHY, MAYBE WE CAN BE SOMETHING MORE AFTER ALL THIS. FOR NOW, THOUGH, I HAVE TO FIND A PLACE TO HIDE YOU FROM MY TEAM MATES." When Naruto heard this, he was not only upset, but extremely worried. "How will I escape this crazy person!?!" thought Naruto. "Not only will she not help me get home, but now she wants me as her pet!? What the heck is up with this world!?!"

Naruto quickly tried to talk her out of this."WAIT! YOU CAN'T DO THIS! I'M A HUMAN BEING, NOT SOME ANIMAL YOU CAN KEEP WITH YOU. I JUST WANT TO GET HOME TO MY FRIENDS AND LOVED ONES. DOESN'T THAT MATTER TO YOU!?" shouted Naruto to Starfire. "NONSENSE. FOR ONE, HUMANS DON'T REALLY COME IN YOUR SIZE. SECOND, THIS WILL BE YOUR NEW HOME AND I WILL BE YOUR LOVED ONE. EVENTUALLY, I WILL ALSO SHOW YOU TO MY FRIENDS RAVEN AND JINX. THEY COULD BE YOUR LOVED ONES TOO." Starfire replied to him. "Well, that didn't work. Time for plan B." Thought Naruto. "OKAY, BUT WHAT ABOUT FOOD, WATER AND SHELTER!? WHILE I'M STILL SMALL, I STILL NEED THESE TO SURVIVE. HOW CAN I GET THESE THINGS IF I'M YOUR PET!?" "EASY." replied Starfire. "THE FOOD AND WATER I CAN BRING TO YOU AND FEED YOU EVERY DAY. THE SHELTER PART IS THAT YOU WILL USUALLY BE WITH ME. EVEN IF YOU ARE NOT, I CAN EASILY GO AND BUY A CAGE OR BOX FOR YOU TO STAY IN." "There went plan B. Let's try C." "WHAT ABOUT MY LIFE!? I CAN'T LIVE IT IF I'M STUCK IN SOME CAGE OR POCKET. WHAT ABOUT SUNLIGHT, OR THE WIND!? THOSE ARE IMPORTANT TOO!" "I HAVE ALREADY THOUGHT OF THAT, NARUTO. AFTER AWHILE, WHEN YOU DECIDE TO STAY WITH ME, I WILL GLADLY LET YOU OUT. I WILL EVEN PLAY WITH YOU MYSELF. NOW PLEASE, BE QUIET. IM TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHAT TO PUT YOU IN." And with that she put him onto the sink and ended the discussion.

"Oh great. Now how am I supposed to escape?" thought Naruto. As if the gods were answering his prayers, Starfire decided to turn away and look for something to place him in. "Perfect," thought Naruto. "Now maybe I can escape." He slowly began to walk his way down to the floor as quietly as he could. When he made it down, he looked at Starfire to make sure she wasn't looking. Seeing that she wasn't, he quickly made his way to the door. "If I can get passed that door, I might be able to find someone who will help me. I'm sorry Starfire, but I can't be your pet. I have people waiting for me." Half way to the door, he heard Starfire say in the distance, "I'm sorry Naruto but I can't seem to find anything here. We might have to go back to my room and find something there. Naruto? Naruto? Why won't you ans-" she stopped mid sentence after seeing Naruto was gone. "NARUTO!!" she said angrily. "Where are you Naruto!? I know your still here." Hearing this, Naruto quickly turned it up to high gear and ran as fast as he could. "Come on legs. Almost there." Sadly it was not Kent to be as Starfire quickly saw where he was." Naruto! You better stop and get back here, or you will be in much trouble!." she said angrily. He didn't stop, however, and was quickly caught in Starfire's giant hand. Lifting him up, Naruto could see the anger in her eyes. " NARUTO, I TOLD YOU THAT YOU WOULD BE MY PET AND YOU WILL. I UNDERSTAND THAT YOU MAY BE SCARED, BUT THERE IS NOTHING TO BE AFRAID OF. I WILL TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOU FROM NOW ON. NOW, THAT SAID, I CANNOT LET THIS GO UNPUNISHED, SO WE WILL DISCUSS THIS WHEN WE GET BACK TO MY ROOM." she said angrily to him. Before he could make another attempt to escape, she quickly curled her fingers around him to make sure he can't flee. And with that done, she started to walk back to her room.

"Great." nNaruto thought to himself. " Not only am I trapped in her hand, but now she's angry at me for trying to escape. How could this get any worse?" He then felt as she started to walk, bring the hand he was in up and down like some kind of demented joy ride. "Should have kept my mouth shut." he thought sickly. Soon, they reached her room, but Starfire still wouldn't release the grip she had on her new pet. She then started to look all around her room for a place to keep Naruto that wouldn't let him get away again. She soon found a small box under her bed that had high sides. "That would be perfect for him. Hopefully he will learn not to try and escape again. Huh? What is that?" As she bent down to retrieve the box, she also noticed and old boot she used to wear beside it. "Huh. I forgot about this thing. Why did I not wear it again? It looks to be in working order. Bringing it to her nose, she realised why she quit wearing it. "Oh X'Hal. Now I remember. This thing stinks worse than friend Beast Boy after playing stink ball with friend Cyborg." This soon gave her an idea. "Hmm. I hate to do this to my new pet, but he must be punished. This should hopefully get him to understand not to run away again, but it could also harm him as well." With that done, she got ready to show Naruto his new home for the foreseeable future.

When Starfire's hand opened up, the first thing Naruto thought was "Bright!" Soon after adjusting to the light, he noticed Starfire was holding him in front of a box and a thigh high boot. As if reading his mind, she told him,"AS YOU CAN SEE PET NARUTO, INFRONT OF YOU ARE TWO THINGS. BOTH OF THESE WILL BE YOUR NEW HOME. WHILE THE BOX IS FOR WHEN YOU ARE A GOOD PET, THE BOOT IS FOR WHEN YOU ARE BEING BAD. I WOULD LOVE FOR YOU TO NEVER HAVE TO GO INTO THE BOOT, BECAUSE OF THE ODOR, BUT IF IT WILL TEACH YOU NOT TO DISOBEY ME, THEN I WILL GLADLY USE IT." Naruto was frightened. When he saw them in front of him, he didn't know what to think. Now that he knows what they are for, he decides to quickly obey her for now. What she says next terrifies him. "NOW THEN, IT IS TIME FOR YOUR PUNISHMENT TO BEGIN. SINCE THIS WAS YOUR FIRST TIME, I WILL..."
133112.title: keep him as a pet.

choices: She had to stop a villain from robbing a bank? (2 hours)
She had to go to space with the teen titans to stop something? (1 day)
1331121.content:
"NOW REMEMBER PET NARUTO, I AM DOING THIS FOR YOUR OWN GOOD. I HOPE THAT AFTER THIS, YOU WILL REALISE HOW MUCH BETTER IT WILL BE NOW THAT I AM YOUR NEW OWNER. AFTER THE THIRTY MINUTES ARE DONE, I WILL COME BACK AND GET YOU OUT OF MY BOOT AND GIVE YOU SOME FOOD TO EAT. AFTERWARDS, WE WILL GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER A LITTLE BIT MORE AND MAYBE EVEN PLAY TOGETHER. JUST REMEMBER, THIS IS YOUR PUNISHMENT FOR TRYING TO LEAVE ME. YOU COULD HAVE JUST AS EASILY HAVE BEEN SQUASHED IF I DIDN'T NOTICE YOU TRYING TO ESCAPE." told Starfire to Naruto. Naruto, didn't hear anything she said then. The only thoughts in his mind were that he was going to have to spend half an hour in an old smelly boot this titanic woman once wore. All because he wanted to try to get home. He feared just how bad the boot would be to him, especially at his size. It also looked to big for him to try to climb out of. This meant he had to try to talk Starfire out of putting him in there, or else he was going to basically suffocate from the fumes that were surely in there.

"PLEASE STARFIRE! DON'T PUT ME IN THAT BOOT!" pleaded Naruto. "I PROMISE I WON'T TRY TO RUN AWAY AGAIN! JUST PLEASE DON'T PUT ME IN THERE!" Starfire thought this over, but decided to ignore him. He had to learn that his place was with her, and if this was going to help him learn this fact, then so be it. "I'M SORRY NARUTO, BUT THIS IS THE ONLY WAY FOR YOU TO LEARN WHERE YOUR PLACE IS. I SAID I WOULD LET YOU OUT IN THIRTY MINUTES, AND I WILL. YOU WILL JUST HAVE TO ACCEPT YOUR PUNISHMENT. HOPEFULLY AFTER THIS, YOU WON'T TRY TO RUN AWAY." To her, this really was the best she could come up with. And in her mind, it was for his own good. He seriously could have been hurt if he hadn't been found. The thought of her pet being eaten by animals, crushed under a random person's foot, or badly hurt by anything else scared her. She seemed to instantly bond with him at first sight and it pained her to imagine what would have happened if she hadn't found him first. "Hopefully after this, we can start to bond with each other." thought Starfire.

She then started to move her hand over the opening of her boot. To Naruto, the smell that rose from it was bad enough. "If this is what it smells like from a distance," thought Naruto, "than this punishment is going to be horrible." Starfire, seeming the fearful expression on his face, tried to calm him down. "It's okay, Naruto" Starfire whispered to him in a calming voice. "I promise that when the thirty minutes are up, if I am not trying to stop a villain, I will come and get you out of this boot for your punishment. Afterwards, we can start to bond like an owner and pet should." To Naruto, this actually served to calm him down. The words she said to him showed that she had no malice to him, but cared for him, and that she didn't want him to get hurt. "Wow," thought Naruto. "She really does care for me. Maybe after this, I will be able to explain the full situation to her and she'll let me go." Naruto thought it over, and would accept the punishment, only because of the chance to talk this over with her. "OKAY!" shouted Naruto. "I WILL ACCEPT THIS PUNISHMENT!" Starfire was overjoyed with what she heard him shout. "Maybe this means he is finally accepting now. How glorious!" she thought. ”OKAY NARUTO. GET READY." She positions him to were when she let go, he would slide down to the end of her boot. And finally, she released him.

To Naruto, the fall wasn't all that bad. Sure, it was scary at first, but the slide down wasn't all that bad. When he landed, he looked up to see Starfire's face looking down at him. "OKAY NARUTO, BE GOOD. I'LL BE BACK IN THIRTY MINUTES. DON'T TRY TO ESCAPE AGAIN." and with that, she left. Naruto looked around at his temporary home and saw how it was. The smell was horrible. It was like someone left a dumpster outside in the summer sun for a week. "Oh god!." thought Naruto. "The smell in here is worse then the dumpster outside my apartment back in Konoha." He then noticed how spongey the floor was. "Huh. I owned why it is do spongey?" Reaching down, Naruto pushed down on the floor and what happened next disgusted him. Out if the insole came an inch of foot sweat that soaked into the insole. "Okay, that's it." Naruto said. "I am thoroughly disgusted. It wasn't the end of his observations. He decided to check the end of the boot and saw five imprints. Holy cow! I can fit into these and have some room to spare." he said. He then realised just what these were. Good lord! Those are her toe imprints. If that's my size compared to her toe, I could have seriously died if I didn't find her." After ten minutes, Naruto finally decided to take a quick nap. "Okay, where can I rest for a minute?" Naruto asked to himself. He quickly decided to speed on the heel imprint. "Well, it's better than the toes. The smell is ten times as bad." Naruto quickly fell asleep and woke up ten minutes later. As the minutes dragged on, the smell kept getting to him. "God, I hope this punishment ends soon. This smell is really starting to get to me."

Eventually the thirty minute mark came and there was no Starfire yet. "Okay, it's been thirty minutes. She should be here by now. Maybe she just lost track of time or something. I hope she gets back here soon. I'm getting a little bit hungry." The time came and gone, and Starfire was no where in sight. Fifteen more minutes pass by and Naruto starts to get worried. "Where is she? She said she would get me out after thirty minutes. It's been longer than thirty minutes and she still hasn't showed." Naruto didn't know this, but something had happened that led to Starfire having to go away for a while. All the while, the stench was getting to Naruto.

Was it...
1331121.title: "...ONLY MAKE YOU STAY IN THE BOOT FOR THIR...

13311212.content:
It was twenty minutes after Starfire left Naruto to his punishment when the crime alarm went of. "Titans," started Robin. "We just got an urgent call from the Justice league. It appears that Lobo has appeared near our moon. They aren't sure just what he is going to do to it, but knowing Lobo, it isn't going to be good. While they would usually go and stop him themselves, they are in the middle of a diplomatic mission and can't send anyone else, so they decided to call us to stop him." Robin explained. "Wait, Lobo's the guy with the interstellar motorcycle, right?" asked Cyborg. "Yes." replied Robin. "The guy that is known for blowing up his own home planet?" asked Beast Boy. " Yes." replied Robin. "The man who can usually go toe to toe with Superman?" Cyborg and Beast Boy asked together. "For the third time, YES!" shouted Robin at the end. "This means that the main hitters will be Starfire and Raven. Thankfully, the league sent us some specially made suits that we can use to fight in space. We will leave immediately." With that said, the team started to get ready . "Uh oh." thought Starfire. "Hopefully this will not take to long. I still have to take out pet Naruto from his punishment." They soon left, not knowing what will happen.

It has been a couple of hours since Starfire and the rest of the titans left to stop Lobo. To Naruto, this was starting to annoy him. "Where is she?" he thought. "She said she will let me out after thirty minutes and it's has been over a couple of hours. Something must have happened, otherwise she would have let me out by now. Seriously, this smell is starting to get to me." Eventually he decided to wait it out and hope Starfire came back soon. "Okay, this is getting boring." Naruto thought. "I'll go see what Kurama thinks." Entering his mindscape, Naruto soon found himself facing his partner and friend Kurama, the Kyuubi no Kitsune and strongest of the tailed beasts. "Hey Kurama! What the heck is going on? All of a sudden, I ended up in this weird place and for some reason, I'm shrunk to two inches. What gives?" asked Naruto to Kurama. "I DON'T KNOW, BRAT. I'M IN THE DARK JUST AS MUCH AS YOU. ALL I KNOW IS THAT WE ARE IN A STRANGE WORLD AND THAT THE BEINGS HERE ARE INCREDIBLY BIGGER. ON THE BRIGHT SIDE, IT LOOKS LIKE YOU CAN STILL USE YOUR CHAKRA TO DEFEND YOURSELF. THAT, AND I SAW THAT YOU MET A BEAUTIFUL WOMAN ALREADY. SO HOW DOES IT FEEL TO BE A PET?" Kurama teased with a smirk on his face. "Oh shut up, you fur ball! You'll see, we'll get out of this soon and back home. Believe it!" With that said, Naruto vanished back to reality. "I hope so kit. Then again, this place wouldn't be so bad. You already have someone that cares for you here. Maybe you can make a better life here. I just wonder what that familiar energy was that I felt when we landed here. I don't know why, but it feels like it is weaker for some reason. Oh well. Hopefully we will figure this out. And with that, the great Kyuubi went back to sleep.

Back with Starfire, she and the others have finally confronted Lobo, who had decided to blow up the moon to see if what he heard about it being made of cheese was true. "Come on, brats. You know you can't stop the main man from blowing this giant cheese ball to kingdom come. Just give up, and I might share some of this cheese with you." said Lobo. "For the last time, Lobo. This moon isn't made of cheese. It's just a ball of packed together dust and other stuff that the Earth needs. Without it, the tides of the Earth will go haywire. Not to mention all of the debris that would plummet down to the Earth." Robin replied back. "I don't care. What the main man wants, the main man gets. And the main man wants a taste of this Moon cheese!" "Fine, have it your way." Robin said."Titans, go!" That was the signal for Starfire and Raven to start attacking as the rest supported them from a distance. Starfire quickly dodged Lobo's hook and punched him away from the moon. Raven quickly tried to restrain him, but failed as he broke free and brought out his gun. "Nice try, but you'll have to try harder to beat me!" Lobo said, taking shots at the titans.

Back on Earth, Naruto was quickly starting to get hungry and tired waiting for Starfire to release him. "I hope she is okay." thought Naruto. She should have been back by now." He quickly started to get hungry. "God, I'm so hungry. There isn't anything else to eat, though." "Not exactly, kit." "Huh, Kurama? What do you mean?" "Well, I reckon there may be something to eat, but you won't like it." "I don't care. I'm just so hungry, I can eat about anything." "Well Naruto, if you're so sure. Go to the toe imprints. There should be something to eat there." "What do you mean, Kurama? Why would there be food over their?" "Just go over there, kit. Just remember, you may not like it." Naruto quickly want over and found some sort of black stuff near the imprints. "I guess this is what he was talking about. Oh well. He said it was edible" Naruto quickly to took a bite out of it and quickly spit it out. "What the hell was that stuff!?" thought Naruto. "It tasted like old moldy cheese." Seeing no their alternative, he quickly ate it as quick as he could so he wouldn't taste it. "Bleh! That was disgusting. At least whatever that was filled me up. I guess I'll go to sleep now." Not bowing he just at Starfire's old toejam, Naruto quickly fell asleep and had one strange dream. "Huh? Where am I?" thought Naruto. He looked around and saw he was on a red desert. "What the heck!? Why am I naked!?" This was true. For some reason, he was also naked. He suddenly heard a rumble in the distance. "Huh? What was that?" Looking around, he quickly saw what was rumbling. There was Starfire, just as naked as he was and just as huge as she was now. "Be quiet, Husband Naruto. The others and I are trying to rest. This may be our wedding night but we need some sleep, too." she whispered to him. "HUSBAND!? WEDDING NIGHT!? OTHERS!? WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON!?" he thought. "Yes, Naruto. We really need to sleep." said a voice he didn't recognize. "We have plenty to do tomorrow after all." He looked around, trying to find the owner of this voice and quickly saw her. She was just a little bit shorted than Starfire and that was all he could see of her. He looked and saw other bodies in the bed with them, all of them female and just as big, "Just go to sleep, husband." he heard Starfire sayand was the last thing he remembers is her lips puckered a small amount coming at him.

Morning finally came for Naruto and quickly woke up. "Dang, that was a weird dream last night. As if that could ever happen. I'm just a pet to her. Not to mention the others. Hopefully Starfire will be back soon." And with that, he waited. An hour passed before he heard something. Jolting up, he quickly looked up to see if it was Starfire, but quickly fell as the boot turned over. He eventually landed in a hand he recognized and looked up into eyes he recognized immediately. "STARFIRE!" shouted Naruto, happy to see his friend. "Hello pet Naruto! I missed you so much! I'm sorry I didn't let you out earlier, but something happened that stopped me from getting you. You must be so hungry, so I brought you a piece of pizza as an apology for being in there so long." whispered Starfire to Naruto. "I hope you at least had a pleasant night?" "IT WAS OKAY STARFIRE! I DID SOME THINKING AND I REALLY SHOULDN'T HAVE RAN AWAY FROM YOU! I REALLY AM SORRY FOR IT!" shouted Naruto. Starfire was glad to hear this. "Maybe he won't have to go into the boot again." she thought. After eating, Starfire quickly decided what to do next.

She decided to...
13311212.title: She had to go to space with the teen titans to ...

133112121.content:
Starfire decided to take Naruto outside for some fresh air and to bond with him. "Hmm." thought Starfire. "Maybe I can take him outside. He was in my old boot for a while yesterday and probably needs some sunlight and air. Maybe we can bond with each other after awhile and enjoy each others company. Oh how glorious!" Starfire thought to herself. Quickly picking Naruto up, she left for the door. While she was walking, Starfire, excited over going outside and bonding with her pet, didn't see her friend Raven,who was reading and walking at the same time, and bumped into each other. "Oops. Sorry friend Raven. Are you okay?" asked Starfire. "Yeah, I'm okay. You seem excited. Is there any reason for that?" asked Raven. "No reason. It just feels like such a beautiful day outside and I decided to enjoy it." replied Starfire, who slowly hid her hands behind her back. "I'm sorry friend Raven, but I must go now. I'll talk to you later. Bye." With that said, Starfire quickly walked towards the exit and away from her friend. "Hmm..." thought Raven to herself. "Why is she in such a hurry? She usually isn't like that. Maybe it has something to do with that energy I felt yesterday morning. I'll keep an eye on her to see if she is okay."

Naruto didn't know what was happening right now. He had just finished eating this piece of triangle Starfire called a pizza and was suddenly grabbed by her and carried somewhere. "I wonder where she is taking me. I hope she isn't going to put me into an even smellier place or give me to some strange scientist to dissect." thought Naruto fearfully. "Calm down gaki. I highly doubt she is doing either of those things to you." said Kurama. "She is probably just going to take you outside fore some fresh air. You where trapped in a stinky old boot for awhile, remember? Besides, she doesn't seem to be the type of person who would just hand you over." "I guess you're right, Kurama. Still, I wonder what she is going to do." Suddenly, Naruto's carrier shook and jostled him. "Huh? What happened?" Naruto decided to try and listen to what was happening outside. "Oh. She just bumped into this Raven girl. I hope she is okay. Huh, I guess you were right Kurama. She was taking me outside." He soon felt her walk away from Raven and was left to himself. Kurama, however, was discussing something to himself. "So the girl is the source of that energy I felt when we entered this place. I still don't know why it feels so familiar, though."

Finally reaching the exit, Starfire walked outside and went over to a place where Naruto and she could have some privacy. Opening her hand, she saw that Naruto was just relaxing. "OKAY NARUTO. WE'RE HERE." said Starfire. "WHAT'S HAPPENING!? WHY DID YOU TAKE ME OUTSIDE!?" asked/shouted Naruto "WELL, PET NARUTO. I FIGURED YOU WOULD NEED SOME FRESH AIR AFTER BEING IN MY BOOT FOR SO LONG YESTERDAY. I ALSO FIGURED THAT WE COULD ALSO BOND WHILE WE ARE OUT HERE." stated Starfire. "OKAY, BUT WHAT ARE WE GOING TO BOND OVER!?" "WELL, I FIGURED WE COULD TALK ABOUT WERE WE USED TO LIVE AND OTHER STUFF." Starfire answered. "Hmm. What do you think Kurama? Should we tell her?" asked Naruto. "I don't see why not. It won't hurt to tell her and maybe you'll get her trust and not be her pet." "Okay Kurama. If you say so." Looking up to Starfire, Naruto explained where he was from. "I AM FROM KONOHAGAKURE.! IT IS ONE OF THE FIVE MAJOR VILLAGES FROM THE WORLD I AM FROM AND IS SURROUNDED BY FORESTS! IT ALSO HAS A MONUMENT TO OUR PAST LEADERS !" shouted Naruto to Starfire. "OH REALLY? AND HAT DID YOU DO?" asked Starfire. "I WAS A SHINOBI FOR MY VILLAGE!" shouted Naruto "WHAT IS A SHINOBI?" asked Starfire. "BASICALLY, WE WERE MERCENARIES FOR HIRE! WE WOULD DO ALL SORTS OF JOBS FROM PAINTING FENCES TO ASSASSINATING ENEMIES OF OUR VILLAGE! WE WOULD THEN GET PAID FOR DOING SAID MISSION , WHICH DEPENDED ON HOW IT WAS RANKED FROM D TO S!" "THAT SOUNDS SORT OF LIKE MY PEOPLE. WHILE WE ARE FIERCE WARRIORS, WE ARE ALSO PEACEFUL. WE HARDLY EVER WENT TO WAR AND INSTEAD CHANNELED OUR ENERGY TO BETTER OUR SOCIETY. DID YOUR PEOPLE FIND PEACE?" asked Starfire to Naruto. "YEAH, BUT ONLY RECENTLY. WE USED TO ALWAYS BE AT WAR WITH EACH OTHER UNTIL THE FOURTH SHINOBI WAR." Naruto and Starfire spent the whole day with each other basically bonding and asking each other questions.

Fianlly , six o clock came and they decided to go inside. Starfire carried Naruto to his box and saw how empty it was. "HOLD ON NARUTO AND I WHILE FIND SOMETHING FOR YOU TO SLEEP ON." Starfire quickly left to find an unused sponge Naruto could sleep on until she made him a better bed. "Huh, this wasn't that bad a day." thought Naruto. "It was actually kind of fun. Much more fun than back at the village." Naruto sat down and waited for starfire to get back.

"That was so much fun!" thought Starfire. "Pet/friend Naruto is a great person. I can't believe that he helped win the war he was in. He truly is a powerful warrior and a great friend. I'm lucky I found him." Starfire was in the kitchen looking for a sponge when Raven walked in. "Oh hello friend Raven. How have you been this fine day?" asked Starfire. "Pretty good. I finished the book I was reading earlier. Where were you this whole time?" returned Raven. "Oh, just flying around. Nothing major. Do you remember where the sponges are?" "Bottom drawer behind the spare dish soap. Why do you need it?" "Oh just for something fun. I'll talk to you tomorrow. Good evening friend Raven." Walking off, Starfire headed back to her room, not noticing Raven following her. Seeing Starfire go in, Raven decides to eavesdrop behind Starfire's door. "Here you go pet/friend Naruto. It isn't much, it will work until I make you a better one." "Thank you Starfire!" "Huh? Who was that second voice? Is it this Naruto person? And why can I barely hear him?" Hearing enough Raven quickly goes into Starfire's room to see what is going on. "Okay, where is he?" asked Raven. "Where's who?" replied Starfire. "You know who, Starfire. The person you were talking to. Naruto. Where is he?" "Fine ,here he is." replied Starfire. She brought a box Raven didn't notice over to her and brought it to her face. "I'm going to introduce you to one of my friends now pet/friend Naruto. She won't hurt you." Starfire said into the box. She brought the box over to Raven, who quickly looked in.

What did she see?
133112121.title: ...talk and bond outside.

choices: They wake up and get ready for the day.
1331121212.content:
When Raven looked into the box Starfire was holding, she was expecting to see alot of things. What she didn't expect to see was a tiny person dressed in an orange jumpsuit. Sure, she could see a bug or a tiny animal, but this? This took the cake. "Starfire, why is there a tiny person in this box?" asked Raven. "Well, friend Raven, this tiny person is Naruto, my new friend and pet. Before we had to go after Lobo, I woke up and found him on my nose. At first, I didn't even know he was there until I went and looked into the mirror. After I saw him, we talked about how he got here and what he was doing in the tower. Eventually I decided to make him my pet." explained Starfire to Raven. After hearing this, Raven thought back to earlier that same day. "Wait a second," thought Raven to herself. "He must be the source of that energy I felt earlier, or atleast had something to do with it. I better figure out if he is going to be a problem to us later on." "Hey Starfire, Is it alright if I talk to him in private?" Raven asked outloud. "Sure friend Raven. Just be careful with him."

While they were having a conversation above him, Naruto was contemplating what to say to this new giant that Starfire was talking to. "Okay, so is that Raven person Starfire talked to earlier. Huh, she seems pretty nice, to be honest. Hopefully she is nice." At the same time, Kurama was feeling a sense of deja vu. "Okay, this energy coming from the girl is incredibly familiar. Why do I feel like I know it?" asked Kurama to himself. Deciding that this was important, Kurama brings Naruto into the mindscape. "HEY GAKI, LISTEN UP. I DON'TKNOW WHY, BUT THE ENERGY COMING FROM THE GIRL IS FAMILIAR TO ME. IF YOU CAN, TRY TO FIND OUT MORE ABOUT IT." "Sure, if you think its important."replied Naruto. Naruto leaves the confines of his mindscape and finds himself back in the box that will be his home for the foreseeable future. Just as he starts to think of how to find out more about this Raven's energy, he hears the end of the two giants conversation. "Perfect," he thought to himself. "Hopefully I can get the information I need from this talk."

Starfire leans over the box and carefully whispers to Naruto, "Okay Naruto, I'm gonna leave you and Raven alone for a couple of minutes. She just wants to have a talk with you. Please try to get along with each other. If I hear anything bad from either you or Raven, I will punish the person who said it. That means you will go back to the boot. So be on your best behavior." Seeing she warned Naruto enough, she carefully gives the box to Raven, telling her something similar, just without the boot part. She then goes out into the hallway to give her friends the privacy they want. Inside, Naruto and Raven start to have their conversation. "NOW BEFORE WE BEGIN, I'M GONNA DO A SPELL THAT WILL MAKE IT SEEM LIKE WE ARE TALKING REGULARLY WITH EACH OTHER, SO DON'T BE AFRAID. AZERATH METRION ZINTHOS!" When Raven finishes her chant, a weird black light surrounded both their ears and mouths. Deciding to test it, Naruto asks her in reguler voice, "Can you hear me?" "Perfectly." Raven replies.

"Okay, now how did you get here?" asked Raven. "I don't know," replied Naruto. "I was just training when this portal opens up under me. Next thing I know, I'm tiny and landing on Starfire's bed." Raven could tell he was telling the truth and decided to ask him some more questions. "Okay, next question. What is this energy I'm sensing from you? It feels like an ocean, even at your current size." "That is probably my chakra. It is a combination of physical and spiritual energies that your body naturally makes. At least, that's how it works in my world." Naruto says to Raven. "As for the size, I'm not really okay saying why. No offence, but I did just meet you people. I have to keep some secrets." This continued with Raven asking all sorts of questions, such as the uses of chakra, how to learn how to use it, and others. After this round of questions from Raven, Naruto decided to ask some questions of his own about this world, such as technology and inhabitants. Finally satisfied, Raven decides to bring back Starfire.

Before Raven brings Starfire back inside, she asks Starfire if she can we the same spell on her as she did Naruto, to make speaking with him easier. Seeing no problem with it, she quickly agrees. Starfire quickly heads over to Naruto's box to check on him. Seeing he was ok,Starfire asks what they were talking about. Raven explains the whole conversation to Starfire, with Naruto adding his own piece to it. By the time they were done talking, the moon was already in the sky with the stars quickly joining it. "Oh look at the time friends, we must be getting to bed soon." says Starfire. "Alright," says Raven. "But I want to talk more to Naruto tomorrow." "Sure," replies Naruto. "All three of us can make a day of it." Their plan for tomorrow in place, Raven leaves the room and heads towards hers. Naruto and Starfire quickly head to bed. Just before Starfire leaves, she tells him one last thing. "Good night friend/pet Naruto. I love you." Leaving Naruto with those parting words, Starfire heads to her own bed, excited what tomorrow will bring.

What happens next?
1331121212.title: A tiny person?!

choices: Into the gravity-defying hair of Jynx
13333.content: Does Naruto land with one of the show's female villains?
13333.title: Somewhere else

choices: "I bet I could make a small fortune off you..."
133331.content:
Naruto skidded across the ground before he slammed into an unyielding wall that stopped him dead. The ninja gasped harshly as he tried to return air to his lungs after the impact. He struggled back to his feet, knees shaking from what he had just experienced, and made to take in his surroundings.

"Well what do we have here?" came a godly voice from above him. "Wasn't expecting to see that come out of a worm hole."

He spun to face the direction the voice had come from, and caught sight of something incredible. His eyes panned over a massive female form whose feet he had landed on when he arrived. She was absolutely gigantic compared to him, with elegant black hair that cascaded down to her knees. Her skin was a sunburnt orange, though he could only see her hands and face, as the rest of her was covered in what appeared to be some kind of armor made from a highly flexible metal alloy. Her physique was jaw dropping, with an hour glass figure that rivaled some of the kunoichi he knew.

"Come here little guy." the giantess said seductively as her hand reached for him. Confusion and panic swirled about in Naruto's mind, and he followed his first instinct, try and escape. He found out quickly that this was not to be, as the giant fingers closed around his body and lifted him from the ground.

The ninja struggled in vain as he was brought level with the behemoth woman's black eyes, and what she said next chilled him to the bone.
133331.title: Before the feet of Blackfire

choices: They are still trying to decide when Naruto wakes up
134.content:
“Good news, everyone!” came the eccentric voice of Professor Farnsworth, as he began the meeting with his crew. The disdained, and bored looks on his employees’ faces spoke to their doubts of this being anything they were looking forward to hear. “I want you all to meet me in my laboratory to see something spectacular.”

“Oh lord, what now?” Leela grumbled, crossing her arms beneath her chest.

As a group, they rose from the circular table, and followed, at first, before passing the doddering professor on their way to his lab.

“What do you think he wants to show us?” Fry asked his best, and most metallic friend.

“Probably something that’ll either kill you all the second he turns it on, or something that sucks.”

Soon, they were all gathered in the lab, which had half-finished machines, and pointless do-dads littered throughout the room.

“I have just finished my latest invention, which will make each of you completely unnecessary to run this damned company. Behold! My molecular transport array!”

Directing their attention towards the large device the old scientist showcased, they saw a large, metal ring, with a control panel to one side, and a ramp leading into what would be a spiraling tunnel if it was activated.

“But Professor, what is a Molcuwho-whatsit transamabob?” Fry asked, with the look of a confused monkey on his face.

“An excellent, yet stupidly worded question, Fry. It allows instantaneous travel between this portal and any coordinates entered into the computer. Now I won’t have to pay off any grieving family members when one of you stupid mooks kicks the bucket. I’ll just send the package wherever it needs to go from the comfort of my own lab.”

While the Professor was talking, Fry and his robot buddy moved towards the control panel, where the delivery boy began, at Bender’s goading, to input random numbers into the computer.

“Come on Fry, get that portal open!” Bender cheered “The New New York Bank isn’t going to rob itself.”

Looking on with loud gasps of horror, as Fry’s meddling caused the machine to spark and sputter as it powered on, opening the portal with the sound of static.

“Fry, you idiot! Get away from there! If you enter random coordinates, you don’t know where the portal will open of what will come through the other side!” the Professor warned, but it was too late.

**

It happened so suddenly, Naruto had no chance to react. As he was walking down the street towards his apartment, a large hole opened beneath his feet and sent him plummeting to parts unknown to anyone in his world.

‘I swear, if I ever find out who did this, I’m going to kick their testicles into their throat,’ Naruto thought grimly before proceeding to let out a loud curse as he fell down the seemingly infinite expanse of the tunnel.

**

As Professor Farnsworth worked frantically at the controls, the rest of the Planet Express crew could only watch as the portal reached maturity.

“It’s too late now, the portal has opened at its destination, and it has pulled in something.”

“Can you tell what it is, Professor?” Amy asked from behind him.

“Judging by these read outs, Fry has accessed an alternate universe. So for all we know, he could have pulled in a giant ape monster that breaths fire, and has knives for fingers.”

With a small *poit* an unconscious Naruto flew out of the machine and landed on Leela’s left breast, causing everyone to look at him, while silencing all those assembled.

“Or a tiny man. Whatever,” the Professor finished. “Amy, Leela, you look after him until he wakes up. The rest of you, follow me to the electronics store so I can replace the parts that were destroyed by Fry’s idiocy.”

And so, Amy and Leela were left alone with the tiny ninja, neither very happy about having to babysit him.

“Why do we both have to watch him? I mean, spleesh, I have more important stuff to do today,” Amy complained.

“I can see your point,” Leela said, holding the tiny man in the palm of her hand, “it’s not like it takes more than one person to look after this little guy, and I don’t really want to do it either.”

There was a momentary pause in their conversation, before Amy spoke again.

“Rock, paper, scissors for it?” the Martian girl asked.
134.title: Thrown into the future, kinda

choices: Leela decides the tiny blond needs to learn his place
Amy grabs him from Leela, wanting to play with him
Leela and Amy continue talking while Naruto tries to sneak away
1343.content:
Eyes fluttering open, Naruto groaned as he came to. The disorientation he felt was unlike any he had felt before, as everything seemed off to him. The first thing he noticed was the warm, soft surface he was atop.

"Okay. Rock, paper scissors on three," a booming voice said from above, allowing for the ninja to fully grasp his predicament. In the sky above him two gigantic hands came speeding down, both stopped midair in closed fists. Following the appendage down a giant forearm, up to a colossal shoulder, until he saw the faces of two women, hundreds of times his size. One of them wore a pink sweat suit, and had black hair which was cut short and parted down the middle. The other, to his surprise, had one giant eye in the middle of her face, as well as long purple hair, which was pulled back into a ponytail, and a white tank top which showed off the largest cleavage Naruto had ever seen.

"Again!" the loud voice said once more, echoing in Naruto's relatively small ears. By now, the blond had realized that what he thought was a bed of some kind, was actually the palm of the massive cyclops woman.

"WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON??!!!" the ninja screamed in panic, catching the attention of the two giantesses.

"Oh, look who's awake," said the purple-haired cyclops, leaning in close to get a good look at the tiny man in the palm of her hand.

"Really? Let me see," the one with the bobbed hair said eagerly.

"Who are you people?! Where the hell am I?!!!" Naruto demanded, barely keeping control of himself.

"I guess we do sort of owe you an introduction," said the giant cyclops, "Well, my name is Turanga Leela, but you can call me Leela"

"And I'm Amy Wong" the sweatsuit wearing cutie said sweetly.

"As to where, you are in the Planet Express building on Earth"

Naruto blinked in confusion. Why did the think it was necessary to tell him that he was still on Earth? Where else could he be, the moon?

"Okay, never heard of Planet Express before. Nevermind. WHY AM I SO DAMN SMALL?!"

"I don't know, you just came out of the portal like that," the one now identified as Leela stated.

"WHAT DO YOU MEAN YOU DON'T KNOW?! I WANT SOME ANSWERS! NOW START TALKING, DAMMIT!!"

Leela's eye narrowed angrily, as she began to lose patience with this little punk. How dare he treat her like that, when his life was quite literally in the palm of her hand. Unconsciously, her hand became a fist, holding their tiny visitor tight.

"Listen you little brat! I was going to explain everything I knew about how you got here, but not if you use that attitude with me!"

"Spleesh Leela, go easy on the little guy. He just got here, and it won't be any fun if you squash him before we get to know him. Why don't we play an ice breaker game, or something."
1343.title: They are still trying to decide when Naruto wak...

13431.content:
"No, I think this little punk needs a lesson on how to ask nicely if he wants something!"

Leela held the hand that clutched the tiny ninja at eye level about a foot in front of her. She tensed the index finger of her other hand against her thumb, and released it in the form of a flick to the forehead of the belligerent ninja. Naruto's head snapped backwards from the hit. The small blond screamed bloody murder from the pain, it was even worse than being hit by Sakura.

"Now let that be a lesson to you," Leela said firmly as she wagged the finger she struck him with in his face. Her giant, even relative to his her size, eye was narrowed and fixed on him, as if daring Naruto to defy her warning.

Naruto still reeled from the heavy hit he had taken, just barely able to understand what the massive cyclops had said. However, he understood the implications of her warning. If he wanted to get anywhere, especially back to his home, he would have to play along with the colossal women.

"Now that you've learned to be polite, Let's see what we can actually figure out about you," Leela said as she her arm, which bore, as Naruto noticed for the first time, a high tech armband. She placed him in the other woman's palm and held the device over him while she pressed a button. It made a noise like an idling car while she moved it over him. Nervous chills ran through the tiny blond's body, not knowing what exactly was going to happen when she finished whatever she was doing. Finally, with a ding, she finished, and looked intently at her armband.

"Hmm...according to this thing I wear on my wrist, his body structure is near identical to a human's, only scaled down," Leela informed.

The one called Amy leaned in to watch over Leela's should and get a look at the display.

"It also says he isn't poisonous," Amy added.

"Why would you want to know if I'm poisonous?" Naruto asked, confused.

"No reason, just getting all the information we can, otherwise the Professor will get mad at us," Amy explained.

"I don't think it really matters right now, though. It's already the end of the day, and the idiots aren't back yet. We might as well go home."

Amy silently nodded in agreement, not wanting to spend anymore time at her employer's than necessary.

"I guess, but one of us still needs to take care of this guy, otherwise who knows what could happen. If he runs away, the Professor will be pissed."
13431.title: Leela decides the tiny blond needs to learn his...

choices: A redhead in a green shirt
A brunette with a pink hat
1351.content:
"Brian, come quick!" a young infant with a cranium like a football cried excitedly as he finished tightening the last screw into place. He set down the tool and held up his device triumphantly over his head.

"What is it, Stewie?" said a bipedal white dog with an inexplicable ability to talk, "I was in the middle of watching Peter and Chris playing hot potato with an M-80 firecracker and I want to see who blows their fingers off first."

"Well that's a rather morbid way to spend an afternoon, but I think my latest invention will impress you far more than the fat man mutilating himself with explosives. Behold!" the child presented his new creation, "the Multiverse Spanner. I modified my old multiverse invention to bring anything I desire into our own universe without having to physically go there."

"So, if you wanted, like, a ton of gold, you could pull some from another universe without any consequences?"

"Oh please, Brian, that's so dull. I want to see something cool, like a dragon, or a ninja," Stewie said as he began to boot up his device.

"A ninja, huh? How would you pull something like that off?" Brian said cynically.

"It's quite simple, I just need to enter in the appropriate keyword into the search bar, and the Spanner searches through every universe to find anything that matches that description and I just have to select which one I want." Stewie demonstrated by typing "ninja" into the his invention and showed the millions of results as they appeared. "Of course, you do have to select one for it be transported here."

"Peter! Chris! Put that down!" a nasally, feminine voice said from the floor, and was quickly followed by a loud explosion, and a scream.

"Dammit, sounds like Peter just blew his hand off, we better help Lois get him to the hospital."

The two of them left the room, but not before Stewie set his invention precariously on a table, with his search still open. When they closed the door, the slight shock was enough to send it to the floor, and select the first search result on the list, and with a small pop, deposited the person it had grabbed on the floor, at a size that was not in scale with the rest of the world.

*****

Naruto's day had taken a rather nasty turn. It had started pleasantly enough, with his first day off in a long while, and he had been enjoying a day out, and had just finished a big bowl of ramen when he felt an irresistible pull on his body, and soon found himself somewhere massive, with no idea how he had got there, or where it was. It didn't take long for him to discover the big size difference between him and the place he found himself, he figured he couldn't be more than a couple inches tall by his estimation, but now he had to figure out how to get back home.

The sound of the giant door creaking open caught his attention, and he saw a giant person emerge from behind it.
1351.title: Family Guy

13511.content:
Lois Griffin entered her youngest child's room grumbling to herself. In her hands was a halfway filled laundry basket, which she soon filled with from the rooms small hamper of baby clothes.

"Damn it, Peter! I've told that man a thousand times not to play with fireworks in the house, and now he goes and blows up the TV with some," the redhead grumbled in rage as she stuffed her baby's clothes in with the rest.

While the enraged New England housewife picked up dirty laundry, the mini ninja observed and planned. He know nothing about where he had ended up other than the fact that everything was gigantic compared to him, and that was a dangerous state to be in, even for a ninja. As he saw it, he only had two options, either try to get the woman's attention, or remain undetected. Both plans had a major downside, the first being that he didn't know what she would do to him if he did reveal himself, and the second's being left alone in a house of unaware giant people. Neither was option was very appealing, but at least with being found he had a smaller chance of being squashed accidentally, and that was something he could get behind.

Naruto sprinted from spot on the floor, and ran full tilt towards the kneeling woman, and reached her just as her hand went to pick up the last bit of dirty laundry.

"HEY! DOWN HERE!" He yelled, his arms in the air and doing everything the could to gain attention.
13511.title: A redhead in a green shirt

choices: "I'll help you" Lois is a kind giantess
"You are my tiny slave" Lois is a sadistic giantess
135111.content:
Naruto was willing to take a chance on trusting the giant redhead if it meant he would get help in this dire situation. He trusted that his training and skill as a ninja would let him escape should the situation call for it, and she appeared to be a housewife, so there was a good chance she would be gentle. So, as her hand descended to pick up the final piece of clothing, he lept forward, grabbed the tip of her thumb, and held on for dear life.

"Hey! Down here! I need your help!" the whisker cheeked blond screamed as he flailed an arm to make himself more noticeable. The giant housewife heard him, and looked down from above at the end of her thumb, and the tiny human attached to it.

"What the hell?!" she said, her eyes blinking in a double take, not sure if what she saw was real. Slowly, she set down the laundry basket, and, with her freed up hand, plucked the ninja off with her thumb and forefinger. She brought him to eye level and stared in confusion and curiosity at him. "What the hell are you?"

"I know this is really weird, but I'm a person! My name's Naruto Uzumaki and I need your help!" he yelled up to her in desperation.

"Well Naruto, just what are you doing in my baby's room, and why are you this small?" she asked with a glare, her grip tightening slowly around his pinched stomach. She was not liking the idea of someone she didn't know, regardless of their size, being in her child's room without her knowing.

"I don't know! I honestly don't know! I don't know how, but I just wound up here, and I'm as shocked as you are about my size. I just need your help so I can get home! Please believe me!" he answered in a panic, seeing the motherly instinct to protect her offspring reflected in her eyes. The intense look lasted for what seemed like a good minute before she relented.

"Okay, I'll believe you for now. My name is Lois Griffin, and as of now..."
135111.title: Lois finds the tiny ninja

choices: Lois places Naruto at her feet and demands a massage
Lois drops him in her panties
1351112.content:
Naruto blinked in disbelief as the words left the giant redhead's lips. The wicked smile she bore sent shivers through his body as her grip around his waist tightened like a vice. The ninja grimaced as what was once a comparatively comfortable position became painful, and eventually, excruciating.

"Since no one else knows you're here, I think we'll just keep it that way, and see what kind of fun I can have with you. Someone in this house is going to pay for what Peter puts me through on a daily basis, and it might as well be you." Lois finished with a dreadful chuckle under her breath, and stuffed the tiny blond into a sock from the laundry, and knotted the end closed.

"For now, you can stay in there until I get the laundry done. Enjoy the smell of my foot while you wait."

Inside the sock, Naruto gagged as his world was filled with the intense smell of the housewive's fatigued feet. Each breath was agonizing and seemed to burn his throat. Eventually, the scent overpowered him and he passed out into the toes of the sock.

*****

After she filled the washer with the first load, Lois, her sock prison in hand, ascended the stairs from the basement, and kept climbing until she reached her bedroom. A wicked smile graced her face as she took joy from her thoughts of what was to come.


"Time to get to work, little man," Lois said with a cackle, as she opened the sock and dumped the unconscious young man onto her bedspread and tossed the sock aside. Since the tiny ninja didn't move, she gave him a poke with her finger, trying to determine whether or not she had killed him at some point. A groan from the blond told her that was not the case, and the redhead kept poking him until his eyes fluttered open.

"Now's not the time to be sleeping, you have work to do," she said as she picks the now fully awake and frightened ninja between her fingers.
1351112.title: "You are my tiny slave" Lois is a sadis...

choices: Lois begins to toy with him with her toes
Lois has him start the other foot
Lois decides to share & calls the other wives of Spooner Street to join the fun
13511121.content:
The tiny ninja was deposited at the feet of the redhead, who, after a quick second, had removed her footwear and was now barefoot. Lois reclined onto the headboard of her bed, her gaze focused intently on the tiny mean she had declared her slave.

"Get rubbin', little man!" She boomed as her toes wiggled in anticipation.

Still loopy from having inhaled the concentrated stench of get feet for so long, Naruto stumbled back to his feet to give an angry retort, but only managed to tumble into the sole of her right foot. His face smacked into the soft, well cared for skin where his nose was once again assaulted by the smell that head knocked him out before.

"Oh my, I didn't think you'd be so eager," Lois mocked as she watched his dazed form struggle back to his feet.

Before tiny guy could steady himself, the housewife brought her for down on top of him, pinning him on his back so that his head was between her big and second toe. Naruto grunted as the air was pushed from his lungs and his body was pressed into the firm mattress beneath. The ninja attempted to summon his chakra in an effort to escape, but found himself unable to do so. It seemed to fall apart as soon as he tried to mold it for use.

Mercifully, the sadistic woman lifted herself off him and allowed him to stand.

"Now start massaging or the next time I pop your head like a grape between my toes."

Seemingly unable to use his ninjutsu, and completely lost in this new world, the Konoha ninja had no choice but to comply. With hands shaking, he moved towards the bare sole and began to push and knead it. The massive redhead smiled, reveling in her victory over him, a soft moan escaping her lips as his surprisingly strong arms worked over her foot. The stench of it, coupled with the built up sweat made for an awful experience for him as her gagged multiple times during the rub down. His clothing soon became drenched and clung to him, making him look like a cat that had come in from the rain.

Lois watched as her little slave worked hard to keep her happy. He was such a good little stress reliever, and his hands worked magic on her tired foot.
13511121.title: Lois demands a foot massage

13511122.title: Lois drops him in her panties

1353.content: How about cartoons with more heroically inclined characters?
1353.title: Something else

13531.content:
It had taken many weeks of hard, exhausting work, but Forge's dimensional gate was complete. Created in the hopes of exploring different dimensions, such as the one which Nightcrawler traveled through during his teleports, it was the mechanically inclined mutant's new pride and joy, and he could not wait to test it. With a quick call to Professor Xavier, who in turn brought his students along in case something went wrong, the stage was set for the technological genius to premier his newest masterpiece. Making his way to the controls, Forge began the start up procedure, checked and rechecked the settings, and made sure he failsafes were in place.

"Alright everyone, get ready, I'm going to open a test gate in five seconds. Five...four...three...two...one!"

With a flick of a switch, the air around the gate crackled with electricity, and the room hummed with energy. With a loud roar, followed by what sounded like static, a slowly swirling vortex appeared in thin air.

*****

With a hand on his stomach and a content smile, Naruto Uzumaki walked down the street leading to his apartment after a big dinner at his favorite ramen joint. Celebrating another job well done, the young pupil of the Toad Sage was ready for a good night's sleep following his well deserved meal. It was already dark out, and with no one else outside, he walked the path alone.

Just a block away from his home, he dug into his pocket for his keys. With an overenthusiastic yank, he pulled them free, only to have his beloved wallet slip free along with them, and land on the street, spilling its contents. Groaning in annoyance, Naruto knelt down to pick every single bill and coin left over from his night of eating. It was then then, as he was trying pick up his change, that a massive hole appeared beneath his feet, giving him no time, or ground on which to jump. No one witnessed the ground below him open up and swallow him, before closing without a trace.

*****

The gifted youngsters of Xavier's school waited eagerly for something to happen, as the tear in space time swirled before them. Their muscles were tensed in anticipation, each ready to use their powers if the need should arise. Only, it didn't. The only thing that came through the portal that they saw was bits of dust and dirt.

"Like, maybe there's nothing on the other side to see," said Kitty Pryde (AKA Shadowcat) in her valley girl manner.

"No, there has to be something on the other side," Forge argued, "all the readouts are right, and the portal is open on both ends."

"Maybe you just opened it in the middle of nowhere, and there's nothing to see," Rogue offered, moving her white bangs out of her eyes.

"Ah man! I was sure that something would come through. Now I've got to recalculate everything and try again. That's going to take days!"

"It's alright Forge. I'm sure you'll figure it out," Jean reassured.

"Jean is right Forge," the professor said, "this is only the first test, and it ended with nothing bad happening. I'm sure, given time, you will figure it out. For now though, I think it best to power it down, and take a break. We can start again tomorrow."

With a nod, the technical genius started the shut down sequence, never noticing a small object coming through the portal as it closed.

*****

Free falling through the swirling nothingness almost caused Naruto to vomit up his dinner. He was only in the portal for less than a minute, but the nauseating feeling in his stomach made it seem like ten, until he was finally ejected from it and flung across a giant space, landing on something soft and silky.
13531.title: X-Men Evolution

choices: Kitty sees he's a tiny person
135311.content:
Naruto found himself entangled in a mane of chestnut colored hair that was many times longer than he was tall. His momentum was halted by the ensnaring strands, and came to a stop at halfway down a high ponytail. Disoriented, the ninja could only hang there and swing like a pendulum as his unknowing ride left with the other super powered teenagers. The strain of the journey finally overtook the blond ninja and he had no choice but to sleep as he dangled like a fruit from a vine, buried beneath the giant girl's hair.

*****

As the tiny shinobi hung unnoticed from her ponytail, Kitty Pryde, aka Shadowcat, made her way to the dormitory section of Xavier mansion. She made a straight line for her room, when she was stopped by Nightcrawler and Spyke, who asked her to join them for a movie.

"I'd love to, but, like, I've got to finish my homework."

"But it's Friday..."

"Yeah, but if I finish it now, I've got the rest of the weekend for whatever," she said before waving them off and kept going.

Kitty returned to her room to find that her roommate, Rogue, was absent. Happy for the solitude, the young mutant woman flopped down on her bed, pulled out her text books and began to study.

*****

Naruto came to an hour after his emergence, still tied in thick, brown hair. He tried to gain a feel for his surroundings, only to find what he saw to be unbelievable. He was in a cavernous room that was large enough to hold his entire village, and that the thing he from which he hung was the pulled back hair of some sort of giant. He would have lost it right there if it hadn't been for one thing, he had no idea what would happen to him if he was discovered, so quietly getting to cover was his priority.

As Naruto was climbing down, Kitty was busy with a particularly difficult problem in her homework. Frustration built up as she tried to wrap her head around it, and she finally released it in a roar and shake of her head which whipped her ponytail back and forth. With a violent flip of her hair, Kitty dislodged her concealed passenger. Naruto's body arched through the air, the tiny ninja screamed as he fell until he landed roughly on the mutant girl's textbook.

"What the...?!" Kitty said in surprise, her eyes locked squarely on him.
135311.title: Kitty Pryde's hair

13532.content:
(To make it clear, this is the DCAU that started with Batman the Animated Series and spanned to Justice League Unlimited.)

STAR Labs, the premier research and development laboratory on Earth, had entered the final stage of their latest inventions initial test run. After the incursion of a parallel world's version of the Justice League, they had spent a significant portion of their funding on a device that would allow them to detect inter-world travel and if all went well, even facilitate it. A group of scientists, each near the top of their respective fields, had worked tirelessly all for this test that would prove whether or not their theories were correct.

They stood behind a wall of thick concrete reinforced with steel, their only eyes being various high definition cameras that had been set at different angles surrounding the intended dimensional gateway. The tall, arching structure was laced with wires, and tubes all around the base, in the center was a swirling mass that, properly manipulated, would puncture a hole in the fabric of space and open into another world.

"Final checks have been completed, proceed to activation," stated one of a multitude of technicians from behind their workstation.

With a flip of the switch, the magnificent machine hummed to life, the mass began to expand until it reached the outer edges of the gate, becoming a vortex of energy as it tried to bore into another plane of existence.

"Levels are holding steady, formation of gateway is underway."

The vortex intensified in speed, spiraling into itself as it drilled into the fabric of reality. All was going as planned, until the excess energy began to arc across the empty room, striking one of the primary control modules, and all hell broke loose.

"Malfunction in the containment field!" came a cry. "The gateway is opening, but we have no way to control where it going to open on either end!"

The reality of the situation was far worse than they knew, as multiple holes into parallel and alternate worlds opened across the entire east coast of the United States. From Gotham to Metropolis and beyond, random things pulled from other realities were pulled through.

"Cut the power! We need to stop this now!"

An order that was quickly followed, much to the relief of the gathered men and women of science. The vortex slowed until it dissipated entirely, ending the chaos that they had unintentionally caused.

While the brilliant minds of STAR Labs breathed a collective sigh of relief, a blond ninja had been plucked from his home, and sent spiraling into unknown territory with a loud cry of "Shiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiittttt!" The place he would find himself was at the home of...

1353221.content:
Naruto was sent careening out of the gateway he had been sucked into, where he landed hard as he hit the ground, knocking the breath from him, and left him gasping for air. He scrambled to his feet, adrenaline bypassing his body’s need for oxygen as he stood up to get a look at his landing point. A place he soon found out was the butt of a giant humanoid, with the athletic, curvy form of a woman.

The sheer size of this being made him smaller than a doll to her. He tried to escape from the valley between her ass cheeks, but only managed to alert the giantess to his presence. He tried to summon some chakra to escape, but found it unexpectedly absent, one more thing to investigate.

“What the hell?! What’s touchin’ my ass?” came the voice of the woman. A thumb and forefinger came and plucked him free of the plump rear. As he was moved he saw the full figure of the giantess, who wore some rather odd clothing, similar to clowns he had seen at festivals when he was training with Jiraiya. He was then deposited on a hard, wooden surface, once more knocking the wind out of him.

“What on Earth are you?” said the weirdly dressed giant, her gloved hand reaching down once more to the tiny ninja who was too exhausted from his unexpected trip through realities to dodge. The massive fingers gripped him tight and lifted him up to the big blue eyes which stared at him with wonder and almost manic glee.

“Hey! Please help me!” Naruto cried, putting all his hopes on the chance that he had ended up with a charitable individual. Hopes which would be absolutely destroyed soon.

“Oh my, you’re alive?!” the excitable woman said as her lips split into an almost sinister smile. “’I’ve been lookin’ for a boy toy ever since I split up with Mistah J, but I never thought it would be so literal. Sorry, short stuff, but this is too good a chance to give up, you’re mine now!”

Naruto shivered at the implications.
