13532314.content:
“I-I’m still confused?” Naruto uttered, not really understanding the situation that was in front of him. Gathered in the Hokage’s building, in the now rebuilt Hidden Leaf Village, Naruto stood in front of the fifth Hokage, Tsunade. His close friend Sakura Haruno by his side. He looked at her for help, which she only replied with a sigh.

“Naruto, we have told you several times.” She said, the pink haired girl not liking the conversation. “We are sending you away.”

“You are far too much a target Naruto.” The Hokage said, leaning her way in. Her chest on display. “Too many tailed beasts have been taking so far, and we can’t risk the Akatsuki getting the rest. While we do have faith Killer Bee, and your strength has been increased, I feel like this would be the best course of action. To send you away.”

“But i’ve gotten so much stronger!” He said to her. “I can handle myself. I beat Pain and defended the village.”

“You have,” Tsunade finished. “Which is why I don’t want that power taken by the Akatsuki. This isn’t permanent, it’s only until this threat has been taking care of.”

“So what? I’m suppose to just walk the beach, until I get told to come back.” He said, obviously a bit upset at the moment. The Hidden Leaf was his home, and this was his fight. He spent all this time trying to get everyone to accept him, to welcome him in the village, and now he is being told to leave.

“Naruto, I know you don’t like it but it’s for the best. When seeing a chance at destruction, you have to understand that I will try to avoid it.

He didn’t respond to that, but was angry about it. His eyes distant, as Sakura moved to him.

“Naruto, I know this is gonna be hard, but it’s for the village. Please...”

Eventually, she decided to hug Naruto. Something he was not expecting, as he rarely got hugged by her. He of course reacted back, giving her a hug.

“Goodbye Naruto, for now at least.” She said in her ear, when suddenly, she moved her hands around behind his back.

He could not see it, but after some hand signs, , she shouted. “Grand Teleportation Jutsu!”

When she yelled this, Naruto felt his body tingle, and he gets covered in a white light.

When Sakura pulled away, she took a look at the light, until finally seeing the light go away, and so was Naruto.

“He’s gone.” She said before accepting it. Sasuke left the village, and she would have never thought Naruto would do the same, and she would of never thought she was the one who would do it.

-

When the light finally died down, Naruto jumped back in a panic. No longer with Sakura and Tsunade, but instead he was somewhere else. It wasn’t even day anymore, as the moon was above him.

With a spin, he looked around figuring they sent him away. It was quite a hard thing to truly accept it, but eventually he did. Moving on, as it was one of the things he could do best.

Turning around and spinning, he tried to figure out where he was. Not really place he knew. Like mentioned before, it was night time. Building around Naruto, as he was in what seemed to be a alley. Looking around so many times, until he noticed something.

These buildings... were giant. Massive even, as it towered over him. He was more like a doll where he was rather than anything else! The buildings seemed too big for him, towering like mountains while truly they were only two floors. So he was sent away to a distant land, with loud sounds, and a large environment.

He had to figure this place out. Luckily he can still feel his chakra run through his body, so with that he started to run! Running through as he planned to look around.

He was here, and as much as it upsets him he needs to face this. Running around to the corner, he peered through the street when suddenly a giant shoe slammed in front of him!

Freaking out, and jumping back it was the last thing he was really expecting! A look at the shoe, he was able to see who was wearing that shoe. A giant man, someone who towered over him.

He was more than huge, he was giant! The giant man in a business suit walked past as Naruto was left stunned. He was more of a toy by comparison. He was in a land of giants!

Stopping to think, Naruto didn’t leave the alley, instead thought about what he was going to do. Get a giant’s attention obviously. Naruto does have this way of getting people on his side.

So he was going to get one of their attention and hopefully, things go well from that point on. Peeking around the corner, he was amazed as he looked to the giant city. It was all stone, towering over him and even in the distance. Some being so big it is beyond measure. The giants who walked past, dressed in clothes he had never seen before. Not to mention, on occasion when looking at the bright lit up sky above him. He would occasionally see giant metal flying ships going through.

This was so different from his home, to the point where he could barely understand it. Regardless, Naruto was gonna try to find someone to get the attention of.

However, he wasn’t the one to find someone, someone found him. A large foot step cracking down near him, making him jump back away. A bit afraid as he looked up.

“Hm, was that a bug?” The voice questioned, as he say the giant girl look down at him! A girl looked down at him, and he was found. Guess Naruto was going to go with this girl.

The giant girl being ____________
13532314.title: Naruto Going Beyond

choices: He puts up a fight, but still loses
1353231451.content:
As Naruto looked up, the sight he saw was someone he did not expect. A weird woman to match this weird place he found himself in. From head to toe, there was a dark blue tone throughout her entire body. Not only her outfit, which had big blue boots, and a one piece of blue. However it was her skin, which was admittedly a lighter shade of blue, but still blue. Her hair, which looked like it was the same as her clothes, and her eyes were even blue. He was stunned at what she was.

However considering he talked to a giant toad before, he didn’t remain shocked for long. Which was good, cause a giant boot appeared above him and he saw what was happening. He was about to get stepped on! It was just a sudden movement from Inque, but to him it was a lot more.

Jumping and moving around, dodging his way and escaping. She didn’t press down with enough power, and chances are she probably wouldn’t even kill the small ninja, however he still escaped it.

“Hey!” Naruto yelled as the foot placed. “Watch where you are stepping, I almost got flattened!”

Inque paused, her eyes moving back to the bug. She was going to step on it and literally move on, but it would seem something more was going on.

Little did Naruto know, he was not in front of an average woman, but instead the villain and thief Inque! Known throughout the world as one of the most dangerous things alive. She was currently in her normal disguise, a similar look to what she was like before the accident.

And Naruto was unlucky enough to meet her!

For Inque, she looked down to Naruto and wasn’t that shocked in the end. She has heard that in Gotham City, some teenagers have gone and gotten spliced. A process that involved mixing someone’s DNA with that of an animal to become a hybrid. Guess there was a group of even stupider teenagers that had a similar progress to become literally dust under her feet. That was the common sense answer.

She looked down to him, before she had to do something. Turning around and facing him and the alley, Naruto was a little bit more intimidated by the woman. Which grew even more as she lifted her giant boot, letting him see her foot.

She was actually trying to step on him now! He could figure the last one was an accident, but this clearly wasn’t!

“W-What are you doing?” He questioned as she smiled a bit of a wicked smile.

“Lets just say, i’m giving you a lesson on genetic modification, and the dangers of it!!”

And with that, she brought him boot down. This would of worked on anyone else, but not Naruto.
 With a launch of his chakra in his feet. He flipped his way backwards and dodged the boot. Sliding as he looked up to her, while Inque was quite surprised.

“Hey! Don’t try to step on me!” Naruto barked, not liking it as she frowned.

“Quite a rude tone, for someone so much bigger!” This time she stepped with her other foot, only for Naruto to dodge again. This happened two more times, each step getting more and more aggressive. Who was this guy?

As for Naruto, he found himself having trouble dodging more and more, as he finally had to pull something else out. She wasn’t going to listen to reason, and Naruto needed a break.

On his jump back on the final step, he created his favourite hand sign. “Shadow Clone Jutsu!”

To Inque’s utter surprise, there was a small smoke screen by her feet, when suddenly this little blonde teenager has multiplied. Before there was only one, but it would turn out now there was more. About six or seven of them, all scattered around into the alley. Her eyes shocked.

“Okay can we just talk! So you can stop stepping on me!” one of them said.

Problem was, it was Inque. “I don’t think so. Clearly, you are not normal. More to you than I expected, so let’s get you up!” She said reaching down for them. All of the clones dodged out of the way, except for one who ran up her shoulder.

The clone was quick, much quicker than Inque thought. So when it got to her arm, she slapped it with her hand. Killing the bug clone as it went into smoke.

“A neat little trick. Disposable clones. let’s find out which one of you is the real one!” She said, a bit sadistic as she steps on all of them. One by one, the clones went and poofed, until finally she found the last one and stepped on it, finding it much like the others. Disposable.

Cause the true Naruto, was clinging to the wall, his move charging. Clearly, this woman was too sadistic, so Naruto was planning on ending her quick.

With a charged Rasengan in his hand, he let his chakra go and fall from the wall. No longer sticking as he flew towards the admittedly beautiful face of Inque.

She only saw him at the last second, unable to do anything as he flew right to her with a swing of his hand.

“Rasengan!!” He yelled, hitting her hard as she actually got sent back, almost tripping over. Naruto bounced off his attack, moving and falling onto his feet. His Chakra taking the blunt of the landing as he looked up to her. He knew his damage wouldn’t do much, but this was simply to threaten her to leave. It wasn’t his strongest attack.
 As for Inque, she can’t believe it. It actually hurt her. She didn’t know how but it did! He was going to pay. Turning to him, Naruto was shocked, she had a dent in her head! Did it break through her skull?

No, something more wicked. As her body moved and contorted. He freaked as the body in front of him changed. From a beautiful blue woman, to a dangerous blob. One that seemed edged and sharp.

With one bright eye looking down at him. “You are going to pay for that one!”
1353231451.title: The Dangerous Inque

13532314512.content:
So this has taken a surprising turn for Naruto. Not only did this giant blue woman try to kill him, after hitting and admittedly holdback Rasengan, she morphed and turned into a creature he never seen before. Her body seemed more like liquid than a body at this point, making her very concerned.

Still this was not good.

“Poor little boy, you have no idea what you are in store for.” She said, a voice emanating from her body, even though she didn’t have a mouth. Before Naruto could even think to quip back, she sprung a extended hand to him.

He jumped back at his top speed, leaping away from the splash. He was not going to get away though, as her splash became solid and a small reach extended for him.


He got grabbed and wrapped around as she brought her arm back. Bringing him up to her face, or whatever her head was.

“Now, let me get a good look at you.” She said as Naruto struggled out. Something that Inque just had to taunt about. “Don’t bother you are too weak.”

Naruto did bother, as he got an arm free and tossed a kunai at her head. It hit her, but seemed to just fly right through, almost like she wasn’t solid at all. While Inque had to admit, given that size it was a powerful throw.

“No point, i’ve got you.” She said feeling confident, until Naruto smirked.

“Wrong, you’ve got a clone!!”

“What!”

Suddenly his body disappeared in smoke as she realised it was true. The being looked around, looking for Naruto.

Only, he was behind her. Transforming back to his body, he knew that Kunai trick would work. Now he was behind. Quickly charging another attack, he fired.

“Rasenshuriken!!” He shouted, tossing it at her. As she saw another attack coming. This one not holding back.

She got hit, and fell down from the powerful blast. Naruto falling down himself looking at the beast.

“Damn it, that attack would beat most, yet she looks like all it did was piss her off.” he said to himself.

Cause, yeah it pissed her off. Whatever these attacks weren’t they were hurting her! Hurting her good! She turned around angry seeing the small orange bug.

Suddenly her body disposed into more of a liquid as she rushed to Naruto.

With a panic he got to turning and tried running away from the tsunami that was Inque.

He didn’t really have a way to escape this, so he got ready. “Shadow Clone Jutsu!”

He spawned one more, and jumped on his shoulder, leaping off the other Naruto as he disappeared. Into the air and going to the wall.

“No you don’t! I’m not holding back now!” She yelled finally reaching him. Her grip grabbing Naruto as he felt it wrap around his body.

He got grabbed and swung down, bringing him to the ground as he hit with a powerful hit. Hitting hard onto the ground.

Her body held him down as she brought her other hand around. It started to move and become a weapon, a powerful mullet.

“Let me end you little boy!” She yelled, bringing it down as he didn’t really have a way out of this one. He was stuck!

Not out though, as he moved for another jutsu. For her, she slammed it down and hit him hard. However, as she raised it up she saw nothing but a small piece of food wrapping.

“W-What? Where did he go?” She questioned, looking around like crazy. He was out of sight, he somehow escaped!

She wasted no time as her body started sticking out like pillars. Grabbing everything and lifting it out. Her head swinging around like crazy as she was looking.

And with the ninja in bright orange, he was able to spot. “There you are!” She screamed, leaping to him like a monster!

Naruto could do nothing as she collided with him, hitting him hard and pulling him back.

Inque with a satisfied resolve pulled him back. He was trying to hide, what a pathetic being. She pulled him back and stood to her full height. Her fingers swinging around Naruto as it held his four limps out. Almost like a machine she encased in his hands, making sure no more of those little attacks happen.

“Now, you have been caught.” She said finally as she pulled him up. Suddenly her body head shifted around and shook around, until finally she was back to what she looked. “Tell me who you are, right now!”

“Ehh! Ahh!” He yelled fighting around unable to get out. He couldn’t grab any of his ninja tools, he couldn’t do any hand signs. He wasn’t even a clone.

She got him, and he hated it. She tightened the grip around his body, making him more uncomfortable as she held nothing back from this. Threatening to break her body.

“I said tell me! Tell me who you are?”

“I-I’m Naruto Uzamaki.” He said to her, sending her a glare. One that she was not a real fan of.

“Inque. Now, what was that technique you were doing? Creating energy blasts, cloning yourself, somehow substituting yourself. Explain now!?”

The more Inque knew, the better. Hence is why she was getting so aggressive about it.

“My chakra? Wait do you not know what chakra is? Wait, what are you? You don’t seem like a human?”

She tightened her grip even more and more aggressive. “Answer my damn question!” She yelled, not holding anything back. He would of, but suddenly she caught something at the corner of her eye. It was a rat, but that rose the problem.

“I can’t do this here, not with the bat around. Well, Naruto Uzamaki.” She said to you, being aggressive about it. “It would seem you are coming with me.” She said as she gave a smirk. Suddenly, her fingers encased his mouth and nose.

He struggled, but he could do nothing as he gets knocked out. Going unconscious.

Where does Inque go with him?
13532314512.title: Naruto Vs. Inque

135332.title: Ozzy and Drix

1353321.content:
Naruto Uzumaki hated hospitals.

Not for the people who worked there, nor for what happens within them, but just because of how utterly dead it makes you feel when you were inside one. White walls, white floors, white clothes...it was all so eerily dead! The least they could do was add some different colors to some rooms, so it didn't make you feel like you're quarantined from the rest of the world. And then there were the needles, And don't even get him started on the smell! It's either that of sickness or sterilization. Ugh!

As far as he was concerned, the word "hospital" stood for "Horrible Obnoxiously Smelling Place Insistently Trapping All Locals."

And yet here he was. Sitting on a doctor's table, waiting and waiting. At least he wasn't wearing one of those stupid paper-thin gown-shirts.

Still...there was quite a few places he'd rather be right now. Like at the home of his recently-acquired girlfriend, Tenten, for example. He and Tenten have secretly been together before he left the village three years ago, and when he came back they both decided that they would reveal their relationship to the others, and when they did everyone was surprised and sadly one Hinata Hyuga was heartbroken but thanks to Tenten's quick thinking she and Naruto explained everything and fully apologized to her and still wanted to be friends and Tenten even told her, that if anything Kami-sama forbid happens to her, Tenten could trust Hinata to take good care of Naruto for her and Hinata accepted. From then on they have been going steady and after this he was hoping they would kick their relationship to the next level.

So yeah...Naruto was NOT enjoying himself right now.

Then the door opened and his mood really took a nosedive at WHO was playing his nurse.

Sakura Haruno.

However little did Naruto know, was that Sakura wasn't here to perform a simple check up on Naruto she was here to get rid of him for good.

Sakura was extremely jealous of Naruto and Tenten's relationship as she swore to her self before team seven was a official team, that she and Sasuke would become the very first couple of the rookie twelve, and not to mention that Tenten would NEVER shut-up about how Naruto was a wonderful boyfriend and how he always treated her like a goddess and the list went on and on with no end in sight! Ugh! It drove her crazy!!!

But that was all about to change right here and right now, but she had to play it smart and make sure Naruto doesn't know anything until it's too late, so she smiled at him and said, "Okay Naruto, Don't get too excited, I'm just here to do your check-up and we'll be done."

And from there Sakura went on with the usual medical check-up procedures, Checking Naruto's pulse, heart-beats, breathing, etc.

When they were just about finished Sakura decided to kick her plan into action and said, "Alright Naruto looks like you have a clean bill of health, but before I let you go there is one more thing I want you to do."

Naruto raised an eyebrow after Sakura said that and asked in a curious voice, "Okay Sakura, what do you want me to do?"

Sakura smiled and simply said, "Follow me, what I want you to do for me is in the microbiology room."

Naruto raised an eyebrow after Sakura said that but he just shrugged and followed his teammate, 'she knows what she's doing, right?' Naruto thought to himself.

As they entered in the room, Sakura then pointed at a microscope slide in the middle of the room on the floor and said, "Now Naruto, I want you to stand right on top that microscope slide, and don't worry about breaking it, as the slide is reinforced to withstand your full weight, Hell even Choji can stand on it and not make it crack on the glass."

Naruto still looked unsure but decided to obey Sakura's command and did what she said and was surprised that she was right, as the moment he placed his foot on the glass it didn't even crack under his full body weight and then Sakura walked up to Naruto and held out a bluish-white pill and said, "Now Naruto I want you to take this pill right now, it's a special allergy medication pill and after you take this pill you'll never have to worry about getting allergies for the rest of you're life."

Naruto said, "But Sakura I don't have any allergies to begin with, at least as far as I know."

Sakura getting slightly irritated said in a threatening voice, "Naruto you either swallow this pill or you'll take it through an anal injection with a VERY LONG AND SHARP NEEDLE."

Rather not having a very long and sharp needle up his ass, Naruto quickly snatches the pill out of Sakura's hand and she give him a plastic cup of water and told Naruto to not move from the microscope slide when he takes it.

Naruto still confused about why Sakura wants Naruto to stay on the microscope slide again just shrugs his shoulders and takes the pill and drinks all the water, and the second the pill landed in his stomach he suddenly felt dizzy as he could see Sakura grinning a victorious smirk as the room was spinning around him and he then felt very sleepy and before he knew it he passed out.

After Naruto swallowed the pill, the pill's effects immediately kicked in, as he was already less than one inch in height and still shrinking, the odd thing she thought of was why didn't Naruto shrink out of his clothes but then shrugged her shoulders as it didn't matter anyway, he was already the size of a white blood cell and that's all that mattered to her as she picked up the slide and looked in the microscope and saw that Naruto was fast asleep completely unaware that the pill Sakura gave him wasn't an allergy immunity pill but is was really an untested drug that apparently knocks out the subject and rapidly shrinks them down to the size of a white blood cell was the effect of the drug, Sakura smiled when she saw Naruto was still asleep and began her next phase of her plan.

He paced, feeling restless. He never did well at staying still, he always had too much energy, and trying to figure out things and why this had happened to him just left him stressed out. Depending on your hair's natural oiliness, curliness, and other factors, you'll need to tweak the basic "poofing" process slightly to make sure it works right for you. While the essential process should be the same, pay attention to the way your own hair behaves and tweak the process accordingly.
If you have very thin hair, you'll probably need to use a considerable amount of hairspray or other product to get your hair to stay up. If your hair is a lot thicker, you should use less product and tease your hair more.
If you have oily hair, most people will need to wash more frequently 4-5 times per week, to make it more poofy. Some people, however, tend to get a little more body the less frequently hair is washed.

Clean your hair using shampoo. You want your hair to be nice and clean when you attempt to poof it up. Massage a pea-sized amount of shampoo into your scalp and hair follicles, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
Get to know your own body and wash your hair as frequently as it needs it. In general, you want to wash slightly less. 3-4 times per week should be enough for most people.
Avoid washing in excessively hot water, which can dry your hair out and leave it stringy.

Apply conditioner. Hair conditioner is used to leave your hair feeling smooth, and it can also help to give your hair some body, without tangling it up. If you want to emphasize your hair's natural body, use hair conditioner every time you wash it.
Rinse out conditioner thoroughly, running water through a couple of times to make sure it's all gone. If you don't, excess conditioner can make your hair feel greasy and lank after you wash it.

Gently comb through your hair. Tangles might make your hair look a little bigger, but not in a good way. When your hair is still wet, run a comb through it a couple times. Make sure all of the knots, tangles, and snarls are carefully combed through before proceeding to the poofing process.

Blow dry your hair halfway. You can also then put your hair in a bun. Letting you hair dry out in a bun can be one of the best ways of adding a little body naturally, just by letting it dry. Use a hair dryer to get your hair dry enough to work with, then put it up in a tight bun on top of your head. When your hair is dry, remove it. You should have some curl and some body to work with.

Back-comb or tease the hair in the middle of your head. The most reliable way of giving your hair body and poofiness is to back-comb, or "tease" your hair out. To do this, you want to comb up a portion of hair from the middle of the top of your head, and hold it up straight. Take your comb and pull it through down toward your scalp, the reverse of how you'd normally comb when your hair lays flat.
If your hair isn't long enough to back-comb, you can still tease it. Use a comb, pick, or a brush and use short, frequent combing strokes through the hair to tease it out.
Don't do this with all you hair, just the hair in the direction you want to make look poofy. If you want more body on the sides, tease out the hair on the sides of your head. If you want more body on the top, tease out the hair on top and leave the front and sides alone.

Keep teasing until you have some poof. How long it takes to get your hair poofy will depend on your style of hair. Keep working until it starts to get some body and some frizz. At first, it may look quite frizzy and unsightly, but you can learn to style the hair to maintain this body without looking all ratty.

Lift your hair with your hands and apply hairspray. Now, your hair should be a little poofier, and you can get it to stay in place using a strong-holding hairspray. Use your comb to bring your hair up, or just grab it with your hands. Hold it out from your head as much as possible and hit it with some spray.
Again, use less spray if you have especially thick hair. You won't need to use much and it might just weigh your hair down.

Lay your hair back over the poofy area, if desired. To make your hairstyle poofy, comb your bangs, sides, or other hairs you left straight over the poofy area, and style your hair normally. If you poofed up in the middle, comb your bangs back over the top of your head, so those hairs will rest over the teased-out hair, obscuring them, but emphasizing the bounce.

Then this here's something to remember me by." Phoebe then shoved Naruto's face back into her lips as she gave him a longer and more deeper kiss for a good few minutes.

A short time later, Naruto was sitting in the corner of the box Phoebe put him in to be mailed to Mandy's cousin Mindy and was wondering why of all the people in this dimension, it had to be Mandy and her mother to find him....

13533222221222.content:
As Naruto sat inside his box, with no other choice but to wait to be delivered to Mindy, he didn't know that right across from him was another box, one that held a meteorite inside that seemed to glow occasionally.

Now what this meteorite was to be used for was anyone's guess, but if it fell into the wrong hands, it could ultimately spell disaster.

Then suddenly a buzzsaw appeared in the plane's bottom and made a hole big enough to have a person fit through it, and soon a woman in her thirtys entered via the hole and began to look for something.

The woman in question had brown hair and eyes, with white skin while wearing a white skintight suit with matching high heeled boots.

She seemed to be looking for something while in a hurry as she opened one package and threw it away after seeing what was inside wasn't what she was after, when her hand made it to Naruto's box and began to tear the box open.

Naruto, seeing the box being opened, quickly laid down and remained still and hope that whoever opened his box thought he was just a toy.

After being thrown by the woman, Naruto fell into a different box and landed right on top of a meteorite that was paced there.

The meteorite itself wasn't too big, about twice the size of the average baseball.

Suddenly, with a deafening crack, the meteor gained a long crack right down its center. Reeling back, Naruto fell right on his behind and watched as the crack seemed to spread over the surface of the rock like a cracking eggshell. 'Oh man, THAT can't be a good sign!' Naruto thought in a panic. Before his imagination could get out of hand, the shards of the meteor fell apart, revealing a reddish glow that lite up the box.

Despite all common sense telling him he should LEAVE NOW, Naruto couldn't help but feel drawn to the light. Getting up from the ground, the young Uzumaki walked over and peered into the broken meteor. Inside the crumbled rock lay a beautiful red gemstone. Despite being from space, the precious mineral was perfectly cut into a rounded shape like it just came out of a jewelry store. Naruto, in a daze, reached out his hand towards the gem. Suddenly, the light vanished from the box and Naruto blinked the daze out of his eyes.

"Man…must have blacked out there for a second," Naruto mumbled while shaking his head to clear the cobwebs. Looking back at the now empty meteor, he wondered aloud, "Did…did I just imagine there being a jewel in that thing?"

As soon as those words left his mouth, he collapsed to his knees, clutching his chest in pain. "Holy shit! That hurts like a mother! What in the world-?!" he all but screamed out as he ripped at his shirt and jacket to get it off in the hopes he'd be able to alleviate the searing heat that seemed to be originating from his chest before spreading to his body through his chakra network.

Finally removing the clothing, Naruto stared with wide eyes at his now glowing chest. Or more specifically, the glowing red gemstone embedded in his chest! "W-what in the-?!" he was cut off as another spasm of pain rocked his entire body. It felt like acid was being dumped into his chakra network as whatever energy the gemstone was giving off used the pathways to spread throughout his entire body!

"AAAARRRRGGGGHHHH!" he howled in pain as he went from a kneeling position to down on his hands and knees, his eyes shut from the agony his body was experiencing. If he'd kept his eyes open, Naruto would have witnessed his body undergo a startling transformation! On the skin surrounding the embedded gemstone, veins started to rise up and pulse angrily as they spread across Naruto's body. White fur then started to spring up on the boy's person and even his blonde hair turned snowy white before growing out into a long mane. Naruto's nails broke apart as razor sharp, inch long nails grew out of his fingertips, as well as his toes. Naruto's feet seemed to lengthen with a sickening crack of bone, warping until the former blonde's legs now looked more like those of a canine species. His tailbone then lengthened before becoming covered in the same fur now covering his body, becoming a sweeping lupine tail. Naruto's muscles seemed to bulge out, and while not becoming bodybuilder sized, they were more defined like an Olympic gymnast. Finally, Naruto's head changed. Real whiskers sprouted out of his birthmarks as his ears stretched to the top of his head and became pointed. With another crack, the boy's face lengthened as his teeth became pointed fangs, forming a muzzle complete with black nose.

The transformed ninja lay there for a minute or two, panting, before he rose up on his new legs and let out a long howl to the rising moon. As he howled, the boy's clothes which had been either ripped or discarded during the change, glowed with a strange light that emanated from the jewel still visibly fused into Naruto's chest (despite the fur). When the glow faded, Naruto's lupine form was wearing a new outfit. He now wore what almost looked to be a mix of a green tunic with matching shorts and golden armor. His arms and dog shaped legs now had golden gauntlets on them, and his tunic had matching shoulder guards. The werewolf like boy wore two belts, one around his waist that had another red gem for the buckle while the other was strapped across his torso like a bandolier with golden spikes jutting out from it. On his back rested a quiver full of golden-colored arrows, while at his hip was a jewel-hilted golden sword in its sheath.

When the man-wolf stopped howling, he looked around with red eyes at his surroundings. He gave a growl like a wild animal looking for prey. But Naruto didn't even move a step before he brought a clawed hand to his head with a sharp whine. For an entire minute, Naruto thrashed his head around like there was a war waging inside his skull, and it wouldn't be that far from the truth. Suddenly, Naruto gave another howl but this one was much shorter and sounded almost human in some regards. When he finally opened his eyes, they were still red in color but lacked the feral nature they displayed earlier.

Naruto blinked and let out a groan, "Ugh, my head-!" he then let out a cough as he went to massage his throat. "Man, what's up with my voice? It sounds like I'm gargling gravel!"

As he rubbed his furry throat with his clawed hand, Naruto mused, "Something feels…different. Why does it feel like I'm wearing a fur scarf and hey! I'm not shrunk any...more...?" He trailed off as he observed his hand, his furry, clawed hand, and with widening eyes, quickly looked over as much of his body as he could, observing all the changes that had occurred and even went to feel his now lupine face. Naruto, placing his arms to his sides, stood completely still and quiet for several moments and then…

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHH!"

Naruto froze. What the...? He could hear normally, but when he tried to talk, him mouth didn't move like it should when he spoke, yet he could hear his own voice, and it was more like he was hearing vibrations inside his skull, not the regular sounds. It was as if his mind was vibrating like a strummed cord and projecting what he wanted to say directly.

But how was that...? His eyes widened, "Telepathy? I can use telepathy?! What the HECK is going on?!" He demanded.

Meanwhile, the woman that had broken into the plane turned around and instantly went pale.

How in the HELL--?!

A 6'6", red-eyed arctic werewolf, it's body was covered in dense white fur, it's fingers and toes ended in sharp claws, and was wearing an armor of scale mail and green boots like an adventurer from the midevil ages!

Armor...broadsword... dagger...a short bow and arrows. Sheesh, this monster looked like it belonged in a Renaissance festival. But a sworld-weilding, white werewolf in boots and armor, carrying a bow and arrows, and uses telepathy to talk?

Where had it come from?!

Seeing the creature look at itself in...was that scock and confusion?....Geraldine quickly got over her shock and quickly pulled out a spray bottle and aimed it in Naruto's direction and sprayed.

Naruto, hearing the spray, looked in her general direction, until he breathed in the spray which carried nanoscopic probes that function like spors and took control of whoever or apparently whatever breathes them in.

Soon enough, Naruto suddenly stopped moving and stood still at attention and at seeing her probes already at work, Geraldine Husk smirked "Oh yes...I don't know where you came from, and you're not what I came to get, but I do know that I can certainly put you to use. How about...as my new pet....why, I even have a few chew toys just waiting for you!" The woman cooed wickedly, running her hands through the thick, soft fur of the werewolf.

Kissing her "new per" on the nose, she turned and beckoned it as she exited through the hole in the mail plain she'd made, getting abord her personal ship, the beastial midevil warrior following her, obedient as a well-trained puppy.

She might not have gotten that meteorite she was planning to use, but this was a better prize. WHOOP wouldn't know what hit them!

choices: Found by Blue Pearl and brought to her Diamond.
135332222222211.content:
Long before the Diamond Authority found and tried to colonize the Planet Earth, they discovered an ancient planet with ruins that were there from a time before the Gems were capable of flight. When they first explored the planet, they could tell that the planet was too old for their plans and soon left, but not before finding something strange from the ruins. This odd, pink, star-shaped object was unraveged by time unlike the ruins around it. Not knowing what to do with it, the gems that were sent to this planet took it with them to show their leaders just what they had found. The Diamonds didn't know what to do with it until one of their own decided to keep it and later gift it to another of their own. Pink Diamond was the one who first kept this strange object before deciding to give it to Blue Diamond as a way to remember her by. Blue kept the thing unsure of what to do with it, but was still a kind momento from Pink Diamond. Eventually, the events of the rebellion of the Crystal Gems came and gone, but Blue Diamond kept the strange thing now as a memory of Pink Diamond. It wasn't until one strange day that the object did something remarkable.

It is near the start of the series that we see Blue Diamond still mourning the loss of her fellow Diamond, the object beside her as always when she mourned. As she mourned, a smaller blue lifeform came into the room. "I'm sorry for the interruption, My Diamond, but Yellow Diamond said she needed to meet with you over something important. What shall I tell her?" Asked the blue Pearl. Blue diamond tried to clear her eyes as she replied, "Tell her I'll be there in a moment. Let me dry my eyes first." The Diamond quickly dries her tears and follows the Pearl out, leaving behind the object. After a few minutes of sitting there, the box suddenly started glowing. As it glowed the top part seemed to fade away, leaving a white star shape open. It stayed open before something started to rise out of it. It wasn't until whatever it was was completely out did the object return to the way it was before, leaving the small being with it.

It was an average day in Konohagakure for our blonde hero. It has been peaceful ever since the end of the Fourth Great war, and Naruto was enjoying every second of it. Sure there were still bandit attacks, but it was a lot better than being at constant cold war. Naruto was truly enjoying the peace from this. "What a great day. The sun is shining, a nice breeze, and only one or two clouds in sight. I think I'll go and train today. Never know when something will happen." said the blonde Uzumaki, unaware of what was about to happen. He soon started training and was taking a break to regain his energy when something happened. He was sitting down when a star started to shine and grow from under him. It quickly grew to the point of being able to contain him, but Naruto tried to escape. Tried being the word as when he tried to run, he felt himself slam into some sort of barrier. "Huh? What the hell?!" shouted Naruto as he realized he was trapped. It was then that he felt himself start to sink into the glowing star. He tried to fight it, but eventually he was soon completely gone from where he was. The star soon shrank into oblivion, leaving nothing around.

As Naruto fell, he saw odd visions of gem stones and odd sights of women summoning weapons of of white light. These images soon overwhelmed Naruto, knocking him out. He soon came back into focus as he tried to make sense of where he was. "What was that light?" he asked himself groggily. Shaking his head to give himself a bit of focus, he looked around to see a humongous room. Looking up, he saw odd bubbles that looked to have gem stones inside of them. Finally, he noticed the big star shaped object behind him. "Now I remember!" Naruto exclaimed. Unsure of what to do, he quickly uses the shadow clone jutsu, telling the clones to grab the thing and carry it behind a pillar. It wasn't soon after they were half way when a giant door opened in the distance. What entered shocked the ninja. "Holy crap, that woman is huge!" he mentally exclaimed. Following her was another woman, but much smaller, yet still giant to Naruto.

As the taller beings walked over to where he originally was, he overheard the conversation they were having. "Why does Yellow Diamond try to get me to shatter these gems every time she is here?" the taller blue lifeform asks. "I'm unsure, my Diamond. She said that they just bring bad memories." replied the shorter of the two. Unsure of what to do, Naruto and his clones just kept quiet and listened to the conversation. It wasn't until something was said that Naruto began to worry. "At least I still have that odd object Pink Diamond gave me. Huh? Where is it?" the taller being said. "Uh oh." Naruto said as he realized what she was talking about. He quickly dispelled his clones and hid, eaving the object behind. The shorter being quickly started to look around for it and found it where Naruto left it. "I found it, my Diamond. It somehow got behind this pillar." the shorter being reported. "Thank you Pearl." the being said to the Pearl? "Huh. Wonder why they keep calling themselves precious stones. Oh well. Now I have to escape." Naruto quickly figured out the best way would to leave with the so called Pearl. He had to wait a few minutes before he heard her say she will wait outside for her call. "Okay, here's my chance." Naruto said as he quietly followed the Pearl to the door, keeping a safe distance. The door keeps getting closer until he was finally out. "Awesome. Now to figure out where I am." Naruto said, forgetting about the being he followed out.

What happens next?
135332222222211.title: Diamond Authority

1353322222222112.content:
Unaware to the shinobi, he was being watched by the very being he followed. 'So this is what moved my Diamond's item. He looks human, but he is also six inches tall. What an odd being.' thought the Pearl. While Naruto wasn't looking, Blue Pearl quickly turned around and grabbed him. "So you are the being that moved my Diamond's item. I don't know what you are or how you got here, but for know I'll take you to my Diamond for judgement." Blue Pearl said as she brought him to her face. Naruto fit almost perfectly in her hand as Blue Pearl brought him to her master. "My Diamond, I'm sorry to interrupt, but I believe I found the culprit who moved your item." the Pearl said. "Really? Where are they?" asked Blue Diamond, only seeing her Pearl. "Right here." she said has she raised her hand. Looking closely, Blue Diamond quickly noticed just what she was holding. "A human? How did he escape? And how did he get so small?" she asked. " I'm unsure, my Diamond. I found him escaping from this room and I quickly captured him and brought him here." the Pearl replied. Picking him up between her thumb and forefinger, she quickly brought him up to her face.

"Now then little one, can you explain just how you got here and why you are so small?" Blue Diamond asked politely. Naruto, already seeing the size difference decided to be mature and polite for once. "I'm not sure ma'am. I was just training when suddenly a star started to shine under me and sucked my up. Next thing I know, I'm here and beside whatever the star shaped object is. As for being small, I just thought you were just huge." Naruto replied. "Hmm. An odd story, but I guess we can check the surveillance footage from when I was gone. As for your size, I assume you must be about six earth inches. No bigger than my pupil." said the Diamond. "Pearl. Can you go and check the footage while…?" "Naruto." "…Naruto and I chat?" Blue Diamond asked. "Of course, my Diamond." Said the Pearl before she left the room. "Now then, you said you were training? What exactly where you training for?" Blue Diamond asked.

"Well, I really just trying to keep my skill from getting rusty. Mainly tai and ninjutsu. I was going to practice sage mode, but then the star thing happened and here I am." Naruto quickly explained. "My. That sounds interesting. Would you be willing to show me?" Blue Diamond asked, curious to see what he was talking about. She was also happy about having her mind taken off from Pink Diamond. She quickly sets down and places him in front of her before watching go through katas. "Impressive. But what is ninjutsu?" Blue Diamond asked. Naruto quickly explains the concept of ninjustu, which also led to him explaining chakra. "I see. The humans I know of have never shown the capacity for that. Care to demonstrate?" Blue Diamond asked. Complying with her, Naruto quickly show off the shadow clone jutsu and henge jutsu before Blue Diamond interrupts. "While those are both impressive, I was curious about this Rasengan and Rasenshuriken you talked about." "I can show you the Rasengan, but not the Rasenshuriken. It's kinda dangerous to use. While the Rasengan can be used to stun, the Rasenshuriken is used to shred at a cellular level. It really is dangerous." Naruto explained. Walking over to a pillar, Naruto quickly charged up a Rasengan, to Blue Diamond's shock, and uses it on a pillar and leaving a massive dent in it.

"My word. That is impressive. It just might be able to shatter someone." Blue Diamond said. "Shatter?" Naruto asks. Seeing as they still had time, Blue Diamond quickly explained Gem and Homeworld structure and society to him. "Wow. So your body is really just light with mass?" Naruto asked. "Indeed. Now, what about sage mode? I'm curious to see it." Blue Diamond said. Naruto does something surprising to her and sits down. When he does, she feels some kind of pull from her form. 'Huh? What is this feeling?' she thinks. With Naruto, as soon as he enters sage mode, he notices many masses of nature chakra, including two massive ones. One that is walking away from here and another in front of him. He quickly stand up and opens his eyes, showing the effects of sage mode. "I see you changed your eyes, but what else can you do?" Blue Diamond asked, ignoring the strange feeling she felt. Naruto just smiles as he walks over to her and with one hand lifts her body up! "This form enhances my strength, sensing abilities, and a few other surprises. But I can only hold it for so long before having to recharge." Naruto explains while placing her back down. While she wasn't as heavy as a mountain, she still had some weight to her. "It also allows me to use Frog Kata." He said before standing twenty feet away from a pillar. He then throws a punch, to Blue Diamond's curiosity then shock, when she sees an imprint of a fist on the pillar about three inches in. "That was Frog Kata, which basically extends my fighting range." Naruto explained. "Incredible." Blue Diamond murmers with wonder in her eyes.

Suddenly the door opens up and Blue Pearl walked in. "I am sorry for taking so long, my Diamond. It appears that his story was true." "It is okay, my Pearl. Our new friend here was just showing what he can do." Blue Diamond said, before explaining what the two did while they waited. If Blue Pearl was shocked, she hid it well. "That explains the other gem we felt for a few minutes. I can only assume that the natural energy he calls nature chakra is what we use to make our bodies. It is worth looking into. For now, my Diamond, I believe we must get back to Homeworld. You have a meeting with a Jasper, Peridot, and others." Blue Pearl informed her Diamond. "If we must. Naruto, how would you feel about coming with us?" Blue Diamond asked, hoping he would say yes. He was interesting and she kinda wanted to know more about his world and him in general. Naruto thought it over and decided to go with her. "Sure. Maybe we can find a way to get me back to my world." "Of course. Pearl, can you carry him?" Blue Diamond asked. "Of course, my Diamond." Blue Pearl replied before picking up the ninja in her hands and following her Diamond. "By the way, Naruto. When we get back, I have a meeting to go to with some gems, as well as my fellow Diamond, Yellow. Would you rather go with me, or stay with my Pearl?" Blue Diamond asked. Naruto thought it over, but was still unsure. "I'm sorry, I can't really decide. Would it be okay if we wait until we get there before answering?" Naruto asked. "Of course." Blue Diamond replied.

The trio eventually reached Blue Diamond's ship, with Naruto in awe over where he was. The trio quickly get in and get ready to return to Homeworld. The trip was pleasant for Naruto as he was held in Blue Pearl's hands. It took a few hours, but they eventually reached their destination and Naruto had made his decision.

What was Naruto's decision?
1353322222222112.title: Found by Blue Pearl and brought to her Diamond.

135332222222212.content:
The Crystal Gems had once more returned to the galaxy warp on a regular inspection. Steven had been left behind with his father and Connie once they had persuaded him that this was simply routine and he would most likely be bored senseless by the less than thrilling mission.

"Garnet, don't you think that we have better things to do than check the galaxy warp? Didn't we, like, destroy that last time we were here?" Amethyst asked, completely bored by the situation.

"We need to make sure it still is. I doubt Homeworld will give up repairing the warp even if Peridot defected. We have to make sure no one else tries without our knowledge." Garnet left no room for debate from her teammates. This was too important to for them to neglect, especially after all they had experienced during the war with Homeworld.

The trio inspected every inch of the hub, and found nothing different from the last time they were there, but their leader wanted them to scour the place for any signs of activity before they could leave. A fact that was quick to grate on the nerves of the easily bored Amethyst.

"Ugh! This is stupid!" the gem whined as she leaned against the main hub pad. "Everything's the same as last time! Can't we call it a day, Garnet?"

"Not yet. Just keep your eyes peeled and I'll let you know when we're done."

"Aaaahhh!" Amethyst cried, and brought an angry fist down on top of the warp pad. In a manner similar to someone kicking a TV to get it to work, the gem's frustrated strike caused a temporary spark of activation. The platform flashed brightly as it powered up, however, since there was no chosen location, it transported from a random point in space, much to the dismay of its passenger.

*****

"DAMMIT!" Naruto cried as he shot through nothingness towards an unknown destination. His lungs used every bit of oxygen in them to curse his crappy luck, and the expletives didn't stop until he landed face first into his destination, onto a hard, stone floor.

*****

"What did you do, Amethyst?!" demanded Pearl as she summoned her weapon.

"I just hit the darn thing! How was I supposed to know it would turn on the stupid thing?" Amethyst retorted.

"Keep your guard up and don't let anything through." Garnet commanded as she pulled her gauntlets out, ready for battle.

After a minute, the light died down, and as far as they could tell, nothing had come through. Of course, they were wrong.

*****

Naruto cussed five more times before he stood back onto his feet and immediately spat out six more. He didn't know what had happened to him, but he was damn sure he was taller than a person's ankle a few minutes ago.

*****

A handful of minutes had passed, and with seemingly nothing happening Garnet decided to ere on the side of caution and had one of them take a close look at the warp pad.

1353322222222223222221.content:
The Smith household living room was turning into a disaster area at an alarming rate. Placed in the middle of it was Roger, the ever-problematic alien that had taken up residence in the family’s home years ago, and was now the cause of yet another emergency situation. In the center of the room stood a titanium doorframe lined with panels, wires and a display, its purpose a top secret of the CIA. It was built to open a door into parallel worlds, and it was now in the hands of one of the most dangerously negligent beings on the planet.

“Roger! You have to shut it down!” screamed Steve, the youngest child of the family, his hands held on tight to a couch leg as he was pulled towards the epicenter of the problem.

“NO!” came the alien’s response. “I can’t live in a world where they cancelled my favorite TV drama! So I’m going to travel to a reality where it never was!”

“Roger, you can’t possibly think that stealing this machine from the CIA was a good idea!” Hayley argued as she gripped one of the staircase banisters and held on for dear life.

“Shut up! I don’t care! I need my weekly dose of drama!” Roger sniped back. “I’m going to watch my show even if I have to drill existence a new asshole to do it!”

Roger ran to the control panel and input random numbers in an effort to complete his insane desire.

“But you don’t even know how that thing work!” spoke Francine, her arm outstretched in an effort to make it to the next secure handhold.

“Franny, I’m from a species that has mastered intergalactic travel, I think I can handle something scientists from this planet made.” Roger snidely replied as he entered one final keystroke.

The resulting explosion sent him into the wall like a cannon ball. The swirling energy that had been building in the metal alloy frame dispersed through the house, shattering windows and burning the clothes off everyone in the room. Once it had Roger pulled himself free.

“Well that was a bust. Okay, if anyone needs me I’m going to be binging Netflix shows for the next twelve hours.”

The rotund alien waddled out of the devastated room without a second thought.

“Well that was anti-climactic,” Steve said, his hands covering his crotch as he too left. He needed a shower and a fresh change of clothes after this craziness.

“At least your father wasn’t here for this craziness, it will take me almost a week to clean this mess.” Francine said, grateful that her husband was on a lengthy mission for the CIA and wouldn’t be back anytime soon.

“Whatever, I’m just glad Roger didn’t destroy the universe because he wanted new episodes of a stupid tv show.”

While it may have seemed to them that the device was a failure, something small, about the size of three inches, had been flung into their world by the explosion, and had embedded itself into the ceiling. This was outsider was one Naruto Uzumaki, ninja of Konoha, who was now unconscious, and peeling off the ceiling and fell straight down.

--- Flashback ---

It all started back in Konohagakure, when Naruto was just walking around the village minding his own business, he just finished having a ramen eating frenzy at Ichiraku ramen for a mission well done with his old trouble-making friends from the academy Kiba Inuzuka, Choji Akimichi and Shikamaru Nara.

Then as he walked, he ran into Inochi and talked together for a bit and Inochi then brought up Ino's upcoming birthday, which caused Naruto to flinch at that and as soon as Inochi left and was out of sight, Naruto quickly ran to get Ino a present, he was so embarrassed, he had completely forgotten Ino's birthday and he didn't have anything to give her, but he ran to a nearby gift store that always allowed him service.

Naruto walked in and greet the shopkeeper with a smile, "Hey old man! Got anything for a birthday gift?"

The old man smiled, "I see you forgot Ino's birthday huh Naruto? Well, lucky for you, I have just the very thing you need, for this gift Ino will love for that I can most guarantee."

The old man rhymed as he then pulled out a box with various animals on it and when he opened it, inside the box was a very beautiful golden necklace with a golden amulet that looked like a lion's mouth trying to bite down on a pure sapphire stone.

"This is perfect! Ino-chan will definitely love this amulet!", Naruto said as he paid the shopkeeper and as he was about to pick it up out of the box, suddenly the amulet seemed to glow in a blue aura and then in a bright blue flash of light blinding the old man for a moment, when the old man's eyes recovered to his shock and horror, Naruto was suddenly gone and the sapphire amulet somehow turned black...

--- Flashback end ---

Just when Naruto was about to think that things couldn't get any worse, Naruto suddenly felt the ground begin to shake in a series of thunderous Earthquakes after another that bounced Naruto around like a ragdoll until Naruto soon saw a gigantic shadow cover him from the sun's ray and once the Earthquakes stopped and Naruto saw what was causing them, his skin colored paled to the point where Orochimaru's would be burnt black in comparison, his jaw suddenly dropped straight to the ground, his eyes widened to the point they looked like they would burst right out of their sockets, as he saw a single lioness standing in front of him that seemed be as big as the entire planet from his point of view and maybe even bigger and then he heard someone call the lioness...

Naruto had just finished having a ramen eating frenzy at Ichiraku ramen for a mission well done with his old trouble-making friends from the academy Kiba, Choji and Shikamaru along with Shino, Neji and Rock Lee.

It was getting late and Naruto was feeling a little too tired from having such a good time hanging out with his fellow shinobi in one of their "Guy's night out" but Naruto was now heading home and he saw that pretty much most of the villagers were likely fast asleep now.

However as Naruto walked, he didn't notice a old man who looked like a stereotypical medieval wizard, with a long white beard, grayish-blue cloak, and pointed hat. and Naruto was starting to feel even more tired than before and had accidentally bumped into the old man, "I'm sorry old man... Are you alright?", However Naruto never got a reply as the old man suddenly glared at Naruto with eyes filled with outrage and then he suddenly aimed his fingers at the blonde Uzumaki and Naruto saw that the old man's nails were purist black and then they suddenly became jagged and broken and then suddenly blood red electricity shot at Naruto causing him agonizing amounts of pain as he felt his body begin to shrink to the point where he now stood two inches tall and that wasn't the end of it, as Naruto began to feel his body being sent somewhere but he didn't know where as he then passed out from all the pain his body was feeling.

Then with Naruto, apparently shrunken to the point of disappearing from existence the wizard then mumbled about getting a new manicure and suddenly teleported away from the village.


-------


With a groan, Naruto found himself laying on his back still feeling some mild discomfort from what happened last night as he was getting up on his feet.

When Naruto fully stood up, he then saw that he was somewhere dark and yet somehow very warm and the ground looked like it was a fair color, like someone's skin, and soft and squishy to stand on. Looking around, he saw he was standing among what looked like a endless field of enormous wheat-colored trees of some sort. Looking up, he then saw the sky.

Where was he? And why did he feel so strange?

Deciding he needed a look around, Naruto turned to one on the strange trees and put his hands together to focus his cha...Huh?! His eyes widened. His chakra...heck, even the fox's chakra....HE COULDN'T FEEL ANY OF IT!

Then, he remembered what happened last night the old wizard man! He had something to do with this, but how? All Naruto ever did was apologize for bumping into the old man, and then he attacked him!

If Naruto ever found his way back to the village and he sees that old man again... he's going to do much more than just "Bump" into him again... but that would have to wait for a while, as Naruto needed some kind of plain to figure out where he was and how to get back to Konoha, first.

With that in mind, Naruto then began to climb one of the strange gigantic trees with his bare hands, seeing as he couldn't access his chakra, he had to climb up trees the old fashioned way, as he climbed, Naruto was at least hoping that wherever he was now, it was at least a peaceful place...

Well, he has been wrong before... After what felt like an eternity, Naruto had reached the top of the "tree"...only to find himself looking at the back of the head of an utterly gigantic animal!

That was when he realized this wasn't even a tree at all, no this was REALLY a single hair of this animal's fur!

Ans from what he saw of the area they were in, this animal must have been as miserable as he was when he was a child if not more so, as he saw the area around the animal was nothing but a barren wasteland, and it wasn't the only one either as he saw other animals and they all looked like cats.

But these cats looked much bigger than the ones he's saw back in Konoha.

Suddenly Naruto felt his surrounding shake and rumble as he then saw a gigantic sized black claw heading towards him and Naruto like any other sensible person did what came naturally, he ran for his life, but compared to the gigantic claw, he made little to no progress... somehow the claw missed him, but it kept trying to scratch him though.

As the giant feline kept trying to scratch him, Naruto was frantically dodging the claw as much as possible, suddenly Naruto had tripped and fallen and then he felt his jumpsuit get caught by the claw and was now being lifted up to meet who was scratching at him.

13533222222222232222222221.content:
"Housmates! Report to the backyard for today's challenge!" came a booming voice from over an intercom. The amalgam of animated characters that dwelt within the massive house paused in their various bullshit to pile out the door into the yard. The haphazard patchwork of characters taken from different sources stood on the lawn and awaited

"Today's challenge will have you break into two teams. With Team 1 being Captain Hero, Spanky, Xander, and Wooldoor. Team 2 will be Foxxy, Clara, Toot, and Ling-Ling. The winning team will get a month-long cruise around the world!"

The gathered contestants cheered at the thought of getting away from the asylum that they had joined when they agreed to be on the show. They split into their respective teams and prepared to hear the contest.

"Team 2 will have to design and construct a dimensional gateway using parts purchased from the local hardware store. Meanwhile Team 1 need to...get water out of a boot. The first team to finish wins! Ready? GO!"

Team 2 scrambled to the store to collect their supplies, Ling-Ling having crunched the numbers and working out the design before giving them a list of materials to get. Toot, Foxxy and Clara all boarded Foxxy's van and tore off down the street, plowing through several fences in their hurry.

Team 1 sat pondering their own conundrum, and several things were tried. Captain Hero attempted to punch the water out of the boot, only to be hit by splash-back and scream like a frightened child. Spanky made his attempt, only for it to end with failure, and Wooldoor catching fire...somehow.

It was an intense montage of activity, and Team 2 had finally managed to finish constructing their design after many hours of mind numbing calculations and physical labor. They presented their finished device to the host, who took a long hard look over everything before rendering a decision.

"A nice, sturdy construction. The power source appears stable and capable of sustaining the portal. An almost perfect design."

"So do we win?" Toot asked excitedly, her fat legs jiggling in anticipation.

"I would say you win," the host said, much to the team's joy. "But you forgot to carry the 1!" The sheets of equations were thrown back into the contestants faces in disgust.

"Hey guys, there's instructions written on the bottom of the heel, I think this is just the breakthrough we needed," came the voice of Wooldoor as he upturned the boot to read what was written on the sole, dumping the contents onto the ground below.

"Team 1 wins! They have one hour to pack before they will be taken to their first destination. Meanwhile Team 2 will have to clean up once the others leave."

And so, one hour passed, and the winners loaded up and left for their long vacation while the losers were forced to clean up their failed creation.

"This is a load of bullshit!" Toot cried indignantly. "So what if we forgot to carry a 1?"

"It's not like one missed number would make a difference anyway," Clara agreed with a nod as she picked up the discarded tools they had used.

"Stupid machine! You cost me a free vacation!" Toot's harsh yell was followed swiftly by a strong kick to the control panel.

Unbidden, the device sprung to life, pouring energy into its flawed function, and a vortex burst into being for a brief moment. The three girls, and one animal-monster thing, gasped as unidentifiable objects began to leap from the whole in reality. One such thing was a fireball that flew towards Toot, who quickly used Ling-Ling as a shield, sending the battle monster flying off towards the horizon from the impact.

Their panic didn't last long, however, as the portal began to fizzle out, and the machine began to smoke. One last thing streaked out before the phenomena sealed up with a wet pop. This human-shaped object landed hard, hitting the shin of...

info.description:
What it says on the tin basically Naruto age 16 is sucked into another world only to arrive two inches tall and goes on from there, like my other stories this one has rules

1:Above average grammar and spelling is a must, if the grammar/spelling is so bad that it is unreadable I will delete it.
2:Chapter length should be at least a paragraph, unless it's a choice chapter, and please try to be descriptive.
3:No Yoai at all.
4:No pissing, shitting, hard vore and futanari.
5: Naruto can not be killed and don't end the story line too soon, oh yeah Naruto is male in this story.

Other then that please add.
